reviews.comments: Với giá của khách sạn Alacarte là 4 triệu/ đêm thì ở home này xứng đáng hơn nhiều !
Cảm ơn c đã nhiệt tình với gia đình em
Chỗ ở tiện nghi, sạch sẽ, sát biển, view đẹp. Rất phù hợp với gia đình có trẻ nhỏ

We had a great stay! The apartment was modern and clean and all appliances worked perfectly, location is good and the view from the pool is amazing. Our host Enmy was super friendly and always there to help out

This is the best value for money airbnb in Da Nang with no compromise on anything, beach is just in front of property. I absolutely loved this place, all listed amenities were there, place was neat and clean. Special thanks to Enmy for making our stay wonderful. She was always responsive, friendly and helpful.
Everything about Enmy’s flat exceeded expectations it was perfect in every way. I couldn’t have asked for a better stay.
Great value in a beautiful apartment. Highly recommend!
Enmy was so helpful and really kind.  Good location

친절하고 신속하게 응대를 잘해주었다
다시 머물고 싶은 숙소
Perfect communication!
Beautiful, value for money and best beachfront property at Da Nang. All listed ameneties were there. I loved this property.

Nice and cozy apartment
Very clean
Walkable distance to restaurants and beach
Host very helpful
Thank you again
Phòng đúng như ảnh, rất xinh và sạch, chủ nhà hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, rất đáng để trải nghiệm

Phòng ở sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp và ấm cúng. Cảm giác ấm cúng như ở nhà, có bếp, lò nướng, lò vi sóng, tủ lạnh, máy giặt,… nhiều tiện nghi. Vị trí trung tâm, gần nhiều cửa hàng và quán ăn. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, phản hồi tức thì và hộ trợ nhiệt tình 😊😊

The place was nice! It’s a walking distance from almost everything. The beach, the river, local market around and great coffee shops.. everything is closely accessible.
Linh was also very cooperative and nice.
Highly recommended
今回1人旅で利用しました。お部屋は写真の通りで、水回りもすごく綺麗でした。価格を考えればかなりコスパいいと思います。また利用したいと思います！
門のキーパッドの反応が悪く、毎回苦戦していました。建物の内装は写真の通りでよかったです。また、近くにおしゃれなカフェがいくつかあったのも嬉しかったです。チェックアウト後も荷物を預けることができました。私の部屋の洗面は水はけがよくなかったですが、それ以外は特に問題ありませんでした。
位置非常方便，周边很多美食和咖啡店，店主回复非常及时和友好，很漂亮的民宿，里面的设施很完善，性价比很高，非常完美的硬件设施，经营不易，一定监督好卫生问题，相信会更好的
Linh is a great host and this place is beautiful. Everything is a convenient walk away. Gym is right around the corner. Quiet at night. Very clean. Calm and tranquil space. Highly recommend
늦은 시간 체크인 했지만, 빠르고 정확하게 응대 해주셨습니다. 감사합니다.

Stayed at this lovely house in Da Nang and it was a total win—especially if you’re a foodie! The location is perfect, with tons of amazing restaurants, street food stalls, and little hidden gems all within walking distance. I basically ate my way through the neighborhood.
The house itself was super clean and comfortable—exactly what you want after a long day of exploring (or, in my case, eating). The host was incredibly helpful, always responsive and full of great local tips.
If you’re visiting Da Nang and want a clean, convenient spot with a great vibe and easy access to incredible food, this place is a solid choice. I’d happily stay here again!

걸어서 한시장부터 핑크성당 콩카페 등 주요 관광지 다 갈 수 있고 용다리랑 강가랑 가깝다보니 동네 산책만 나와도 맛집 카페 수두룩 해서 좋더라구요.
숙소 컨디션은 다낭에서 지내본 곳 중에 최고! 명시된 서비스 내역과 정확히 일치하고 룸컨디션 너무 좋아서
다음에 다낭오면 여기서 연박하려고요.
공용공간까지 완벽하게 준비되어 있어 더 편하게 지내다 갑니다~
저희가 방문했을 땐 공사를 해서 낮에는 소음이 좀 있었는데, 저녁에는 아주 조용해서 푹자고 아늑하게 지내기도 좋았어요^^

테라스 있는 룸을 할까 했지만 다낭에서는 돌아다니느라 숙소에 있을 시간이 얼마 없을 듯해 일부러 작은 방으로 예약했습니다. 캐리어 펴기 조금 애매하긴 하지만, 욕실이 넓고 깨끗해서 좋았어요. 나무 문이라 바깥 소음에는 취약하지만, 그거 외엔 다 만족스러웠어요.
위치가 너무 좋습니다. 한시장에서 10분, 용다리 근처입니다. 그리고 동네가 이뻐요. 분위기 좋은 카페와 맛집도 근처에 많고요.
1층 세탁기도 사용이 가능했고, 직원 분도 친절하십니다. 저희가 일찍 도착했는데 짐 보관도 가능했습니다.
이 방은 혼자 여행하시는 분에게 좋을 듯 해요. 다음엔 둘이서 오면 테라스룸으로 예약해보려구요.
非常感谢Linh女士，他让我在岘港的旅行非常顺利和愉快！她不仅为我提供了非常好的住宿，还额外的为我建议到会安、美山等地的司机。由于我不懂外语，她一遍一遍的利用爱彼迎的沟通平台给我指导。总之，Linh女士不仅是个“漂亮女人”，还是一个热情，善良的房东，我为能在她的民宿入住而感到荣幸，我会向我的朋友推荐她的！

We stayed in 3 places over our 5D4N trip in Da Nang/Hoi An, and Linh's place was by far the best. The room and linens were spotless, the bathroom was beautiful, fancy appliances (kettle, microwave, toaster all in a beautiful retro style). And most importantly, the bicycles were almost new! Compared to the bikes at our 2 other places, these were really good condition and made our adventuring around Da Nang so easy and convenient. There are a lot of good restaurants just up the street. Location is good for nearby places like Con Market, but you will probably need to Grab to the beach. Distance from Son Tra Night market was walkable - we crossed the Dragon Bridge and it was an easy walk back. 100% would recommend for this price.

Lihn's location was pretty central and easy to get to various locations around Da Nang. We only stayed a night, so the single room and bed was more than enough for our stay. Lihn was communicative and spoke to us days in advance of us arriving.

Linh’s place was a great find for us! It was very close to restaurants, spas, and lots of other things to do. The place is easy to find, and the room is very comfortable. Linh was also very friendly and quick to respond to our requests. The only reason that I gave 4 stars was because the construction noise during our stay from 2-6pm that caused us to not be able to rest. Linh had construction at her place, and knowing our luck, her closeby neighbour also had construction. We would appreciate knowing this in advance whatsoever so we could be able to plan better.
The host being very nice and helpful! Everything was provided and especially washing for free x will definitely come back!!!
Great location for your stay in Da Nang. Everything is centrally located and you can just walk yourself to an amazing evening.

Linh's place is a gem! It is 5 minutes walk from the Dragon Bridge and the Cham Museum, with many cafes dotting the neighborhood, making it easy to grab a coffee at almost anytime of the day.
Finding it is easy. With clear step-by-step instructions, checking in is breezy. The place is clean I feel at home from the moment I stepped in. The room and bathroom are spotlessly clean with big bed and high quality mattress and pillows. As the place is not facing a main road, I had uninterrupted sleep throughout my stay.
Linh is very friendly and responsive. I will definitely choose to stay here again during my future visits to Da Nang.

I am so happy with my stay here. This space is so cozy, clean and comfy! I felt very at-home and safe here.
I really like Da Nang and I loved walking around the area. In fact, from this Airbnb, you could take a walk or run across the dragon bridge and around to the Cau Song Han bridge and back and it's about 5km total. Super nice!
So many lovely cafes and restaurants around. My favorite cafe for Vietnamese feeling was Tiệm cà phê Cậu Út, right across the street. For working, I loved Ge or Wonderlust cafe.
To the beach is only about 10 mins away by Grab bike.
Linh was super responsive and helpful. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy stay in Da Nang.

Heel moderen en mooi ingericht huis met alles erop en eraan. Host reageerde snel op alles en was enorm behulpzaam. Locatie was ook goed, verschillende zaken op wandelafstand. Beach moet je een scooter huren of grab gebruiken. Ik raad men verblijf hier zeker aan! :) top

Linh’s place is a great find! We stayed for a few nights and found the location to be a perfect spot in town for us! Very close to the dragon bridge, and tons of storefronts and cafes! We are on a long trip around Southeast Asia, so finding a place with a large kitchen and washer/dryer combo was the highlight for us, definitely made us feel at home with all of those conveniences! The rooms are a decent size, with a private bathroom, desk, mini fridge big bed and wardrobe closet in them (and the air con works very well too!). We thought that the rooms were also pretty well spread out too, as we hardly ever heard the other guests when in them. The common space that you share with the other guests is VERY well maintained and has a homey feel to it, there is an outdoor patio on the ground floor along with a rooftop one! The instructions to get into the house are very clear, which was nice since we arrived quite late into the night. Would ABSOLUTELY recommend this spot and plan to return!
各方面都很好，但是一早7:30就有人唱KTV被吵醒，還有房間裡有非常濃的人工香精味，通風也不太好，有窗戶但沒陽光，所以休息的不是很好，適合短居一兩日。房東很和善，公共空間美麗。

great place to stay in da Nang. so much amazing local food nearby. they also have all the amenities you could possibly need, from washer dryer, to adapters for chargers. room is very clean, as well as the entire place. ac works great too!
look no further if you're searching for a place to stay in da nang!
部屋は写真通りで、快適な生活が送れました！

Không gian nghỉ rất yên tĩnh và riêng tư. Khá ngạc nhiên khi nhận phòng vì không nghĩ sẽ rộng rãi , thoáng đãng như vậy. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hỗ trợ và hồi đáp rất nhanh . Phòng ốc sạch sẽ , gọn gàng , đầy đủ mọi tiện nghi . Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại tiếp .

This is truly one of the best places to stay for the price — spacious, peaceful, and full of charm. The garden is beautiful and well-kept, making it perfect for morning coffee or winding down in the evening. The house feels like a home, and the host was incredibly kind and helpful throughout our stay. They went out of their way to make us comfortable and were always quick to respond. One small thing to note: there’s no hair dryer, but hopefully the host sees this and adds one soon. Overall, an excellent stay — we would definitely come back!

这是一次非常棒的体验
房东特别的贴心，有问必答。
回复得也很及时
我和我的朋友惊呼这个花园的美丽。
这是在路边的一栋独栋别墅，有三间房，隐私性挺好的，也很安全
就是密码有点多哈哈哈，每次出门、进门都记不住
下次来岘港，还想再住这里，性价比很高！！！
❤️谢谢

Beautiful 2 story apartment that is modern and very clean. It is on the 12th floor on a busy street but it was very quiet. One bedroom is downstairs and the other is upstairs, both with full baths. We had a really nice stay and the host was great because we booked it in the evening. Had all the needed amenities. Great stay!

We had a pleasant stay. The host was welcoming and personally made our check-in process easy. The place was very clean, with daily housekeeping and fresh water bottles provided each day. It's conveniently located near the airport. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Nang.

Couldn’t thank you host more - The place was clean and cleaned daily, the house was very clean and tidy at all times. Acommdated requests without question, would 100% reccomend and will be staying here again in future!
Thanks again.

Amazingly clean and beautiful apartment. Stayed here with my wife, daughter and infant son for 3 days. had no issues at all. Definite value for money. If i come back to Danang, will book again for sure.
정말 깨끗한 숙소입니다. 호스트분도 신속하게 응답해주시고 불편한 사항은 없는지 늘 확인하여 주셨습니다. 다만 위치가 공항 근처라 관광을 하기에는 가깝지 않지만, 날씨가 더우니 그랩을 잡아 이동하면 되기에 큰 문제가 되지는 않습니다. 다낭에 다시 오게 되면 꼭 머물고 싶은 숙소입니다.

We had a comfortable stay at Hang’s place.  Apartment is beautiful and Hang was very cooperative and caring Host ensuring a phenomenal service. It’s perfect if u wish stay closer to the airport. Beach is just 4kms away.
다낭 공항 인접한 아주 깔끔한 복층구조의 숙소. 사진과 똑같고 집이 너무 아늑하고 좋습니다. 한시장 및 맛집들은 그랩으로 5-10분 거리로 위치도 만족합니다. 그리고 호스트님의 빠른 응답으로 불편함 없이 지냈습니다.

Being a tourist not aware of locality Hang was so helpful to book the day tour and very easily communicate with Hang.  I would prefer stay in the same accommodation again if ever I visit Vietnam again. Highly recommended.

Super appartement!
Je recommande vivement, tout est organisé à la perfection 👌emplacement idéal pour sillonner dans la ville et tout près de l’aéroport.
Vivement recommandé!

Our stay at this Airbnb was absolutely perfect and truly deserves a 5-star rating!
From the moment we arrived, the service was exceptional, the host was very responsive and went above and beyond to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience.
The apartment itself was immaculately clean, sparkling from top to bottom, making us feel instantly comfortable and at ease. We especially loved the aesthetic minimalist decor, which created such a serene and stylish atmosphere. Every detail was thoughtfully considered, contributing to a truly relaxing and delightful stay.
We can't recommend this place enough!"

This is the nicest apartment I've stayed at in Da Nang. It's basically brand new and is a loft style layout with floor to ceiling windows offering an excellent view of the airport, allowing you to watch the planes take off. The sound insulation is good and unlike many of the buildings closer to the beach, there are no issues with humidity/dampness.
The apartment is on the top floor of a mixed-use building on a main street that makes it easy to go all the restaurants and cafes in Hai Chau. It's also really not that far from the beach side of the river either. If you want to enjoy Da Nang but not have to deal with the craziness and traffic of My An in the high season, this is a really good spot.
The hosts are friendly and very responsive.

Our family had an absolutely amazing stay. The space was incredibly spacious, spotlessly clean, and perfectly maintained; ideal for me, my wife, and our kid. The accommodations were top-notch, making us feel so comfortable and at home. A special shoutout to the cleaning ladies—they were incredibly friendly, thorough, and accommodating, taking care of all our needs and keeping the place absolutely pristine. The host’s service and communication were exceptional, always prompt and warm, ensuring a seamless experience from check-in to checkout. This was one of the best stays we’ve ever had, and we can’t wait to come back! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a fantastic place to stay. Thank you for everything!
Had a very pleasant and comfortable stay! The host was helpful and made sure everything went smoothly. Would definitely recommend to friends.
it’s a nice place. just like the photos. only regret was not staying there long enough! a rebook spot for sure.
迅速に対応してくださりました。またお願いします

Hai Hang ,,
We are extremely happy for having choosen your place for our stay .. The house was as per our expectations.. Nevertheless was Ur response to all our queries.. Felt right at home .From the check in to check out you was one of the best host I've experienced so far. U really did recommend all tourist attractions else we would have missed a few places to see .. House was super clean and the main point is that house keeping was done daily to ensure cleanliness.. Pictures posted in Airbnb was exactly the same !! Property is easily accessible and it's just 5 mins from the airport.. Hang was an amazing person .. Her support throughout our stay made our trip an memorable one .. Will definitely recommend to my friends and cousins .. Hoping to come back again to stay in this property .. Thank you So much Hang !!
다시 오고싶은 숙소입니다.
設施新淨，住所乾淨，而且地方夠大
I had a great stay here! The host has been very helpful

1 căn phòng trong 1 ngôi nhà gần biển ở Đà Nẵng.
Căn phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi, có gian bếp nhỏ phù hợp cho các bạn.
Hơi bất tiện 1 chút là đường nhỏ nên chỗ để xe không được thuận tiện cho lắm nhưng đây vẫn là một nơi đáng đến nghỉ ngơi nhe.
Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.
Phòng sạch sẽ, còn mới
Tuyệt vời
good
Superbe logement très bien aménagé !
Ok

Спасибо за заселение, хозяин очень оперативно отвечает на сообщения, это очень классно.
В целом жилье соответствуют фотографиям и цене-качеству.
Не смогу включить кондиционер, но мне все быстро показали и включили.
Спасибо!
The place is very clean and they are very friendly and helpful
Great location and worthy to the price paid
Ok ạ
Chổ ở gần biển, nhiều quán ăn ngon. Chị chủ thân thiện hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Phòng và nội thất sạch sẽ
Trải nghiệm chỗ ở tốt, sạch sẽ, vị trí gần biển, tiện nghi, mức giá hợp lí .. cần fix lại hệ thống nước và wifi, vì nước và wifi yếu
Chỗ ở ổn, cửa nvs bị hỏng nhưng vẫn oke

The owner is very nice and replies very timely. The room is clean and the bedding is soft and comfortable. The boss also provides restaurant recommendations and charter services, etc. No matter when, as long as you send a message, the boss will reply and help in time. It is a very pleasant check-in experience. I hope the next trip to Da Nang

屋主待人友善，盡力配合旅客，亦有仔細介紹附近景點及安排交通，十分細心。
房間設計滿足基本需要，頂樓配有洗衣機及乾衣機，有效回應替換衣物的需要。
Chủ nhà hỗ trợ tốt, nhiệt tình, xung quanh có nhiều điểm ăn uống, trải nghiệm

We had a great stay at Chaca House! We were able to rent a Moped straight away at our Airbnb and had a supportive host at all times. If your in Da nang looking for a good location and cheap stay, you’ve found the right place!

nhà sạch sẽ, mát mẻ, yên tĩnh. chủ nhà thân thiện. các đồ dùng như khăn, giấy vệ sinh... luôn sẵn có. có thể giặt và sử dụng máy sấy quần áo trên tầng 4 rất tiện dụng. có sẵn cả dịch vụ cho thuê xe máy giá 120k/ngày khá rẻ so với thị trg
Nice and clean place, will come back
Good place and good owner.. thanks
性价比不错，周围有很不错的餐厅，步行可达沙滩
Very lovely place for the price. Clean and excellent services. Highly recommend.

La casa è molto carina e si trova in una zona tranquilla vicino al mare.
Ci è stato consigliato un ristorante a pochi metri dalla casa… davvero molto buono!
Inoltre la padrona di casa ci ha organizzato il noleggio dello scooter e un passaggio per Hoi An.
Tutto perfetto!
Grazie mille ♥️
Great experience. Great location. Easy to check in & out. Friendly host. Highly recommend.
Will definitely stay here again!
Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình, phản hồi nhanh chóng và đưa ra các gọi ý trải nghiệm dịch vụ xung quanh bổ ích
Die Gastgeber sind super nett, sehr lieben Menschen. Die Unterkunft ist gut, das einzigste ist etwas außerhalb vom Stadtzentrum.
Super lovely house, nice host rents also motorbikes if needed
Gia đình chủ nhà cực kỳ đáng yêu và thân thiện. Rất cảm ơn cô chủ ở đây

Very responsive host and very accommodating (we arrived at 7am and the room was ready !) with staff very available. We rented scooters easily and he even gave us recommendations for Hoi An (our next destination) as he is from there. Very friendly, highly recommend ! The room was very clean as well and there is a washing machine available to use for free.
good place, worth a to stay at budget
Great value for money, very helpful and responsive host.
岘港很美丽很干净，chaca的房子也很舒适干净！走路几分钟就到海滩了，旁边的海鲜粉特别美味，房东和管家给我们的出行解决了很多问题，非常推荐！
今天住这里的房东小哥人也太好了❗️想买个流量卡，本来想问地址自己去买， 他知道后丢下一句：我骑车去帮你问，买回来还帮安装好[流泪]离海边很近，房间也很干净，床也很舒服，是我在越南睡的最舒服的一晚了，下次来岘港还要住他们家。

I really enjoyed my stay at Juno’s place! The room was super clean and comfy, and it had everything I needed. The location was also very convenient and easy to get around. Juno was such a kind and helpful host, always quick to reply and made everything easy. The whole experience was really smooth and pleasant. Would definitely recommend and hope to come back one day. Thanks a lot, Juno!
Had a really lovely stay at Juno’s place. It was clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed. Juno was super helpful and easy to communicate with, making the whole experience really smooth! ☺️

I had a wonderful week at Juno’s place. The room was cozy and comfortable, and it really felt like a home away from home. As someone who works remotely, having reliable WiFi is essential, and it worked perfectly throughout my stay. Juno was also incredibly kind and helpful. Highly recommend!

If you are looking for a clean, well put space with many restaurants right next to you and an amazing host then you should stay at this place.
Juno let me put my luggage away before my check in because I had a late flight the night before. He managed to let me check in before the given time, which he did not have to but still did.
The room looks like described in the photos and is very clean and the location is perfect for eating out without walking for too long.
I was very happy to stay in this house and would come back anytime.
We only got to stay a night but it great to recharge our batteries after a long drive. Very comfortable and well presented accommodation 🙂
Very clean and kind host i liked for 6days😊

J’ai passé un excellent séjour dans ce logement. Tout était impeccable : la chambre était très propre et bien entretenue, avec un nettoyage effectué chaque semaine. Les hôtes ont été très disponibles et réactifs à chaque fois que j’avais une question ou un besoin. Ils ont même aménagé une belle terrasse sur le rooftop, ce qui a vraiment ajouté un plus au séjour !
Le quartier est très calme, avec un environnement agréable et une superbe vue sur la mer. Et le gros avantage : la plage est à seulement une minute à pied ! Un vrai petit coin de paradis. Je recommande vivement.

The place is in a great location, a nice 8min walk to the beach.
It was very thoughtful of the owner to send some tips and necessary locations, along with some special events info.
They have very affordable water gallons that you can collect any time at the lobby.
주위에 마사지 식당 카페 해변 다  걸어서 5~10분 이내에 있고  카.톡이든 메세지든 식당 마사지 추천도 잘해 주세요 다낭 또 오면 재예약 할듯요
Phòng ở thoải mái. Chủ nhà thân thiện

If you're looking for a place near the beach, the Doba Baliza home is perfect. she waited for me to arrive from the airport.
the location was so convenient to the beach. I recommend going at 5:00am for the sunrise and morning swimmers.
I was happily surprised that there was a little kitchenette, but u never cooked. there are little grocers all around if you did cook.
the salt coffee at unicorn cyber next door was nice.
Linh er en fantastisk vært. God til Engelsk, og kom med så mange gode anbefalinger. Kan klart anbefale

Die Kommunikation mit Linh war unkompliziert, freundlich und jederzeit kam innerhalb weniger Minuten eine Rückmeldung. Die persönliche Begrüßung beim Check-In war sehr schön, um alles gezeigt zu bekommen und mögliche Fragen zu stellen. Auch gab es reichlich Informationen für Aktivitäten vor Ort, Restaurants und lokales Essen, was man bei seinem Aufenthalt in Da Nang probieren sollte. Die Wohnung selbst ist wie beschrieben ausgestattet, sodass man alles Notwendige vor Ort hat, was man für einen (längeren) Aufenthalt benötigt. Falls etwas fehlen sollte, ist Linh jederzeit für Hilfe erreichbar. Ich habe meinen Aufenthalt von einer Woche auf zwei Wochen verlängert, da ich mich dort sehr wohl gefühlt habe. Netterweise gab es dann einmal ein Clean-Up nach der ersten Woche, das war super! Gerne wieder und vielen Dank für alles!
The host were always available when we needed, it was a very good stay. I’d recommend . Just be aware that is the ground floor and is a bit noisy.

Tôi đã lưu trú tại nhà của
Huong, thực sự rất đúng ý tôi, một chiếc ban công có ánh sáng tự nhiên, có bếp nấu ăn. Decor xinh xắn như chính nhà tôi, dù không được rộng lắm. Nhưng tôi cảm thấy rất tuyệt rồi

Căn hộ mang phong cách vintage dễ thương, được trang bị đầy đủ tiện nghi và ấm cúng. Ánh sáng tự nhiên tràn ngập khắp phòng, rất thoải mái và thư giãn. Bên cạnh đó, khu vườn nhỏ xinh bên cạnh cũng rất chill và mát.
Có khu vực giặt đồ trên sân thượng. Và đặc biệt rất thích khu vườn nhỏ ở trên sân thượng, tràn ngập hoa và nắng. Sáng nào mình cũng dành thời gian ở trên đó để ngắm cảnh và làm việc

The room looks exactly like the photos—beautifully decorated, clean, and even more charming in person. It’s spacious and cozy, perfect for one or two people, and just a short walk from the beach. While the bed was a bit on the firm side, everything else exceeded my expectations. The host was responsive and very helpful throughout the stay.

The room looks spacious in photos but is actually much smaller in reality. While it was beautiful, clean and well-maintained, the washroom was extremely tiny—barely enough space to move comfortably. If you're okay with a compact setup, it might work, but it wasn’t quite what I expected.
The host was friendly, and the location was good, but the size discrepancy was little disappointing.
Отличные апартаменты , море в шаговой доступности , спокойная улица , вежливый хозяин 👌🤝
Huong war sehr kommunikativ und hat uns direkt mitgeteilt falls sich irgendetwas geändert hat.
Clean and comfortable apartment in a nice location, with a very helpful and responsive host. Definitely recommended.
We really enjoyed our stay ☺️☺️
위치도 좋고 아늑했어요
Xung quanh nhìu quán xá, phòng sạch sẽ đủ đồ như sống ở nhà luôn

Simply the best property , Even it is near to restaurents and my khe beach felt like private ,very clean and wonderful view balcony ! host is very responsive and clear instructions finally i highly recommend this place .
Rất tốt

Cara’s place is right in the heart of Da Nang, just steps away from all kinds of restaurants, coffee shops, convenience stores, and even a pharmacy. The apartment is spacious, clean, and comes with a cool projector for movie nights. Cara was also kind enough to let us check in as early as 10 AM, which we really appreciated. One of our favorite spots was the aesthetic balcony where we enjoyed our morning coffee while watching the city come to life. If you’re looking for a big, affordable place to stay in Da Nang, I definitely recommend this one!
It's a great location to be at close with everything with tons of things to do around. Clean and nice.
Great place, I loved the room, the  balcony . Great location in-between the Mexican restaurant and tattoo parlor.
Excellent hôte hyper réactive toujours à trouver des solutions, cordiale et aimable.
很好的一次入住体验
A very nice apartment in a good area. Easy and fast communication with the host. Only bad thing was the strong smell of mold. Except that a very nice place
房东回应及时，房子宽敞明亮，设施齐全，连续住了3天，体验非常好
Good accommodation, kind and helpful host, the accommodation matches the photos, there are shops nearby, near the beach, near delicious places, I advise you!
Good accommodation, kind and helpful host, the accommodation matches the photos, there are shops nearby, near the beach, near delicious places, I advise you!
Muy buena ubicación !
Wonderful place! Great location, clean, great value etc… very good hosts.
Very good

Awesome property. Host is an awesome person. Provided us early check in and rented bike. Also provided information about surroundings. Always available on call. Place is very close to My khe beach and in the market. Laundry just opposite of the house. Nearby restaurants Tamarind Tree. Awesome food. Vegetarian food also available. Wonderful taste and services. I recommend house to stay. Whenever I back Da Nang will definitely book this house.

Incredible value for money. The host gave great food recommendations that were popular among locals. The room was also very clean! Incredible value for money I would definitely recommend staying here.
房屋内部有电梯，距离沙滩7分钟路程，方便快捷，并且干净卫生。房东人很好，和善可爱友好温柔，会不自觉想要跟她聊天，但碍于语言不通只能作罢。房子进入后会要求脱鞋子，可能会有点不习惯

I loved this place. It was clean, comfortable and in a great location. I loved the big desk and windows when I had to work in my room. The internet was fast too. Also thank you for the responsive and friendly host Thu. She was so helpful since the moment I arrived. I will book this place again when I come back to Da Nang ❤️

Un séjour parfait ! Le logement est impeccable : propre, décoré avec goût et très bien équipé.
On s’y sent comme à la maison ! L’emplacement est idéal, calme tout en étant proche de toutes les commodités.
L’accueil de l’hôte a été irréprochable : réactif, attentionné et plein de petites attentions qui font la différence.
Je recommande à 100 % et reviendrai avec grand plaisir !

I stayed in those apartments for 1 month. It's suitable both for long and for short stay.
Area is amazing, it's a quiet street, but in just 1 minute walking you're on the main road with shops and restaurants. Sea is in about 5 minutes of walking. In general area is really good and has evertyhing you need.
Thu is a very kind and nice host, she was always in touch and ready to help. Thank you a lot :)
Cracking stay! Room was spotless and proper roomy. Smack in the middle of everything. Host was a diamond real warm and friendly. Would stay again in a heartbeat!
Nice apartments with a great location. Very friendly hostess. We had a great time at this stay.
非常喜欢这里的住宿氛围，位置非常好👍……离餐厅，海边、超市、按摩都非常近。很适合做饭，一楼有一个大厨房。房屋主人非常好，十分推荐入住。

will come back to this place again if i go to Da Nang. Thu told me that the room i booked had a problem, but she gave me the best solution by moving me to a better room. she and her husband are very friendly. And the place is easy to find.

Thu is SO lovely! Very accommodating and easy to communicate with. She was so friendly and helpful, and always available for anything you need. The location is great! A lot of thins around to do and things are easy to walk to or hop on a Grab bike. There is an elevator in her home! Which makes things so easy. Just be aware this is a home and people live there, and it seems the photos posted on AirBnB are older, maybe from when they first staged the space and it was less lived in. So, the photos don't exactly match the space. Even though the space is lived in and a bit older than the photos, it is still clean and comfortable and convenient! And Thu makes the stay warm and cozy. I would definitely stay again!

Thu was very helpful and the place was very nice and convenient. I really enjoyed my stay, I only moved out because I was looking for something a bit more private. Overall I really recommend Thu’s place if you want a central place close to the beach, shops, cafes and restaurants.

离游客中心很近，附近的餐馆很多，离海滩步行5分钟。
房间干净整洁，是我这次旅行最满意的酒店。

Wir haben nicht viel Zeit in der Unterkunft verbracht, aber Check-in und -out und die Kommunikation haben sehr gut geklappt. Das Zimmer war sauber und ordentlich, wir haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt.
Vielen Dank!
Very convenient, comfortable, and clean place. Thu is an efficient host. I recommend the stay.
Great place, great location. Lots of space in the room

Excellent host
superb place
heart of everything
everything went well
host was so helpful and coordinated everything hassle free
loved the stay
Great location. Walking distance to many restaurants and My Khe beach.
Phòng ấm áp và chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình sẽ ghé lại nếu có dịp

Lovely apartment which felt quite spacious, bright and modern. The street is peaceful and charming, and very close to the main beach. The main building is a lovely, welcoming family home and was a great way to see a small part of local life. Huong and her family were very helpful during my stay, and made sure to lock up the bike each night for me.
My third time staying here and I always love it.

A wonderful place to stay in Da Nang. Close to the beach, there’s a 24/7 convenience store right down the street, and the surrounding neighborhood had lovely food options. The host was wonderful and very accommodating. Highly recommend!

The hosts are very helpful and friendly. The location is near restaurants and cafes, and the beach is walkable. The elevator was very helpful since we stayed at the 5th floor. There is also a very cheap laundry nearby.
Muy buena ubicación y muy buen precio ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Phòng như hình ảnh đã chia sẻ, chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh và thông tin rõ ràng, công trình đang thi công bên cạnh ko ảnh hưởng tiếng ồn.

Квартира располагается в пешей доступности до моря, район отличны, есть рестораны рядом. Единственное, рядом идет стройка, было шумно, но это не вина хозяина. С маленькими детьми наверно было бы проблематично.
С хозяином держали связь через это приложение, отвечал оперативно и по делу, спасибо ему большое.
tất cả đều rất tốt,chỉ có wifi ping hơi cao thôi

I loved my stay here. So much so that when I return to Da Nang in November, I'll be booking more than 2 nights accommodation. Yes, there is construction work next door but this is Vietnam so something to be expected :) I found the construction work noise did not interfere with my stay here.
Loved the room. Although not quite as sparkly as the photos, still attractive. Lots of cupboards, nice kitchenette, fabulous (marble?) floor tiles and a window to open a bit for fresh air whilst sleeping at night.
Even able to get YouTube and Netflix on the TV.
Already looking forward to my next stay here.

Young Chan est réactif , gentil, accueillant et arrangeant.
Comme dit dans l'annonce , les travaux à 7h30 est très embêtant mais cela est noté !
Nous n'avons pas eu d'eau chaude pour la fin de douche de la deuxième personne cela est très dommage !
Le lit est un peu dur , et c'est pas agréable d'avoir vu sur une fenêtre d'immeuble.
Toute fois, on vous remercie de votre gentillesse !

For the cost you won’t find a better place. Close to beach and several restaurants! Young Chan was always responsive and clear. I stayed for a month but if I return I will stay longer. The only thing I wish could be addressed in the building were noisy neighbors in the building that were circulating through at all hours of the night. Other that nothing major to report.
Great host and extremely fast at his replies. We had a very late check-in due to a flight delay and he was still waiting for us late at night!
The room is so so, I only enjoy it a half of day due to my early flight, but I think it deserves its price
Great place to stay - really clean and a fantastic location! The staff were so helpful, would definitely recommend!!

Great stay, very nice place, great service and cleaning offered by the host. Nice and comfortable and a 1 minute drive to the beach.
Right off a main road with dozens of upscale bars and restaurants. The mattress was very firm for my liking but I hear that’s popular in Vietnam. Excellent value for price.
The TV has Netflix , YouTube and all the apps I use to watch TV. Highly recommended place!

It was a really good stay 👍
But keep in mind the construction is going next building
It was fine for me :)
except for the noises and no scissors, i also had to fix some light sensors everything else okays.
Staff was very helpful and responsive! Area was very safe! If you are looking for an inexpensive place to stay then, this is a great spot!

Young was always very fast at responding which I appreciated whenever I had questions. He offered daily room cleaning and the staff working in the building were all very nice. The room itself was beautiful and looked just like the pictures. Overall, an amazing stay!

Everything went good! Young Chan replies fast and the rooms were really clean and very big. Washing is free (you also have two machines) and renting scooter went also really well. Only thing we didn’t like was that we didn’t feel welcomed by the staff working there. No smiles, no welcoming words, somehow bad mood .. and we also had the feeling they were talking about us (of course we don’t know if they talked good or bad about us, as we don’t know the language, but they were looking us up and down and chatting about us). So we didn’t feel very comfortable with them. But other than that the experience was good and it’s a really nice room!

Für eine Übernachtung war der Aufenthalt völlig in Ordnung. Check-in und Kommunikation haben sehr gut funktioniert. Alles sah aus wie auf den Bildern, ist aber deutlich in die Jahre gekommen. Das Bett war extrem hart, selbst mit Vorwarnung aus anderen Bewertungen hatten wir nicht damit gerechnet. Unser Zimmer hatte nur Fenster nach hinten zu einem gegenüberliegenden Haus – wenig Privatsphäre, auch im Bad, da man dort von dem Fenster direkt in das gegenüberliegende Bad schaut. Das Warmwasser reichte nur kurz, trotz eingeschaltetem Schalter. Die Wände sind dünn, und das „Ping“ des Aufzugs, sowie die Gespräche waren nachts ständig zu hören. Zudem ist die erwähnte Baustelle „in der Nähe“ direkt nebenan und gegenüber. Baustellenlärm war jedoch kein Problem. Bis auf etwas Staub war es sauber, und die Restaurants in der Umgebung sind sehr gut.

Спасибо хозяину за предоставленное жилье, все было чисто, удобно, хорошие расположение, недалеко от пляжа. Хозяин отзывчивый, все объяснил, быстро отвечает, подсказал рестораны поблизости, спрашивал каждый день нужна ли уборка в комнате. Рекомендую!

Жилье очень чистое и находится в хорошей локации. Все что нужно в пешей доступности.
Интернет слабоват, рабочее место неудобное. На несколько дней - нормально, на длительный срок я бы не рекомендовал
everything was great
Nice place
great place very clean. good and responsive host.
It is a very clean and elegant place! You will really like the place and the location is very central to everything and on a quiet side street.
Mycket rent och fräscht. Bra bemötande. Tvättmaskin ej inne i lägenheten som det står i annonsen.
Really loved the stay here. Also the host was friendly and helpful.
非常好的住宿體驗，市中心的小別墅，非常方便，摩托車可以停在院子裡，很安全！小別墅裡還有電梯，房東非常有愛心，我們的房間有一個小露台，床也非常舒服，睡得非常好！

2週間ほど滞在しました。
周辺には地元の人々も集うカフェやお店が多く、毎日通っていました。ハン川にも毎日朝歩いて行ってました。Charmさんは、困り事が発生したらすぐに解決して下さいました。1人滞在でも不安はありませんでした。毎日お水やおやつ飲み物フルーツなども用意して下さって感謝です。花火大会も屋上から見物できとても思い出に残っています。ダナンでのいい思い出ができましたありがとうございます。
Great place! Awesome location, you can walk to just about everything in 5-10 mins or even less. The beach is about a 5 min walk, so close! Definitely would stay again :)
住在Kim的家感覺像是去了朋友家作客，房子很新淨，拉開窗簾就能看到山景，喜歡這個被大自然擁抱的地方，令人感覺放鬆和平靜， 周圍環境比想像中要安全，去市中心和沙灘都很方便，Kim推薦的食物和咖啡都很棒，露台有按摩池但沒有用過，如果擺放兩張沙灘椅就完美了，甚至連沙灘都不需要去在家就能享受太陽浴

Beautiful area and place to stay. Quiet but surrounded by cafes, view points, restaurants and just 10 minutes to main busy areas. Kim’s home is stunning. The nature and mountain view from my room was so lovely to wake up to every morning. I felt so at home which is a lovely feeling when travelling solo. Would definitely stay again when I return :)

It's a great place to stay. Very quiet and peaceful. There are some construction sites nearby, however there is no noise inside the room. Kim is a great host, friendly and helpful. Can recommend to everyone, and definitely will stay again if there is an opportunity.
Kim和她的家人很友好，允许24小时没有睡觉的我们可以提前入住并向我们免费提供了早餐。入住后也及时满足我们的需求，向我们提供了很多有用的资讯。

Kim's home was beautiful and peaceful. Away from the bustle of the city, overlooking the Son Tra hill. Felt safe and at home here.
Definitely recommend a two wheeler or a personal vehicle to make trips to the main attractions of the city.

10/10 stay with Kim and her family. You stay in a private room and bathroom and then there is shared living space (kitchen, living room, hot tub). The rooftop is spectacular. Youre fully immersed in nature. Amazing!

Все было потрясающе. У меня был поздний рейс, Ким дождалась меня, показала дом. Была очень приветливой, дружелюбной и все очень понятно объясняла. Еще они меня накормили что было очень важно, так как после тяжелой дороги очень хотелось кушать, а в тот момент я еще не знал где поесть. В целом семья очень дружелюбная и приветливая. Весь срок проживания я получал только комфорт и заботу от семьи Ким. Я однозначно рекомендую ее дом для проживания. Плюс ко всему мне дали кучу ценных советов, всегда были приветливы и рады моему присутствию. Спасибо большое за теплый прием! 🫶🏻
Kim and her husband are very welcoming and warm people and their house is simply magnificent. Thank you for this stay.

Wij hebben een fantastisch verblijf gehad bij Kim, haar man en haar twee leuke kinderen. De woning was prachtig en erg luxe, met mooie binnen- en buitenvoorzieningen. Het uitzicht en de locatie bij de natuur waren fantastisch en een kort ritje naar het centrum wanneer je de drukte op wil zoeken.
Wij hebben ons helemaal thuis gevoeld en raden iedereen dit verblijf aan. Het gezellig, comfortabel en bijzonder - bedankt Kim en hopelijk tot een volgende keer! 🥰

Très belles personnes accueillantes et chaleureuses, ils nous ont ouvert leur maison tout en nous mettant a l'aise afin que l'on se sentes chez nous. Ce sont des personnes simples ouverts au partage avec lesquel vous aurez des échanges intéressants et enrichissants. Kim & Jay avec leurs deux garçons sont une famille adorable, toujours prêt a conseiller ou aider en cas de besoin, cest l'experience à vivre qui fera de votre séjour a Da nang un moment inoubliable.
Le logement neuf et hight-tech est parfaitement situé avec un restaurant végétarien et un éco-café dans la même rue, un sentier de randonnée et une forêt a quelques minutes a pieds où vous pourrez observer des singes. La plage et la ville n'est qu'à quelques minutes en scooter.
Un endroit paisible fait pour vous qui allie modernité et nature.
Yoan & Emma
Kim was a friendly and accomodating host, and the location and view was great.

It’s a great location on the main street, right in the heart of Danang, near Dragon Bridge (so it is noisy in the daytime because of the vehicles). The room is spacious, the bed is comfy. The host is friendly and helpful.

I had a fantastic stay at this place! The space was spotless and exactly as described in the listing.
The location is perfect—just a 5-minute walk from downtown and close to great restaurants. Sarah was an excellent host, responding quickly to any questions. I’d definitely stay here again!
Location was great and communication with the host was very good

The host was very helpful while check even though our flight delayed we reached in midnight she helped us in seamless check in. The place in 5 mins walk away to My khe beach and restaurants. The appartment was similar to the description. overall loved my stay here.
Great place, located close to the beach and has plenty of restaurants/cafes that are within walking distance. Thu Hurong was very helpful and responsive to all questions/needs we had during our stay.

Хозяйка лично встретила и проводила в номер, была на связи, помогала советом. Номер уютный, чистый, есть все необходимое, в том числе для приготовления пищи. Расположен в центре города, но достаточно тихо. Удобная кровать. Редкость для Вьетнама: душевая отделена от туалета с умывальником. Удобный душ с горячей водой. Хороший вайфай.
Искренне рекомендую! В следующий раз хочу вернуться сюда
The stay was very pleasant. Location is perfect, easy to access to the beach, also not too noisy. Huong was most helpful and provided many useful information and assistance. Highly recommend it.

This is hands down another hidden gem in Da Nang if you want to feel like home in a modern and beautiful space don’t hesitate. Everything is new and refurbished and works perfectly (no surprises) The host is super responsive and made me felt right at home since day one and helped me in any way possible. The place is super clean and in the center of everything you can walk to the beach and surf school very nearby. No need to say that after other experiences in Da Nang I will definitely come back. Thankful and happy that I found it! 🙏🏽♥️

Ms. Thu Hương is extremely responsive to our needs. the location and accommodation are very convenient, safe, and quiet. The approximity to restaurants, stores, shops, coffee shops, etc. are within a square kilometer. Highly recommended and will stay at this location again. The host and the family are extremely pleasant and helpful.
地理位置优越，性价比很高，房东也非常nice😁 很推荐

Everything was great. Hương is always ready to help, very kind and helpful person. There were no problems during the stay. It was 10 minutes to the sea. Nearby there is a cozy cafe where you can have a delicious breakfast, lunch and dinner.

I had a wonderful stay at Thu’s place! Everything was exactly as described. It’s very accessible, making it easy to get around and explore the area. We spent most of our time exploring the city so we didn’t use a lot of the amenities.
The host was also fantastic—friendly, responsive, and attentive to our needs. Would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a comfortable and affordable stay.

Thu was very friendly and always responsive. We really appreciate the fridge in the room and water cooler at the ground floor. Room was very neat and tidy, bed was comfortable; it had everything that we needed. We had a great stay overall, thanks Thu! ☺️

Chi Huong was so friendly and went above and beyond! She really helped us out with renting motorbikes, local recommendations, booking tours, and more. Not only that, her energy was so friendly and we felt right at home with someone looking after us 🥺 Would definitely love to visit again when we get the chance, our stay in Da Nang was amazing thanks to her. The location was also very good, right near the beach and lots of good restaurants nearby. Thank you for a wonderful stay ❤️
Amazing place. Good price. The host is friendly and supportable. Thanks in advance.
Apartment is beautiful and host was very sweet and helpful. Really enjoyed our stay.
Great location close to the beach and good food options.  Quiet at night.  Friendly host.

Die Unterkunft ist zu Fuß 4 Minuten vom Strand entfernt und befindet sich in einer ruhigen Straße. Wir hatten ein paar Ameisen im Zimmer, allerdings stellte uns die Gastgeberin dafür ein Spray zur Verfügung. Die Wände in der Unterkunft könnten saniert werden. Das Bad war sauber. Die Gastgeberin war jederzeit erreichbar, sehr lieb und hilfsbereit. Sie ist sogar extra zu uns ins Krankenhaus gefahren, um den Wohnungsschlüssel abzuholen.

I really loved the location and the host. Thu was very friendly and helpful, the studio close to the beach, shops, restaurants etc and very fast internet speed. Everything anyone could ask for. Thanks for having hosted us
Great stay, friendly host and convenient location. Very close to beach and lots of coffee shops.  Thu helped us find a place to print visas as well which we really appreciated!
We come from Ksa for vacation and we like the city and people 🤍about the room is very Nice for good vocation I’m in love with host very kindly .location perfect 🤩 everything awesome
Отличная, светлая комната. Есть все необходимое на кухне. Удобное расположение вблизи моря и в оживленном районе с большим количеством кафе.
Amazing place to stay near the beach! If you're looking for a friendly host and a budget place to stay yet super near to everything, this is where you should be.

Thu was very kind and respectful. I wasn't able to accept my reservation due to delays in getting my Vietnam visa processed. Thu was communicative, kind, and helpful throughout the process, allowing me to amend my reservation twice.
I received her Airbnb as a recommendation from my friend Tim, who had previously stayed with Thu and he previously shared with me "they were super friendly and the room was decent. It’s 2 blocks to the beach, maybe 4 to the main digital nomad cafe and restaurant area (though there’s plenty around you here too). Quiet street just off the main drag."
I will aim to stay with Thu next time I visit Vietnam and am recommending her place to my partner, who will visit there in a couple of weeks.
She seems like a very attentive and warm host and the place seems well-located to enjoy the beach and My An neighborhood.
Such nice hosts :) the place is close to everything. AC is working fine. not that noisy. can't complain.

Huong was a very helpful and responsive host. She helped us with the motorbike rentals and booking a trip to Bana Hills. She was kind and the rooms were super clean!! Overall amazing place to stay for a long time! Many restaurants and laundry services nearby and a quick walk to My Khe beach! Definitely a steal for this price!
Nice host. Helped me with a lot of small things

A cosy, but very well laid-out floor plan. The building seems very new, everything works well, and the WiFi is really good. Anh is fairly responsive and very helpful. Upon arrival, the ac had been turned on, a nice touch, arriving to a cool room immediately starts things off well. Recommend.
가성비가 좋은 숙소 입니다. 약간 외진 곳이지만 조용한 숙소 였습니다. 1인이 머물기 좋은 숙소로 추천합니다.

Amazing price for what we got. Most definitely would recommend was a great base for travelling! Toilet area was so clean and modern really stood out. Bed aswell was comfy:) would definitely stay again!
Anh's home had a great view of the beach, and the location was perfect. Anh was extremely responsive whenever we had an issue or a question. I highly recommend this home!
Cũng được, nhưng cần cải thiện về vệ sinh phòng ốc. Vì vấn đề là vệ sinh
Fantastic stay. Clean & modern. Friendly staff & cleaning 2x a week. I stayed for a month. No big problems.
Very good stay, clean apartment, there’s cleaning twice a week, stuff is always available to help, 5 min walking and less to the beach, recommend!

Good quiet place to stay in Da Nang. No tourists, no noise, just calm surroundings. Apartment is well equipped with everything you need, also is very clean. Cleaning is 2 times a week. Special thanks to Trang, she is always responsive and helpful.
amazing stay there we were really sad to leave !
Отлично тихое место, очень чисто, предлагают убираться и менять полотенца с постельным бельем каждые два дня.
Muchas gracias por su excelente servicio
We had a nice study in the Appartement
Another great stay! really comfy living for a few weeks before my wedding! very happy!
环境很好
Good location, very clean unit and  nice stuff 👍
Great stay!
Great stay! Lovely, modern apartment with good aircon. Super close to beach and other stuff!
Amazing stay … very welcoming and are looking forward to stay again at same place in future…
Chỗ ở rất tuyệt vời, thuận tiện khi đi nhiều nơi gần đó. Tôi đã ở đây vài lần cảm giác lúc nào cũng muốn quay lại.

I recently enjoyed staying at this wonderful home again, and I can’t recommend it enough! From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the beautiful décor and the cozy atmosphere. Quynh was friendly and helpful throughout my stay. The price is reasonable, making this place suitable for both family vacations and trips with friends.

We were flying out of DaNang and Quynh’s place couldn’t have worked out better. So close to the airport (walkable even with luggage). The place was huge and spotlessly clean.
It was the perfect place for downtime before our flight… with a key board and a guitar that our teenage daughters enjoyed playing. There was also a great bahn mi stall right in front of the gate, perfect for a quick snack!
Next time we are in Da Nang, we hope to stay longer.
Wonderful host and a great house, with beautiful furniture, great appliances, close to everything in Da Nang. Mrs. Quynh was very helpful in my medical emergency. I highly recommend this place.
Had a great stay! The place was super clean and well-maintained. What really stood out was the unique architecture of the house — it gave the space so much character. Highly recommend!
Close to the airport, but didn’t had any problems with the noise. The house was beautiful and clean! Really enjoyed the place with my friends. Communication was also great!

Quynh couldn’t have been a better host!  We loved our stay and would definitely be interested in returning on subsequent visits to Da Nang.  Beautifully-designed property, super layout, great location…with musical instruments as a delightful bonus.
The place is literally walking distance from the airport. And the host was super helpful too. We had an early morning flight and she was really helpful in accommodating us.

Very convenient place very close to airport
Away from the hustle and bustle of the big city
Home is very neatly done and kept very clean. The host is very prompt in answering your questions

Loved our stay at the property!
It was really close to the airport and was convenient to travel around Da Nang.
The property was very comfortable and we felt right at home.
Highly recommend.
Quynh was very accommodating with our need to store our luggage for a late flight as well as allowing us to check in early because the previous guests had checked out early.

I had an incredible stay at Quynh’s place! The house was spotless, beautifully designed, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect—close to the airport, and main attractions in Da Nang.
Quynh was an amazing host, always responsive and helpful. The check-in process was smooth, and the apartment felt like a home away from home.
I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Nang, and I would definitely stay here again!😇

We stayed at this charming bungalow and had a mixed experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which truly stood out.
However, several issues affected our comfort.
1. The ground floor toilet's flush tank didn’t work.
2. We were greeted by black ants on arrival. A dead cockroach was found in the bedroom, pointing to the need for pest control—tropical climate shouldn't be the only excuse.
3. Bedroom AC units cooled slowly, and without a centralized system, the living room became too hot to enjoy.
4. A dressing mirror is missing in the upper bedroom; the small one in the bathroom isn't adequate.
5. Musical instruments add a lovely vibe, but the heat makes it hard to enjoy them for long.
The property has great potential with its spacious layout and creative touches. With better attention to maintenance and cooling, it could easily become one of the more comfortable and enjoyable stays nearest to Airport area. Close proximity to Airport is a big plus. Thankyou 😊
The home was clean, cozy, and well-equipped. The host was very responsive and helpful, making our stay easy and comfortable
Absolutely stunning place to stay, very peaceful, host was kind and friendly. Only my second place I have stayed on Airbnb and very impressed so far.
特别精致是一套别墅，里面有钢琴，架子鼓和吉他，厨房用品一应俱全，一楼一个干净的房间和卫生间，二楼是另一个房间带卫生间，三楼是露台可以晒衣服，客厅挑高很宽敞，布局合理，房东热血提供建议，为我们提供了足够的饮用水，洗浴用品，门口的热狗非常好吃，周围有餐厅和超市非常便捷，而且在主干道上，距离机场很近，我非常喜欢这套别墅，希望自己也有一套这样的别墅

In overall, I would definitely recommend everyone to stay here, mainly due to:
1. The owner is superbly responsive, polite and welcoming.
2. Aesthetic layout.
3.location wise, very strategic. 5 mins from Danang airport and got few cafes nearby.
Cons:
1. No aircond in the living hall. Probably Quynh can consider to install air conditioner.

Quynh was the best host I ever meet. She support us everything we need. The house were good take care, bedsheet clean, toilet clean, kitchen clean. Location nearby airport. Feel like home when I stay here, center area but peace inside.  I highly recommend to all guest.

Wao.. its too beautiful one of the best place I visited yet.. its just mismerising .
Perfect. Everything is just so perfect every corner of the place is designed and cute.
Huge space. And the most important thing is that music instruments that kept there was just amazing we had a great time at place. Thanks for giving us such a wonderful experience. Will surely visit this place next time. Hoping to keep remains same. ❤️❤️❤️🇻🇳🇻🇳

Great place for our stay, it’s not even 5 mins from the airport. Spacious with full amenities. The host was very responsive and gave us recommendations on a great tour company. She even offered late checkout free of charge so it was great. Definitely recommend.

Chị chủ siêu nhiệt tình với trợ giúp bọn mình khi tới ở rất nhiều ❣️ Nhà đẹp, tiện nghi, gần sân bay,  nhìn chung sạch sẽ,  trước nhà có quán bánh mì ngon mà rẻ xỉu ( recommend mọi người ăn thử nha ).  Sẽ ghé lại home nếu có dịp vào Đà Nẵng lần nữa 🫶🏻

Responsive host even at midnight
Nice set-up
Impress by the architectural design
Looks like your in rural area even at the heart of city
Also near airport
Solid selection for a group of 4. It’s right outside the air port when you need somewhere quick to sleep. A beautiful home that has a traditional yet modern feel.

공항에서 도보로 10분 걸려요! 한시장도 그랩 타고 10분거리라 위치 좋은것 같습니다.
집주인분께서 친절하시고 물도 준비해주셔서 좋아요. 도마뱀이랑 벌레가 가끔 나오는데 주택이라 감안하셔야될것같아요~ 칫솔,치약,샴푸,바디워시는 있는데 린스가 없어요!! 챙겨오세요

This was such a lovely apartment, imperfect for our stay in Da Nang. The apartment was spacious, with fresh linen and towels. The host was very responsive and let us know in advance we could check in early. We loved our stay here and would recommend to anyone visiting the city

전반적으로 만족스러운 숙소입니다.
발코니가 없는 금연타입 숙소로, 우천 시 흡연하시려면 우산 들고 같은 층에 있는 옥상 베란다로 나가셔야합니다.
お部屋はとても温かみがあり、素敵でした。最上階に位置していて、隣のお部屋にはまだ入居者がいないため、とても静かでした。清潔で整然としており、ダナンのハン川の美しい夜景を一望できます。オーナー様も親切で、コミュニケーションもスムーズでした。滞在中はとても快適で、またぜひ利用させていただきたいと思います。

Great host, very responsive and always happy to help! The apartment is spacious with fantastic views and lots of restaurant options on the street and within walking distance. The apartment is clean, has great amenities and we felt right at home! Would recommend to friends and family!

숙소의 경치는 더할나위 없이 좋습니다.
보안도 좋아요. 상시 근무하는 경비원과 카트키를 접촉해야 층수른 누를 수 있습니다.
근처에 식당과 편의점이 있어 생활하기 용이합니다.
한시장, 미케비치, 롯데마트, 고마트, 빈컴플라자 그랩으로 10분내외입니다.
선선한날 아이들과 빈컴플라자까지 도보로 30분이 안됐어요. 가는길에 용다리 스팟도 있어요.😁
Beautiful view and great place to stay. Nearby have Marts and restaurants. Close to dragon bridge.

Great view of Da Nang with the dragon bridge and Han River.
The apartment is brand new. Spacious and clean. Perfect for a family trip.
Good swimming pool however it was too windy and cold during our stay. Could be nice when it's hot.
Two supermarkets downstairs, loads of cafes and restaurants nearby. Super convenient.
Very friendly and responsive host.
In general we had a great time in Da Nang.
It’s a very comforting and amazing place to stay. Great Host, very responsive, the view is great from the apartment.
It is a wonderful apartment with modern furniture and a great river view in a very high floor. I would recommend this place and will stay here again when visiting Da Nang.
I've stayed several times in Khoa's apartments in Hai Chau District. This apartment, like the other ones, is beautiful, with many amenities around. Khoa as always is a top-top host.

펜트하우스답게 조용하고 깨끗하며, 가격대비 정말 고급스러웠습니다. 밤에 한강과 용다리등 전망이 괜챦았는데, 아침에 집 문을 나서 펜트하우스 전용 발코니에서 바라본 한강과 태평양이 동시에 보이는 모습이 정말 환상적이었습니다. 1층엔 K마트, 커피숍, 레스토랑등이 있어 불편함없이 머물수 있었어요. 호스트 " 콰''는 슈퍼호스트답게 질문에 답을 신속하게 해주어서 특히 맘에 들었습니다. 다음에 다낭가면 또 여기 머무를것 같아요.
호스트가 친절해요. 다낭에 갈 기회가 생기면 꼭 다시 여기 올 것입니다.
Beautiful view at night, friendly and communicative hosts.
Our favourite stay in danang. Will definitely come back!

모든것이 완벽했습니다.
믿고 예약하세요^^!
잘 쉬었다 갑니다! 다음에 또 예약할게요.
Appartement idéalement situé, qui offre un confort exceptionnel. Hôte attentionnée et très reactive. À recommander absolument.
좋았습니다
깔끔하고 좋았습니다

Kim and her husband are two lovely people who will make you feel right at home. Wish I could have stayed longer, this was a great place to rest in an off-centered neighbourhood, exactly what you need to balance the crazyness of the beachfront high-rises of Da Nang and has lots of great local street food restaurants around ! 10/10 would recommend

Wonderful hosts. It felt like staying with old friends, except they didn't forget to give you a blanket (an extremely cozy one even). A beautiful modern, smart home with lovely mountain views. The neighborhood is quaint and peaceful with a nice coffee shop a few houses down. Everything is exactly as described in the listing. 10/10 recommend to anyone

Thank you very much for the welcome. I recommend to all other visitors, they are great hosts who will be there to give you the best advice to have a good holiday. The accommodation and the room are super cool the bed is huge! The location is a big + (between beach and mountains and in a nice and quiet neighborhood) I would come back!
Super nice & big house and a super friendly family. Definitely felt like home!
Everything is perfect. The host is also very nice. The kids are fun to play with.
It was a wonderful day. Kim is an excellent host.
Worth the stay.

Great apartments, equiped with a desk and comfortable to work.  Everything sparkling clean. Amazing location. The host speaks english and is super attentive. I checked in a little early and left my lugguage stored for a few hours the day I checked out. Everything was easy and always  great communication with Hoan. Highly recommended.

Everything was just perfect, Hoan was a great host and always contactable for any questions asked, very comfortable apartment with nice kitchen remote lighting and even a remote toilet that was very special, I had a lovely relaxing bath, I have booked Hoang apartment again for another week in Danang…highly .
The airbnb is located in a quiet place and all the essential amenities are provided, including a separate washer. The host was very responsive and helpful. ^^
Good place, nice vibe, smart home functionality
생각보다 좋았던 숙소, 2명이 여행온다면 이보다 더 좋은 선택은 없다고 생각합니다. 자율적인 출입, 그리고 관리인이 상주하고 있어서 불편함없이 잘 쉬다 갑니다.
Very amazing staff, very helpful and can’t wait to choose their spot as the place to stay again!!
it was good for family short stay (1 week). There is not much natural sunlight in the appartment. If you don't mind i recommend.
房间挺大的，唯一的缺点就是主卧床头无法充电
Very quiet space, pool directly in front of the door. Just 5min with scooter to beach.
very good hosting

하루라도 한 시장에 일정을 계획중이시면 꼭 가보세요 돌아다니는 거 생각보다 힘들어요 근데 한국인들이 좋아하는 가게들 어디든 도보로 5분 이내에 있는데 땀나서 잠깐 숨돌리러 언제든 왔다갔다 가능해요 그리고 나가기 귀찮으면 그랩 배달이 너무 잘 돼서 그것 또한 너무 좋구요 5분 거리에 졸리마트도 있는게 너무 좋았어요 한시장 쪽으로  또 방문한다면 여기로 또 예약 할 거예요!

The accommodation is clean and sufficient for the two of us. The host is very friendly and replies to messages very quickly. The place is only about 100 meters from Han Market, so it's very easy to walk there. The staff is also very friendly; they were very supportive and helpful during check-in
Chỗ ở gần trung tâm thành phố nên tiện đi lại, phòng mới và rất sạch sẽ, chủ căn hộ và nhân viên thân thiện lắm ạ

콩카페 에서 1분 한시장2분
위치좋고 가격저렴하고
딱입니다
엘베없는거는 감수해야지만
직원이 들어줍니다

숙소가 시내와 가까워서 좋다
한시장 Han river 다낭성당 등 교통도 편리해서 택시가 잘잡힌다
호스트와 연락이 매우 잘된다
매우친절하고 아주빠른 wifi가 있다.
Good location. Small room but nice. Need to clean the smell of toilet to be perfect.

Hai Quyen’s Airbnb is an excellent choice for exploring all that Da Nang has to offer. The location is unbeatable—just half a block from the market, 500 meters from the iconic pink church and close to the Dragon Bridge, and surrounded by plenty of delicious food options.
The place is spotlessly clean, and the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. While there are no windows or lift in the building, this is clearly mentioned in the listing and did not detract from the overall experience.
For the price and location, you truly can’t find a better deal. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Da Nang!

창문이 없어서 먼지가 많았다.
직원들은 친절했다.
Great place to stay

한시장 가까운 위치, 에어컨 잘나오고 침구류도 쾌적함. 화장실도 깔끔.
방음은 조금 안되지만 불편하진 않았다.
It's our best place we stayed in Vietnam. Every floor has its own bathroom and toilet. Beautiful interiors. Stairs can be problem for older people. But overall, we love to stay here.

Easily one of the best stay during my trip in Vietnam. Very worth it for the prices, we got a whole 4 storey house with kitchen and 3 big bedrooms. The place is very clean and aesthetic even better than hotels, they also has free water and amenities like toothbrush, soap etc. The room also has projector with connected smart TV. Location is also very near airport. Highly recommended to stay in Da Nang!

앞으로 3인 이상 다낭에 올 일이 생긴다면,
무조건 이 숙소에서 머물 겁니다.
호텔이 아니라 '머물고 싶은 집'이라는 말이 딱 맞았습니다.
넉넉한 공간, 완벽한 청결, 그리고 무엇보다도
주인분의 세심한 배려 하나하나가
여행의 피로를 녹여줬습니다.
숙소 위치도 조용하면서 중심지와 가까워
이동이 편리했고, 근처에 맛집과 카페, 마트까지
모든 게 갖춰져 있어 정말 불편함이 없었습니다.
함께 간 친구들 모두 '다음에 또 여기 오자'며
숙소 얘기만 한참 했습니다.
진심으로 감사드리며, 다시 만날 날을 기다리겠습니다.🌿
地理位置很不错，旁边还有一个集市，距离便利店也很近，如果住的时间比较长，还可以在厨房做简单的烹煮，不过浴室的喷头与马桶的距离略近，洗完澡后马桶上就会有水，除此之外，一切都很完美。

Nous avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour chez l’hôte. Tout était parfait et impeccable que ce soit au niveau de la maison et de la communication avec l’hôte.
Les chambres sont parfaites et très propres. L’emplacement est idéale !
Je vous recommande vivement. Nous reviendrons très si nous serons des passages à Da Nang !
Merci pour tout, c’était inoubliable !

동화 속에 나올 듯한 그림같은 집에서 너무나도 멋진 하루를 보냈습니다. 창문을 열면 보이는 바람에 살랑이는 나무와 다낭의 스트릿풍경이 잊혀지지않아요. 🥹기억에 오래도록 남을 것 같아요. ♥️함께한 친구들도 너무 좋아했어요. 저는 다음번에는 가족과 함께 방문하려구요. 많은 방과 침대, 프라이빗한 개인룸들이 너무 좋았어요! 깨긋하고 넓은 공용주방까지 최고였어요 🙂 다시 돌아가고싶네요. 덕분에 친구들과 멋진 추억 남겼습니다. 감사합니다
love the interior design and the stay very comfortable, multi story building and great!
It’s one of the cutest and most cozy airbnb I have been in - we love our rooms and the projector
Good location convenient to many places we wanted to visit in DaNang. Host communicated promptly to our needs

很好的民宿！在岘港住得最好的一家！地理位置很靠近机场，车程几分钟就到，附近还有一些吃饭和喝咖啡的地方。
民宿是法式装修风格，很精致，看得出房东很用心而去审美很到位！
这个价格下来，真的性价比很高，下次来还回继续选择住这里！
ที่พักเหมาะสมกับชาวแก้งค์ ทำอาหารได้สะดวก มาก ตรงปกสุด เหมือนบ้านในpinterest
Amazing place. Felt like home.

“Exceptional Stay at Da Nang Camellia Home!”
We had a truly wonderful experience staying at Da Nang Camellia Home! The property is beautifully furnished with three spacious bedrooms, each with its own attached washroom, ensuring plenty of privacy and convenience for our big family. The home was equipped with everything we needed, and the internet connectivity was excellent throughout, which was a big plus for everyone.
What made this stay extra special was the incredible hospitality of the host. They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, even arranging to pick up our large family upon arrival, which was such a thoughtful gesture. Their care and attention to detail made us feel right at home, and they were always available to assist with any questions or requests.
The location was also ideal — peaceful yet close to all the key attractions in Da Nang. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience. 5⭐️

We stayed at this 4-story house for nearly a week, and everything exceeded our expectations. The house features 3 bedrooms, 5 beds, 3 bathrooms, 1 restroom, and a beautiful kitchen and dining area that looks even better than the pictures.
The house is cozy and thoughtfully designed in a modern Euro-American style, offering all the necessary amenities you could think of. The attic room, designed for children, has bunk beds and a bit of noise from the water pump, but all the other conveniences made our stay so comfortable that any minor inconvenience was quickly forgotten.
The location is central, making it easy to get around, and it’s near the airport without any noise disturbance from airplanes. Every detail of the house is meticulously decorated, from the dishes and glasses to the flower vases—it’s as beautiful as a painting.
The host was incredibly supportive and attentive throughout our stay. If I could, I would give her 10 stars! Highly recommended for the family or group.

This cozy place provides a comfortable stay for a while. It’s conveniently located near cafes and local food spots, making it easily accessible to the beach. I had a great night’s sleep thanks to the great air conditioner. Thankfully , there’s no karaoke or bike vendors around. The owners are super friendly.

Căn phòng vô cùng rộng rãi thoải mái, view cửa kính ngồi chill rất thích, giường ngủ được đầu tư nệm cao su cực kỳ êm ái, khu vực phòng bếp và phòng khách sử dụng chung và đầy đủ mọi tiện ích. Chủ nhà thiết kế rất tinh tế từng chi tiết nhỏ và thân thiện với khách. Highly recommended.

One of the best Airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in – it truly felt like home! The place was spotless, just a short walk to the beach, and surrounded by great restaurants, coffee shops, a pharmacy, and a grocery store. No issues at all finding the location on Grab. Would definitely love to come back. Thanks so much!

One of my favorite stays. The room is soooo spacious and clean. The area is nice and the parking out front for the motorbike was very convenient. Will definitely book again if I'm in the area. Also allowed me to check in earlier which was so kind of them.

Cannot recommend this place enough! Super friendly family running it, they are responsive and helpful. Under 10 min walk to the beach, tons of restaurants and cafes nearby, and several convenience stores and a grocery store within a stone's throw. Lots of other tourists in the area, but a very laidback vibe in the neighborhood. The room is big, the bed is big and super comfy, free Netflix on TV, cold AC, a standing fan, hot water, and a full kitchen downstairs (even has a proper oven, I made pizza!) Always super easy to get a Grab bike. It's a quiet house with a free laundry machine on the roof (air dry) and weekly cleaning. I would absolutely stay here again next time I'm in Danang! Xin cam on!

It's a great stay for a while or  for a long time. The kitchen is big, also as the room. Inside you'll find everything you need. The place is calm and peaceful. If you'll have a bike, it's easy to get any other districts in 5-10 minutes

Wow, what a lovely place to stay and an amazing host. So helpful and genuinely warm family. It is a perfect location, a little away from the busy areas but a nice walk along the beach if you want to be closer to the action. Host family take so much pride in their home and their hospitality was lovely.

Our favorite AirBnb in 3 years of travelling.
Host 10/10
Bed 10/10
Wifi 10/10
Kitchen 10/10
Location 10/10
Checkin & out 10/10
We will be so happy to return.
Thanks for hosting us. 🫶

An excellent stay with everything that you would want. The host is super helpful and ensures that the guest faces literally zero problems while checking-in, staying and checking-out. I highly recommend this Homestay, it is near to the beach and right at the heart of the city. Peaceful surroundings (if you like to sleep peacefully), very close to almost all the attractions. The room was super clean and had all the mentioned amenities.

The team were very friendly and proactive with messaging. We were allowed to leave our luggage and use the toilet even after checkout. The room was perfectly clean and both the room and bathroom were very spacious. The shower water pressure was fantastic as well. Particularly enjoyed the electrical fly swat to catch some pesky mosquitoes that had made it past the mosquito nets. Overall I would recommend this place and we were sad to leave.
Lovely hosts who are welcoming and always around to help. The area is quiet compared to the city area but is close enough to get to places. Will come back if I visit Danang!

great place to stay. Nguyen is a great host and will help you with everything. he helped us renting a scooter and even gave advise on the places to visit. the room is very big with a nice bathroom. wifi was very good as well.

Great place! Clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very attentive and responded quickly to all questions. The location is convenient. Lots of cafes and shops nearby. I’ll definitely return if I’m in the city again. Highly recommend!

We enjoyed our stay here. The host was really helpful throughout the stay, from helping us with any issues and also giving us local recommendations☺️ The area is quiet and u can find some food nearby but we mostly went further from this area. Overall would recommend staying here as all amenities are provided and host is friendly.
离海边很近，房东很热情。
这是一家非常棒的民宿，房间很大、整洁干净，房东也很好。可以在楼顶天台坐一坐喝点酒，我们在那里喝了酒跨年。

A fantastic homestay in a peaceful neighborhood, where has loads of delicious restaurants as well as tasteful Vietnam Cafe☕️ Few mins walk to the famous My Khe Beach🏖️A super host family, highly recommend👍

Đúng là một món hời với giá phòng này. Rất thoải mái với phòng khách và bếp rộng rãi sạch sẽ. Nước mạnh cũng là một ưu điểm đối với mình. Chủ nhà rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình, đặc biệt đề xuất cho ai có kỳ nghỉ dài ngày tại DN.
Ciao so cute. Không gian ấm cúng, sạch sẽ, tiện nghi. Anh chủ nhà nhiệt tình,thân thiện, chu đáo quá  chừng. Recommend siêu nhiều chỗ ăn ngon.  Cảm ơn Ciao thiệt nhiều ❤️
Meine Mutter und ich haben uns wohl gefühlt. Die Gastgeber waren sehr hilfsbereit und es fanden nette Unterhaltungen statt. Danke für die Restaurant- und Café-Empfehlungen!

I had an excellent stay at Ciao Homestay in Danang! The family hosting this homestay is incredibly welcoming and goes above and beyond to make your visit unforgettable. The room was spacious, and the kitchen was well-equipped with utensils and a fridge, which was very convenient. The location is perfect—close to shops and just a short walk to the beach.
The biggest highlight, however, was the communication and genuine kindness of the owners. They truly made me feel at home and ensured that everything I needed was taken care of. I would highly recommend Ciao Homestay to anyone visiting Danang!
Everything was great, the location is very near to the beach, good environment, I recommend it 100%
Ciao homestay is located in a very peaceful street with almost everything available nearby. The host was very responsive and helpful.
Alt var super godt, og værten var virkelig sød!

Host is friendly and speaks English. Wifi worked ok.  Bed was firm but comfortable.  The doors could be a little tricky but the host said she would improve that.  That was the only negative we could find overall it’s a great 5 star condo.  Walkable to beach and 2 different very nice coffee shops.

My stay here was absolutely fantastic! The space was spotless, cozy, and had everything I needed. What really made the difference was the host — super kind, quick to respond, and went out of their way to help whenever I had a question. It made the whole trip feel easy and stress-free. Would definitely stay again!
I loved the apartment, very cozy and wide, and the neighborhood is really calm. There is even a washing machine. I wished I could stay more, I would definitely come back there :))

It was such a great experience renting this apartment from Linh and her brother Van! We were personally met at arrival and he showed us the apartment and explained everything! There is everything you need in the apartment!
They gave us amazing recommendations about sightseeings, restaurants and bike rental! They were very helpful and kind!
Thank you so much, we are definitely coming back someday!

The apartment is spacious for a one bedroom. The mattress is firm if that’s what you prefer. Location is just a few streets over from the beach. About 20-25 minute walk to the main DaNang beach. Plenty of local places to eat on the main road. Not quiet, there is a boxing studio downstairs, but it is one of the most quiet places we’ve had in Vietnam. The host communicates very well, even brought me a dessert for international women’s day.
Very neat and hygienic room. All amenities were provided. Very helpful host. Overall a very good experience
Linh war ein super host. Wir haben es dort geliebt. Er war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. die Unterkunft ist sauber und bietet viel Platz. wir empfehlen diese Unterkunft.

Very nice apartment for the money spent. Excellent air conditioning.
Location ok.
We are happy for having chosen this apartment.

Great place to stay, has everything you need for a stay.
Host was great, always responsive and very helpful.
Enjoyed my stay at this place and can only recommend it!!!
Great place in Danang, simple but with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. Helpful, friendly and responsive host.
Clean and cozy room away from the busy and noisy Danang. The room is quiet despite local renovations. Lihn is very responsive and proactive. A good value stay overall

A very nice and peaceful spot. As well as spacious.
I had a great two weeks here and slept very well.
Would stay again! :)

We really enjoyed our time in Da Nang at Linh's. The apartment is as described and matches the pictures.  We appreciated having a kitchen with clean dishes and nice appliances like a rice cooker, electric stove and large fridge with a freezer. Also there's a clothes washing machine in the bathroom. Linh was very accommodating, arranged furniture in the apartment before our arrival and helped us rent a motorbike. Location is on the southern end of the city not far either the riverfront or beach. It is a quieter part of town, but there are still plenty of restaurants within walking distance and a 24hr convenience store on the same block. You will be in good hands if you stay here the hosts are incredibly responsive and friendly. Glad we got to stay somewhere so nice for a month!

В комнате есть запах сырости, но в целом комната очень хорошая, просторная и светлая. В квартире есть все необходимое. Улица очень тихая. Мне очень понравилось что хозяева отзывчивые, быстро решают любые вопросы и всячески пытаются помочь.

It was the third apartment we have tried in Baliza Home!
Great apartment! It has everything you need. I liked the kitchen and amenities – even a microwave oven – which is a great plus!
I also liked that the bathroom had a separate place for the shower – so you don't take a shower near the toilet and have water everywhere in the floor.
The bed was huge!
The window doesn't look at the wall.
So, I definitely recommend it!

Linh and Binh were amazing hosts. The house is new and gives off a luxurious feeling. The high ceilings and the wooden floors and ceiling add a very warm and stylish touch. There's also a small but lovely balcony, perfect for enjoying a morning coffee.
Linh and Binh are very attentive and professional. They helped me rent a motorbike and even shared super useful lists of places to visit via WP. I can also say they are kind and respectful people.
The house is located in a developing, quiet, and safe neighborhood. As far as I know, many digital nomads and tourists stay around here. It's not super close to the beach, but I walked there a few times with no problem. Grab rides are quick and convenient anyway. Plus, being in the center of the island means you're equally close to many different spots.
I was really happy with both the place and the hosts. Highly recommended!
Lovely welcome, and they did everything to make sure my stay went smoothly. Area is quiet and I would definitely come back here if I was in Da Nang again

Absolutely loved the place! the host and the co-host made my stay very special, they were super friendly and helpful. the apartment is definitely worth the price. Felt at home right away.  would love to come back. thank you!

Die Kommunikation zwischeneinander war sehr gut und auch gastfreundlich, die Unterkunft ist such wie beschrieben und alles ist schön sauber. Wir mussten unsere Koffer wiegen und hab die Gastgeber nach einer Wage gefragt und diese waren sehr freundlich uns eine zu besorgen. Ich empfehle ihnen den Aufenthalt hier.

I have stayed in this host's house many times, the host is always very hospitable, quick to respond, and enthusiastic support. In addition, these houses are always neat and clean. One of the most enthusiastic hosts in Da Nang 😊

Absolutely fantastic stay. All of the hosts are very friendly and welcoming. The apartment was exactly as shown on the photos. They went out of their way to make sure we had a comfortable stay and we loved it very much. 10/10 we will be back to stay again 🙏❤️

good wifi
clean
mattress hard
very good the price
주변 상권은 좋지 않지만 그것 빼곤 가격대비 만족스러웠습니다. 호스트도 친절했고 방도 넓고 쾌적했어요!

j'ai vraiment appréciée mon séjour !
Super confortable et agréable! si vous voulez une petite bulle de tranquillité après les activités c'est le bonne endroit. le rapport qualité prix est top! 👌
Les hôtes sont vraiment à l'écoute et adorable ! 🙏
Chổ ở sạch sẽ, việc di chuyển xuống bãi biển rất là nhanh chóng

beautiful place to stay if you love to swim in the sea. very near to the beach. they also have a swimming pool in addition to it. many local food options are there. All the receptionist are friendly and helpful.  they have cheap taxi facilities to nearby cities as well. love this place.

Хорошее место, но немного вдали от центра. Приготовьтесь к тому что надо будет идти пешком до хороших кафе или ехать на такси или арендовать мопед (это можно сделать на ресепшене). На улице немного шумновато, по началу нас будили звуки с улицы по утрам, но потом привыкаешь. Внутри немного уставшая квартира, желательно скоро уже сделать ремонт.
Had a great stay! Definitely will come and book with you again. Thank you for the great hospitality! The room was super cozy and comfortable especially after a long day strolling around Da Nang.

Apartment was opposite the beach, but basically nothing else around. Quite far out of the main area.
No sun lounges on this end of the beach.
On either side of the apartment are vacant blocks filled with trash.
The host was great at responding to messages.
