Had an amazing stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and well-located. It truly felt like home—loved every bit of it! The lady at the reception (Maria) was kind and hospitable, making the experience even better. Highly recommend!

We had a truly wonderful stay at Mercury House in Da Nang from 8th to 11th June. Located right opposite the beautiful My Khe Beach, the property is a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and warm hospitality.
The rooms were clean. Waking up and stepping out to the beach just across the road was an absolute delight. The location is ideal—not just for beach lovers, but also for those wanting easy access to restaurants, cafes, and local attractions.
A special shoutout to Julie, our host, who made our stay even more memorable. Her attention to detail, friendly nature, and prompt assistance truly set Mercury House apart.
She went above and beyond to ensure we felt at home and had everything we needed.
Our stay at Mercury beach house was great! very close to the beach and the host’s recommendations including chickpea eatery was great :) Would recommend for a short stay in Da Nang
Everything was fine, unfortunately there was a very strong wind in the night I stayed at the apartment, so we were literally could not sleep at all because of the noise from creaking windows.
Everything was Perfect. The one Double  bedroom have a nice view. very clean and nice only one thing the power from the shower is very low but all the Rest was Perfect thank you
It was great staying at the place. The place had sea view which was really beautiful. We could reach to many places too.
Thanks for having us at your place. Appreciate how responsiveness the host was. I felt taken care of.
Great service, super clean! I was impressed at how clean everything was:, which is the most important thing to me. The staff was very responsive and always offered help when needed. Highly recommend!

Host was able to provide early check in which we were highly grateful for. The room was spacious, comfortable bed with soft bed linen, apartment was very clean. Host provides washing service too. Friendly staff who provided local recommendations. A few steps away from the beach and driving distance to local restaurants/shops etc!
Had a lovely stay. Room was clean. The receptionist were nice too. 100% worth the price
Good looking airbnb and Walking distance to the beach , 10/10 recommend
Great place to stay, the hosts were helpful, even helping us in our trip by booking tickets and cabs!
Perfect location for perfect price. Right next to the beach and facing the Son Tra mountains!

I'm torn with this response. This was a decent place - staff, location, area...We were far from the main strip where all the tourists were which is great if you want decent prices. However, sometimes you just miss the action. The scene was great, as far as the hotel itself, everything was much smaller than expected. There was a scent of mildew that came from the bathroom but if you left all the windows open throughout the day, you wouldn't have to worry about it. The beds were comfortable but took up most the space in the rooms so there was little to no room to walk around without having to jump over a bed. Walls are paper thin. The dogs outside were barking all throughout the night. The hotel barely cancels any noise but that being said, I got sound sleep. Some way, somehow.
Would I stay here again?? I don't know, maybe another room? I'm not against it because I could laugh and joke about it. The locals were cool...but I'm not jumping up to volunteer to stay here again.
本当に優しい方たちで、私たちはとても嬉しかった。初めてのベトナム旅行でしたが、チェックイン後もとても親切に旅を一緒にしてくださって、案内してくださり楽しませてくれました。また私たちへのサービスもありました。本当にありがとうございました。
We had a great stay at Mercury Beach House. The staffs were very accommodating. They allowed us to check-in earlier. Sadly, the pool was under maintenance. But overall, we had a great time!

It was the perfect stay. The place was very nice. The staff was so helpful and friendly. They had scooters for us to rent, they let us check out a little late and were so accommodating. Highly recommend

EVERYONE @MercuryBeach was amazing!! They offered us car service from the airport which was very affordable.
Our driver was very sweet and we did use him our first few days there. We decided that Grab was price right for what we were doing.
The hotel staff were probably some of the sweetest girls & young men I’ve ever encountered. They were very attentive to anything we needed.
The hotel is off the beaten path were most of the tourists are , which was very nice . We will definitely be coming back here every time we visit Da Nang!!

Отличная квартира, одна из лучших которую я снимал за время пребывания во Вьетнаме. Квартира небольшая, но уютная и чистая. Есть всё необходимое из посуды и бытовых приборов. Находится в пару минутах от пляжа. Бассейн хоть и маленький, но отлично подходит освежиться после жары. Персонал очень вежливый и отзывчивый. Всем рекомендую.
Phòng ở sạch sẽ , chủ nhà thân thiện, vị trí thuận tiện cho đi lại , 10₫ không có nhưng, lần sau ghé Đà Nẵng nhất định sẽ book lại !

This place is absolutely stunning. It’s very clean, new and spacious. Plus it’s very reasonably priced. For such a superior quality it could have been double the price and I would still stay. The host is very responsive and accommodative to our requests too. One of the best places I have stayed!

Good location, within walking distance of many good eateries and things to do. Only down side is the building work happening next door & karaoke (but this is not the fault of the owner). Also, traffic noise is very loud, for those who sleep lightly, this may not be the best choice.
The property is at a beautiful location and is furnished tastefully. The host was responsive and very helpful. The jacuzzi overlooking the river front was a fantastic feature!
The place was at good location. Nearby to everything. It was gorgeous and comfortable to live in. The host was very responsive and helped with everything I needed. Recommend !!!
Great place central to everything. We will be returning sometime en the future. Thank you!
편하게 머물다 가요. 궁금한게 있을 때 호스트님이 친절하고 빠르게 답변 주셔서 좋았습니다!
Highly recommend this property. City centre. River view and everything is amazing

Check-in was smooth, but serious issues followed. The bathroom flooded constantly, then all water stopped. When it returned, it was gray and dirty. I contacted the host, who admitted water issues had happened before — yet still listed the unit. I requested a refund or early checkout; he refused both, then offered an “upgrade” only after I made other plans. He then came to my door unannounced and persistently knocked despite me clearly saying I was unavailable — a major privacy violation.
I contacted Airbnb, and they agreed the situation was unacceptable, granting me early checkout and a 30% refund. Even then, the host sent messages and a cleaner before I had fully checked out. While the unit has potential, the handling of this situation was deeply unprofessional.
I strongly advise avoiding this unit — and any others run by this host.

Conveniently located home away from home, lively atmosphere, great amenities, relaxing hot tub, clean and responsive host that is caring and concerning. Take care of this place it’s a great find within the heart of the beautiful city of Da Nang you won’t be disappointed!! 💫
Phu is a very responsive and honest host!!
얼리 체크인도 해주고 체크인이 너무 편해요
Really good location, good and clean apartment, the host very friendly and helpful
The unit was very clean and the hosts were so friebdly and helpful. Was located along the river which had many restaurants and things to do. Would definitely book again.
Great Experience!!

Great place to stay! Theres the Vincom mall thats only 5 minute walk away! Its peaceful and secure!
Highly recommend for anyone staying in Da Nang!
اقامة رائعة قريبة من الجسر
مكان جميل ويستحق

I really liked it!  Excellent location and beautiful view from the window.  And a jacuzzi is a great idea!  The apartment is quiet, there is no unnecessary noise from the road at night.  There are no mosquitoes or insects.  Cozy apartments and a good owner who is always in touch.  There is a coffee shop on the 1st floor in the morning.  Thank you.

Absolutely lovee the place! I wish i can stay here longer, the place is much more spacious in real life. I felt safe as a female solo traveler walking around the neighborhood.
You can always use grab to go anywhere further. You also can walk across the street and enjoy the beautiful city view at night! Alr miss this place, 10/10 recommend, definitely will come again 😻

Phu’s Apartment is absolutely beautiful and fantastic! At no other Location on our Vietnam Trip we felt so much like Home. The Apartment has a lot of Space, a really good bed and a perfect view on the River. You can walk easy to all good spots in town.
The Café at the groundfloor of Phus House is so lovely.
Phu was such a great host. Helped us so much and was always so friendly and answering very fast. Anytime again ❤️
Such a nice option in da Nang!
Good place,  clean.  Responsible  host . I recommend
Nice place. Clean and comfortable.

It was good for the price. Its just a very old hotel that comes with its issues like a leaking airco or a moldy smell. But the staff was very helpful and friendly. They cleaned when asked and it was a good location.

good place near beach, room and place was nice. not as clean as expected but still good. the power outlets wouldn't let you plug things in, but i found an outlet behind the mini fridge that worked, so that was a bit of a pain.
Wonderful and happy family. Always there for your needs. I had a great time staying there. Look forward to visiting again someday.
The AC is little bit slow but the location and price is quite good
Perfectly adequate
Very nice and friendly
非常好，非常满意！！！！

Kind front desk and friendly staff.
The room I stayed in was very sunny, and there were no issues with the air conditioning, Wi-Fi, or shower.
Thank you very much.
Blisko plaży, blisko centrum. Polecam
Great people. Lots of things to do close by.
Great location and wonderful family management.
Staff is super friendly and helpful

Great hotel, within walking distance to the beach, loads of restaurants and bike hire places (and could park the bike right outside). The staff were so friendly, we tried to order food and did it wrong so the receptionist called the restaurant and sorted it all out for us on her own phone. We got a massage as well which was cheap and really good! Clean rooms, comfy beds, big hot showers and good view from the higher floors.
It was a short but good stay.

We had a great stay at this place. The location was super convenient—just a short walk to a nearby convenience store and easy access to the riverside. The room was clean, spacious, and definitely worth the price. Although we didn’t get the chance to check out the pool upstairs, everything else met our expectations. Juno was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay. Would definitely recommend!

If you are looking for a place to stay that’s still near the go to places then stay here! Its more peaceful and quiet definitely you can have your much deserved rest after the long day in Da Nang. Juno was an amazing host! Very warm and hospitable he even welcomed us personally upon arrival and was present on our departure too. The price you pay is super worth it in his place. Two thumbs up! Thank you Juno!
在非常安静的街区，床，枕头和被子非常舒服。离海边和河边都不远。Juno也很热情，帮我们预定了spa。非常好的体验！
Juno was very responsive, giving helpful instructions and recommendations. Also very understanding and communicative. Highly recommend!
Juno ist sehr lieb, zuvorkommend und hilfsbereit. Die Wohnung und der Aufenthalt waren sehr schön.. Fenster aufmachen empfohlen, da es in Meeresnähe schnell feucht wird im Zimmer.

Junos place is cozy and in a good location with lots of Vietnamese and Korean food around. It is around 20 minutes walk to the beach and five minutes walk to the big mall.
The room has a good size and two big beds. There is a fridge and a kettle and a little desk. The room is quite bright and has a lot of windows, but the curtains are also good to block the light at night.
General issue in Da Nang seems to be the moist in the rooms, so this is not a special thing in this room, but you want to open the windows as much as you can. By doing this airflow in this room is easy, as it has windows on two sides.
I recommend this apartment for your stay.

All good, exactly what is described.
Juno is a great host 🙂
Thanks for everything!
Great host,  great place and nice location. Super close to Vincom Plaza and  quick scooter ride to the beach.
I'll definitely return if I visit Danang again. Juno's place is clean and located in a peaceful area. It was the best accommodation out of the 7 nights I spent in Danang 💯

호스트가 매우 친절 합니다
숙박하는 동안 너무 편하게 지냈고
숙소는 매우 깔끔했습니다
베트남숙소는 대부분 수질이 안좋은데
저는 따로 샤워 필터를 사용했는데 샤워 필터도
매우 깔끔하고 수질이 좋았어요
한국인들이 매우 좋아할거같아요
가격에 비해 숙소도 엄청 깔끔하고 좋고 위치도 정말 좋았습니다 ㅎㅎ
First time to Vietnam. Nice host and local people, cheap and yummy food! Great accommodation by Juno, recommended for staying with a responsive host
Super clean and enjoyed my stayed
Rất hài lòng về chỗ ở. Sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè.

The place is nice and close to city, lots of cafes, restaurants, and pubs nearby. The room is clean and spacious, easily fit 3 of us. Juno was very friendly and nice and help us with lots of things. Highly recommended!

Very spacious place with lots of naturally lighting. Unit was clean and interaction with Juno was really easy. He even helped us get two motorbikes for a bit of touring. Lots of food and massage options. It's about a 15min walk to the beach but because of this it was nice and quiet.

Cannot recommend staying here enough! Juno was very accommodating as we needed a fairly early check in and a later check out and this was not a problem!! The room was spotless with very comfortable beds and a lovely shower!! Thankyou again Juno!

We had a pleasant stay at Astro House! It was neat and cozy. Juno was a great and super responsive host. He provided a lot of food and place recommendations that came in handy. His doggo was a joy to have around too. Highly recommend to anyone who plans to visit danang!
gooood
일주일동안 너무나 편하게 잘 지내다 갑니다. 주변은 매우 조용하고 코리아타운이 도보로 이동이 가능해서 한식,마사지,카페등 편하게 이용했습니다. 그외 한시장 빈컴마트등 택시로도 매우 가까워서 좋아요. 호스트 역시 매우 친절하며 요청사항에 따른 피드백도 빠릅니다. 그리고 범이는 너무 순하고 귀여워요. 다시 다낭을 찾게 된다면 또 다시 머무를 계획 입니다.

지리적으로 좋은위치
사진과 동일한 넓은 실내와 침대
친절하고 밝은 호스트
가장 좋은점은 뛰어난 가성비
지인께 꼭 추천하고 싶은 숙소입니다

Me and my gf had a wonderful time at Juno’s place. The building itself has beautiful architecture, a nice rooftop to relax on, nice walkable neighborhood and a cute cafe across the street. We stayed for an entire month and it felt just like home the entire time. Bum Junos talk was so sweet and greeted us each day when we arrived home. Everything was clean and looked just like the photos, we had lots of space and room for all our things. A big desk for me to work on my laptop as well.
In Vietnam people often like to honk at night crossing even small street instersections so sometimes this would wake you if you are a light sleeper. Other than that this is a very quiet and friendly and super safe neighborhood. This is away from the Main big Street on a side street so that’s good. I’d definitely recommend staying. It’s a beautiful place, feels very secure. Had a place to park our scooter out front as well.

My 3-night stay with Juno was an enjoyable one, merely because it showed me an interesting side of Danang I have never seen before. That particular room ambience felt very bright and positive despite the buzzing of motor scooters is very present. The bathroom shower situation in this room is a bit tricky. You would have to use his shower slippers provided to shower first, then ideally open the windows to let the floor get dry first (90 min) if you prefer to reenter the bathroom in a dry state. If you’re showering first, and need to go in again immediately after (like me), it’s a good idea to keep the shower slippers adjacent to the bathroom door. The pool is sadly neglected (not clean for proper use), which didn’t stop me from enjoying the view and ambiance from his cute rooftop. Many reviews only mentioned Juno and Bom, but there are more interesting family members to encounter, in fact, there is one that looks almost identical as Juno :-)

Our late night flight arrived at Danang at around 1 AM. Juno had sent some very useful instructions which helped us find the place easily.
The room was good - clean & with all necessary amenities. Since I stayed for only 1 night, didn’t get a chance to explore the neighbourhood.
Special shoutout to Juno for being the best AirBNB host I’ve come across :)
Although we reached so late in the night, he stayed awake and received us in person.
I was travelling with my grandmom - Juno very considerately reallocated our room from the 3rd to the 1st floor so she didn’t have to climb a lot of stairs ( and I didn’t even request him to do this! )
We had quite some luggage - he helped us in moving it to the 1st floor.
Although my visit was short, I can totally vouch for Juno - an incredibly kind and warm host ♥️

Dành một đêm ở tại Đà Nẵng mà chúng mình rất hài lòng khi chọn home của chị Quyên. Căn nhà nằm ở cuối hẻm dễ tìm.
Khi đến nơi, có con trai của chị chủ rất thông minh và tận tình hướng dẫn chúng mình cách check in, nhận phòng, giới thiệu cả quán ăn của chị chủ và còn giúp đỡ chúng mình mang vali lên phòng nữa.
Phòng rất xinh, ấm cúng, sạch sẽ nên chúng mình có một giấc ngủ siêu ngon kiki chị chủ còn rất tốt bụng nữa ạ.

Gia đình chủ home rất nice, nhiệt tình và luôn tạo điều kiện tốt cho khách. Phòng nghỉ dù không to nhưng rất đẹp, rất wao, nhất là khi có ánh nắng chiếu vào. Điểm trừ duy nhất là đệm hơi bị lún, chắc do mình nằm không quen nên bị đau lưng 🥹
Xung quanh là 1 hẻm yên tĩnh,home có ban công siêu chill và có 1 cái sân thượng rộng nữa. Để có 1 nơi nghỉ ngơi sau những chuyến đi dài hợ thì đây hoàn toàn là sự lựa chọn chỗ nghỉ chân hợp lí
Homestay nằm trong hẻm 37 Lương Thế Vinh , hai vợ chồng chị chủ thân thiện , phòng nhỏ xinh đủ dùng , có máy giặt dùng chung , có bếp dùng chung .
1 căn homestay nhỏ xinh giữa thành phố khá tiện nghi , gần các địa điểm ăn uống mua sắm nên ko lo đi xa để mua đồ . Chị chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình và rep ib nhanh
phù hợp trong tầm giá, phòng không phải siêu sạch nhưng đủ sạch để ở, khá gần các chỗ ăn chơi nên di chuyển cũng tiện, có bếp khá rộng và ban công xinh xinh

This is a nice stay in Da Nang! Quyên and her husband welcomed me in and recommended me a lovely restaurant to go to. The room and home is lovely - located in a peaceful neighborhood. I would absolutely recommend this stay :)
Chỗ nghỉ yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ, chủ nhà thân thiện, vui vẻ
giường êm, sạch
I had a very nice stay in Felix's home! It's a very quiet area, and a lot of things are within walkable distance. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a more authentic and peaceful experience.
The location is perfect although you have to walk into an alleyway. Most markets are accessible from the location and it is surrounded by nice spas which is a plus point!

Le logement est très bien placé et le rapport qualité prix est excellent. Nous avons seulement été un peu déçus parce que la salle de bain ne sentait pas bon donc nous avons laissé la fenêtre ouverte et elle n’étaye pas très propre (cheveux sur la cuvette). Sinon nous ne sommes pas loin de la plage c’est idéal.

Great place to stay in Da Nang! Only stayed one night but it was perfect for our needs. Great location, close enough to walk to the beach, lots of restaurants around. The place was clean and easy to check into. Would recommend!
주인분께 연락하면 답 빨리 해주시고 친절하십니다. 주인분이 하시는 식당 있는데 싸고 맛있어요

숙소도 저렴하고 깨끗하고 방에서 냄새도 안났습니다. 사장님이 정말 친절합니다
좋은 여성입니다.
다음에도 이용할게요

호스트는 굉장히 친절하며, 늦은시간 체크인임에도 불구하고 실시간 소통해주고 조치해주었습니다
위치와 청결도도 만족했습니다
테라스는 가벼운 휴식을 취하며 베트남 감성을 느끼기에
충분합니다

Quyen was an amazing host. Everything was most than exceptional. As for the stay everything was as described and location is optimal for anyone that wants to be close to the beach or just to casually walk around and venture the city

Our stay at this homestay was great. It's located on a calm street, yet it’s still just a short walk or quick Grab ride to the beach. The bed was very comfortable, which was a rare find during our trip. It truly felt like home – clean, cozy, and with a lovely room setting that made us feel relaxed from the moment we arrived. Hot water was available to shower.
The host was very responsive. For the price, this homestay offered amazing value. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable, homey, and convenient place to stay.

I was back before leaving in this trip to Da Nang and I will probably be back in the following ones. There’s not many places that clean and neat around. Also the kitchen has loads of equipment so you can cook a nice meal! Thanks again, see you soon!
Quyen’s place was excellent for the short term stay and behind reasonable for the price. The room was exactly as pictured, the AC and washer worked well, and communication was smooth. Recommended.

Die Stadt ist deutlich größer als wir ursprünglich gedacht hätten, zu Fuß dauert es deshalb schon seine Zeit um zu Hotspots oder zum Strand zu gelangen, aber mit dem Moped ist es ganz bequem. Quyên ist super zuvorkommend gewesen und hat uns sehr geholfen! Große Empfehlung :)

Sehr freundliche Gastgeberin, gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis und ruhige Lage.  Leider hat es aber geschimmelt und dementsprechend gerochen. Sobald das behoben ist, würden wir die Unterkunft aber weiterempfehlen :)

The host was very pleasant and the room was clean. It is a good deal for the money paid. It is at the end of a rather long, narrow alley and there is no way to be dropped off at the door with luggage. I suggested having two positions to hang the bathroom mirror as it is far too low for an adult male North American. Working around the door in the bathroom is a bit of a nuisance, but considering how little I paid, I just accepted it.
Phòng xinh, sạch sẽ lắm. Host rất dễ thương, nhiệt tình nữa
vị trí, giá cả, phòng và nhân viên rất ok. Chỉ có điểm trừ nhỏ do home đang cạnh tòa nhà đang xây dựng nên ngày đầu bị ảnh hưởng bị bởi tiếng ồn từ 7h sáng đến 16h chiều, nhưng tổng thể vẫn ổn

We really enjoyed our stay at Hana’s place. The location was just a few minute walk from the beach and lots of food choices! Bed was very comfortable and we had everything we needed to enjoy our week long stay! Hosts were very responsive to our needs! Can’t go wrong book this place!!

Great location close to the beach and easy to reach from the airport. Cafés, restaurants, and supermarkets within comfortable walking distance.
They had our room ready in no time because we arrived earlier.
Functional amenities, shower with rain, handheld, and faucet function (for sandy feet) ... albeit at times only luke warm.
Nice and quiet at night, slept well here and would come back.

This is a nice little hotel in a great location. The three people who work here are very friendly and helpful. I stayed in a room at the back of the building, which didn’t have a view and was darker than I expected. Next time, I would book a front-facing room on a higher floor, which would make it a perfect place to stay.

Great location close to the beach and other facilities like shops, cafes, restaurants, massages are within a walking distance. The host is always responsive and friendly. The room was spacious and comfortable with a good cleaning service. In a word,  it is a very good choice. Thank you host and staff.

This apartment is very nice, but unfortunately, it's located in the middle of a construction site. Other Airbnb hosts have told me this before, and that's Berry fair. But not in this apartment. So, you're constantly bothered by noise.

Had a comfortable stay at Hanas place. Relatively quieter street but close to the beach. Everything was in order, clean with all the amenities. WiFi was decent if you need to catch up on work. Jenny at the front desk was friendly, polite and available for any queries. Would recommend!

I had a nice stay at The Navis. Hanna was a good host and always very responsive. Location is perfect with many restaurants and convenience stores around plus you’re just a 5min walk from the beach. I would definitely stay here again

Hana's apartment is absolutely amazing! Comfy bed, hot shower all the amenities you need! I'd highly recommend staying here! She helped me out with some bus issues and went above and beyond what a host would do. She deserves more than 5*!

We had a wonderful stay in Da Nang! The location was perfect close to local marts, Indian restaurants walkable distance , and massage parlours, making it easy to enjoy the city.
Beach was literally a 5min walk🫶🏻
The host was responsive and thoughtful, arranging a scooter for us in advance so our itinerary went smoothly from the moment we arrived.
She also went above and beyond by organizing our airport pickup and drop-off, which made our trip hassle-free.
The apartment was well-equipped, with a kitchen stocked with all the essentials for guests.
The laundry setup was convenient and included a compact drying area that worked perfectly.
Overall, a fantastic stay with a host who truly cares about her guests.
Highly recommended!
청결하고 아늑한 숙소이고 프런트도 친절하고 야간경비도있어서 안심할수있어요 다만 공사장소음이조금있습니다
I would happily stay here again and again. Great location, very close to the beach, lot's of local places to eat and get coffee. Extremely helpful host.

Stayed here for a few nights and the experience is great! Lots of restaurants and cafés around. Since it's near the school you might hear kids playing around and school bells but it's not really an issue.
The room got cleaned and towels were changed to fresh ones after a couple of days which was awesome. It was also great that there's a washing machine available and there's a clothes line where you can dry your washed clothes! Did I mention that it's a few minutes away from the beach? Overall great choice for a place to stay.

This hotel allowed both early check in and to store our bags which was really helpful. It had everything we needed inside and staff were welcoming. It was also close to local amenities and the beach. Would recommend

A great location with so many cafes and restaurants around! The check-in was managed by Jenny and she is a wonderful and helpful person throughout the stay! the apartment has a private laundry machine in the unit!

I stayed at Hana’s place for 5 days.  The apartment was as advertised except the refrigerator was smaller than the pictures but it was fine for the amount of food I had.  The staff and housekeeper were very friendly and the room was cleaned in the middle of my stay which was appreciated.  The only issue was the last couple of days someone checked into the unit above and they were very noisy constantly dragging chairs across the floor and loud stomping which made it difficult to concentrate on work or get sleep at night.

I had a wonderful stay. The host and staff were exceptionally kind and welcoming. The property was clean, well-maintained, and conveniently located within walking distance to many attractions, especially the beach. I would gladly return in the future. Thank you for the great experience!
Had a wonderful stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was friendly, responsive, and made the check-in process super easy. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Amazing apartment in a beautiful location. Nearby lots of coffee shops, restaurants and the beach. Quiet neighbourhood and very kind and helpful staff. I definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Danang, very beautiful place. Thank you Hana and staff 🙏😊

То что было не идеально чисто, меня не особо беспокоило. Но чужой кондиционер на твоем балконе, который тарахтит всю ночь, это просто невозможно. Спать можно было с трудом. К сожалению хозяйка смогла помочь лишь берушами для плавания, в которых тоже невозможно было спать. В остальном все соответствовало ожиданиям.
great place to stay in da nang. very clean, comfortable bed, spacious, good location and quiet. everything worked as it should. will stay longer next time. thank you Hana and Jenny!

Great location, close to the beach, plenty of cafes, its clean inside, Jenny at the reception was super friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend this place to my friends and will come back soon!

Good place, easy to find and walkable to the beach. Has a washing machine. Only thing is that the shower was a bit sketchy with an open tile on the roof and there were some moth flies flying from the drainage.

1.미케 비치에 가까워서 아침, 저녁으로 산책을 나가기 용이했어요.
2.주변에 맛집, 카페, 맛사지샵, 마트 등이 가까이 있어 좋아요
3.리셉션 직원이 있고 야간 경비도 계셔서 늦은 밤 체크인도 가능했어요.
4. 주방이 필요하다면-전자렌지와 커피 포트는 있었고 식기류는 최소한이었어요. 토스터기는 없다고 합니다. 큰 칼, 작은 칼, 전기밥솥 등은 요청하면? 준비해줍니다.
5. 세탁기와 빨랫줄, 옷걸이 10개-독립적으로 사용해서 좋았어요.
6. 2호 방은 그야말로 다른 건물의 벽 뷰입니다. 문제는 없습니다. 뷰보고 선택한 것은 아니니까요.
7. 그러나 이유 없이 방에서 쿰쿰한 냄새가 납니다. 그래서 외출시에는 창문이나 발코니 문을 열어놓는 등 노력을 했습니다.
8. 주 2회 청소와 침구 커버를 교체해주셨어요.
9. 화장대와 큰 거울
10. 밤에 냉장고 소리가 웅~~~ 좀 컸어요. 예민하시면 고려대상입니다.
11. 12박동안 충분히 잘 지냈습니다.

Trinh and Linh are amazing hosts! They made us feel so welcome and their apartment was perfect. It was spotless and very well-equipped. The big balcony was a huge plus, giving us a great space to relax and unwind. We felt so comfortable and relaxed here. Thank you for a fantastic stay!

Phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, đầy đủ tiện nghi đúng như mô tả. View từ phòng rất đẹp, đặc biệt mình cực kỳ yêu thích khu vực bể bơi – rộng rãi và mát mẻ, tạo cảm giác thư giãn tuyệt đối. Chủ nhà thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình và còn cho thuê xe máy rất thuận tiện trong suốt thời gian lưu trú. Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp!
Anh chị chủ vô cùng thân thiện , hỗ trợ cho mình ở tầng cao hơn so với ban đầu. Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ , sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.
view quá đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ, chủ nhà nhiệt tình

We had a great time at this apartment. the view is amazing! Sang was very helpful  with everything. The pool is also great and the hotel is excellent. The location is not central so you need a scooter or a taxi to go to restaurants or the beach. It was not an issue for us. everything was great. thank you Sang for being a great host.
房子的游泳池非常棒，位置虽然有点偏，不在酒店吃饭的话就需要打车或者外卖，但是相比闹市独有风景，很适合休闲度假，Sang为人也很好，处处为我们提供便利，比如，我们离开的机票在晚上，她允许我们在房间休息，直到下一个客人来入住前。

숙소는 너무나 좋았고 세탁기도 있고 와이파이 잘터지고 무엇보다 소통이 너무 잘 되어서 좋았습니다~~수영장 환상적이예요~~
아침 저녁으로 가보았는데 너무 좋았어요~~sang님의 빠른 답변에 감사드립니다~
오토바이를 타실줄 아시면 부족함없는 숙소예요~~
저는 그랩을 타고 다녔는데 숙소 위치가 조금 불편했어요~~
숙소안에서만 수영하고 쉬실꺼면 완벽한 숙소예요~~
Im in love to this place right away as i first walked into the room. Everything nice and clean, looks even better than in the pictures.  I even extended my booking to stay here  longer.

Sangs place located in 5 star hotel. We stayed on 11th floor for 5 days and didn't regret it at all.
If you send your visa/passport details to Sang in advance, he can get you in the system right away. Very convenient.
The views were spectacular! both from balcony in the room and on the 29th floor at the pool.
Sang, thank you for everything
너무 친절하게 대답과 장소 제공을 해주신덕에 더할 나위 없이 행복한 휴가를 보내게 되었습니다 감사합니다
Loved the stay! The room is very clean and beautiful and Sang helped me list my friend name so she can use the pool too. Will def stay here again I recommend the place!
The place is clean with a great view and the host is very responsive and accommodating. Thank you.

Great place to stay! Had a great time here, cozy bed, super clean bathroom, nice view from balcony. The suite is located at the Golden Bay hotel, it has a couple places within the hotel where you can get coffee and it has a small convenient store.
The hist met us at the lobby and helped us with our luggage, showed us the room and was friendly.
The unit offered a small fridge, plates, glasses and a kettle. Bottled water was also provided. The pool located on the 29th floor has an incredible view of Da Nang. Over all we had a fantastic time and would recommend this Airbnb. Location was good for us as we did not want to be right downtown, city is easy to navigate and very accessible.

Sang's place is studio apartment  located at Whydam Golden Bay Danang.  It is 5 star rated hotel.  There ate hotel side and apartment side.  However you can use infinity pool on 29th floor and Korean Sauna on 2nd floor.   It was spacious and clean.  I recommend this place and we would stay here again if we return to the area.
Amazing place, especially the jaw dropping view and the pool !
value for money, perfect for a tranquil escape, scenic sunset view, cool pool

Amazing place. Host was above nd be young. Not only u got a 5 star hotel. You have a very functional kitchen on balcony. A nice balcony to sit on and watch the sunsets. Unit comes with 2!!! Refrigerators. So u r build for a long term stay and a convenient one. The area felt quite but safe. From here we ventured to our daily tours.
A real luxurious stay for a minimal cost. Rooftop is romantic to stay on. Have a drink and view the world from the 29th floor. We stayed there a couple of time. Not to mention the Infiniti pool. One of a kind hotel. The unit is new. Bath tub is large new and. Lea and so is everything else. Sheets were white clean and nice. Bed was excellent. I can not say even one unflattering word. You must try this place.
And the host was friendly, helpful, available and there when you needed here. Even at our 5:30 am departure.
Thank you.
One of a kind.
100% Worth the stay also one of the best Host Team I ever had. I only can Recommend that Airbnb for your stay in Da Nang
我们住的很舒服下次还来
Très bon logement avec une vue magnifique et l’hôte était très gentil !
Big spacious room. Very responsive host.
완전 굿 냄새도 좋고 친절하고 연락 겁나 잘 보고 다 도와줘요
Overall is perfect, Great location, great place to sleep.
host amazing, helped us in everystep) apartment very big and clean with super big smart tv. amazing wiew from balcony. Big thanks
ottimo
Cảm ơn các bạn đã hỗ trợ gia đình mình trong quá trình lưu trú tại đây

The place is nice and pretty good value. The location is extremely near the airport, there's strong airconditioning and a netflix account is provided. There's some construction going on beside the hotel which is beyond the control of the hosts but it didn't affect my sleep quality.

We enjoyed our stay. Very clean. Close to the airport. We have everything that we need in the room. Then we have a shared kitchen on the main floor with a second additional kitchen with a washer, dryer, and extra small appliances like a rice cooker, microwave, extra utensils and cookware.
Excellent Location....Less than 2 kms from the airport....Supportive Staff....Easy Check-in .....We had a great stay at this place.... definitely recommended.....
Very nice apartment matched the pictures and descriptions. The staff are super friendly and always there to help. Has a washing and dryer machine which is very handy.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt in der Unterkunft. Bei jeglichem Anliegen wurde uns sofort geholt / innerhalb weniger Minuten über Airbnb geantwortet. Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit unseren Aufenthalt im Oriental Da Nang und haben daher um 1 Nacht verlängert (ging ohne Probleme). Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder !

Great price/quality value
Easy to find, timely responsive and proactive host
Looks exactly like on photos

Cozy and good quality room
Can safely part your scooter inside for the night if needed

Recommend and want to come back myself
A great host! A bit if construction noise, but the host was very helpful and accommodating.
The place is literally 5mins away from the airport (car)! Very convenient! Definitely recommend for long/short stays.
Everything was fine. The location is central, close to the airport and Ham Rong Bridge. The room was very clean and same as shown in the pictures

Ich hatte einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt in dieser Unterkunft. Die Zimmer sind modern, sauber und gut ausgestattet, sodass es an nichts gefehlt hat. Besonders positiv hervorzuheben ist das freundliche und hilfsbereite Personal, das jederzeit für Fragen und Anliegen zur Verfügung stand. Die Lage ist etwas außerhalb, aber dennoch gut erreichbar, sodass es kein Problem war, die Umgebung zu erkunden. Insgesamt eine tolle Unterkunft mit einem fairen Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis – ich würde sie auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen und gerne wiederkommen!
Super friendly and professional. Very short stay but well worth it. Thank you!
Great room to stay in for a few days. Very close to the airport.
Fantastic place to stay if you want to be near the airport. And I loved the room! It’s exactly as shown in the picture, very clean and very comfortable. Great bathroom too.
Was a great stay , neat and clean
Great place and look exactly loke the picture
Amazing place - the perfect location right by the airport. We had a great time & would definitely stay again
Ok

Oriental Danang is located in a super convenient spot - near the airport, ATMs, banks, and food is just around every corner. The staff are lovely and very accommodating. They even gave me a list of go-to places to eat ❤️ They clean the rooms every day and they change the towels too. The room was spacious and you can connect your phone/device to the TV and speaker. Even if it's beside the street, I didn't get bothered by the honk of the cars early in the morning (well, I worked at around 5am so I'm wide awake when they start coming! so if you're sensitive to the bustling noise of traffic, maybe request a room that's not facing the street. overall, I loved my stay and would definitely book here again when I come back to Da Nang ❤️

very nice location, near to the city and airport.
clean room, friendly and kind staffs.
we spent a beautiful time in danang. :)
Phòng sạch sẽ, chủ nhà thân thiện
잘 쉬다 갑니다.
Хорошие люди

Ghé Đà Nẵng nhiều lần nhưng lần đầu chọn căn hộ, trải nghiệm cực kì tuyệt vời với hai đứa mình. Bếp đủ đồ, bên home chuẩn bị khá chu đáo mọi thứ. Lễ tân hướng dẫn cách tự check in dễ hiểu, bé luôn giải đáp thắc mắc nhanh, trong phòng hầu như đc chuẩn bị đủ các đồ cần thiết luôn <3 sắp tới sẽ book tiếp nè. Mong sắp tới home có chuẩn bị thêm một số đồ cho nữ (như vài miếng bông tẩy trang, tăm bông ráy tai).

Cảnh quan xung quanh yên bình, phòng ở được chuẩn bị gọn gàng, sạch sẽ giống như mô tả, bếp có đầy đủ tất cả dụng cụ mà bọn mình cần. Có một khu chợ hải sản cách đó ko xa bạn có thể ghé cả buổi chiều hoặc sáng. Bọn mình đã có một trải nghiệm thú vị khi đi chợ và nấu ăn tại đây...Rất đáng để trải nghiệm, mình sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp ghé Đà Nẵng.

Dieses Homestay war das schönste auf unserer gesamten 3-wöchigen Reise!
Blick ins Grüne, sehr gemütliche Einrichtung, Waschmaschine auf dem Balkon und alles in einem sehr sauberen Zustand. Die Inhaber waren jederzeit zu erreichen und sehr hilfsbereit. Hier würden wir jederzeit wieder herkommen.

Great value place - host was friendly and responsive. Located in the quieter part of Da Nang, but not far to the beach, and plenty to do within walking distance. Some of the furnishings starting to look a little tired, but still comfy.
Had great experience, staying for almost 3 weeks there, would definitely go again

Были некоторые недостатки — большие щели в полу и не работал свет в ванной, но в целом все было хорошо.
Не было нормального обеденного стола, но это, как мы поняли, вьетнамская специфика и везде так:)
Хорошая стиральная машинка с сушкой, удобная кухня, хорошая кровать.
Мы были в холодные сезон (январь-февраль, на улице не выше 20-22 градусов) и в комнате, казалось, было холоднее чем на улице, потому что окна на север. Но в жаркий сезон, это будет, наоборот плюсом.
Очень желательно снять скутер, тогда будет очень удобно. Для скутера есть парковка внутри (ну как парковка, просто закатываешь скутер через ресепшен, но так почти везде)
mình đã book ở đây lần thứ 2 và mọi thứ thật sự cực kì hài lòng.
Awesome place to stay. Recommended

Nice apartment
calm neighbourhood
Good location
The place was wonderful with all the amenities. The places were very accessible by foot. Special mention to the receptionist, Thuong. She was super sweet and exceptional with her service!
사진과 동일함,가격대비 만족함,쇼파가 좀 낡음,다만 침대 매트리스가 별로임 교체필요,호스트가 정확하고 신속하게 응대함,다음에도 이용할 생각이 있음.
ok, phù hợp giá tiền
Overall decent, clean place to stay for 2 nights. The sofa is a bit old, mattress and its sheet are hard and old. And, they provide only 2 standard sized pillows. I won’t complaint more than that.
I dealt with Thuong, the co-host and she was amazing. Incredibly pleasant and very helpful. Really made everything very easy and enjoyable. Would definitely stay again, in fact I plan to. Thanks. 🙂
Fantastic place to stay~ Very close to the beach and you can rent motorbike with the host which is very convenient ~ The receptionist was super helpful and friendly!
Very nice place near the beach, Anh was very nice and helped us with everything we needed and the place was very clean
We could drop our baggage before, you can rent motorbike, reception during the day, elegant, modern building, close to the beach. Friendly and helpful receptionist.
Very good experience, big fridge and complete kitchen, secure building, nice coffee shop next door. Would book again :)

I had a fantastic stay in here, and it's definitely worth raving about. The apartment was exactly as depicted in the photos—neat and comfortable. What made the stay memorable, moreover, was interacting with Thuong at the front desk. She was incredibly friendly and helpful, enhancing my stay with her local tips and suggestions.
I did use the corrections that other guests made in their reviews for the GRAB address, which was helpful!
The room itself was immaculately clean and well-equipped, making for a homely experience. The only minor hiccup was a slight odor in the washing machine. I'd suggest a cleaning to ensure a perfect experience for future guests.
Overall, this was a delightful stay. A big thanks to Thuong and the apartment for adding such a wonderful chapter to my journey in Vietnam !
Great place and easy to find. Hosts were friendly and efficient with giving information. Special thanks to the hosts for giving me and my partner a great hospitality

I first want to say that Thương is an amazing host and receptionist. Thương was there to answer all of my questions (and I had many) and was helpful the entire time I was at the Airbnb... Thank you Thương! You are amazing. You made me feel so comfortable in Da Nang.
The studio is not very far from the beach. Maybe 3 blocks/ a 10-15 minute walk (even less if you walk fast). It is farther north of downtown Da Nang, so you may need to get a ride. Otherwise, it would be a very long walk (maybe a half hour/45 minutes) or you could rent a Scooter they conveniently have available.
The balconey is cute (quite cozy) and the washing machine lives on it. I had difficulties with the washing machine. I suggest if you plan on using it to talk to Thương or whoever is at the main desk first so they can guide you. The balconey has a view of a mountain in the distance, and cute backyard of another building.
Wifi works great. AC works great. Check-in and check-out was quite easy. Nice amenities!

The couch is very old and isn't very comfortable and the bed is very uncomfortable.
Otherwise, everything else was fine. Pretty much exactly what it looks like.
The place has a very cozy vibe, privacy and everything was top-notch. The manager at the reception was very helpful with everything. Must visit
Really nice service and very beautiful room, reasonable pricing

Phòng ốc khá sạch sẽ và tối giản , chủ nhà phản hồi khá nhanh và nhiệt tình . Tuy nhiên phòng tắm hơi bất tiện vì không có vòi hoa sen cầm tay tuy nhiên với mức giá rẻ như vậy thì mình vẫn rất hài lòng

Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh, nhân viên lễ tân dễ thương, nhiệt tình
Gần trung tâm, có cho thuê xe máy 150.000/1 ngày(24h). Rất tiện lợi
Phòng đẹp sạch sẽ, có nước nóng- lạnh thoải mái.
Phù hợp giá tiền. Mọi người đến Đà Nẵng nên trải nghiệm qua home này nhaaa
Có dịp đến Da Nang chắc chắn sẽ quay lại đây.

I stayed here for 3 nights the description on the photo of sunlight coming through the window was not there since in the room there is a building adjacent to the window which blocked any view or much the light, this time it was not an issue since i have not stayed in the room for a long time during the day. The room was spacious. The host was responsive. Overall the experience was good

The place is really clean and welcoming. Host stayed up to welcome us inside and show us everything we needed to know like AC, Lights, Shower etc. Also helped with bag storage while we spent a day away in another place.
The location is PERFECT, a 5 min drive to the beaches, lots of food places near by. Da Nang might be the best place ive visited so far in Vietnam, so having a great location to stay at was a bonus

We enjoyed our stay but be aware of construction happening in the neighbouring buildings at 6am every morning. Also the closet doesn’t have anywhere to hang the clothes and the floor was dirty upon check in. The bathroom is very awkward with no counter space and the shower head is nearly directly on top of the sink. Also the mattress still has its plastic cover when purchased so it is not as fluffy or comfortable as to be expected. The amenities listed were correct, as the wifi worked well and the tv had Netflix on it.
Alright for the price. Room appears dirty bc floor is stained. Bathroom was illogical and frustrating to use. A few mosquitoes each day. But good service and comfortable overall.

The location was closer to the airport and is like a km away from the beach, very quiet and quintessential neighbourhood a bit away from the touristy cafe towns but closer to the markets and mid town, the check in and check out was really smooth, and easy, the host was very responsive and helpful and provided us good recommendations on things, overall worth what we paid for.

Thank you Young, very friendly host. And I walked to the city from the house for 20 minutes got to all the places. Was easy to check in even my flight was delayed so I lost a whole day stay, so Young gave me extra time to check out. Beautiful building, room all white inside (no view though and all day long construction - the only thing, but if you come to walk around and not stay at home then it’s totally fine)

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans ce logement. Cependant le lit est un petit peu ferme,  mais pour une ou deux nuits c'est amplement suffisant. Le prix est très correct, je vous le recommande si vous cherchez un logement à Da Nang

All good! The room looked like on the pictures, a tiny bit worn by now, as expected from a place with a lot of guests. I'd say it's more like a hotel room with a private bathroom than an apartment. When we stayed the construction next door wasn't noisy at all. Equipment as described - a kettle, a minifridge, a TV with Netflix and a shared free washing machine on the top floor. Hot water and shower pressure are great, wi-fi good too. There's always someone helpful at the reception during the day and communication via messages is fast and proactive. When we arrived, the floor wasn't very clean but when they did housekeeping the next time, it was spotless, so hopefully just a one-off. Easy to find and we were able to do an easy self check-in after a night bus. Good location - a short walk to the beach, shops, restaurants and a longer but nice walk along the river to the Dragon bridge. A good deal for Da Nang, would stay again.

He regularly asked me if I need anything throughout my stay. Put me in contact with his staff when he wasn’t available to make sure someone was accessible at all times. Great communication usually responding within 30 minutes

I really love this unit, The surrounding is quiet, nice restaurants and Cafe shop and the internet is great for working remote. I recommend this however the construction next to it is loud during the day. but it's not his fault.  this is an excellent place overall
Sadly construction workers woke me up more than 3 days but that's the fault of the owner, other than that everything was great
Place is very basic.. not a lot of sunlight like the picture.. no desk for working.. very basic toiletries
A nice place to spend a night in Da Nang, close to everything I needed, and clean. The host was very accommodating of my late flight in getting me checked in
호스트분 친절하시고 에어비엔비 인데 청소도 해주시고 수압이 쎄서 좋았습니다.
It was a very great experience. The host was friendly and helpful. The room was clean and in a nice area where you could reach everything by walking. I had a great time.

You can see at photos that the main color of apartment is white. But when you see it by your own it's ridiculously white. There is cold lighting so it's uncomfortable to be there. And the window looks directly onto the neighboring building so there is no natural light in the room. Also after having a shower the floor in the bathroom is wet because there's no shower cabin.
저렴한 가격에 짧게 머무르기에는 가성비 좋았습니다.
Definitely good for being not too far from the airport or the beach, is just more convenient to Grab most places. Good for a short stay, would go again
a great first introduction to vietnam, close proximity to almost everything, a clean spacious room and a truthful host .. thank you Young Chan.
It was great. The host was helpful and friendly the place was good and beautiful. Easily accessible and great
Good location, the host was responsive yet the apartment was supposed to have a nice kitchen with nice pan and a nice stove😩🙁 I got very disappointed with the kitchen 😏

Literally everything was great responsive host
Finally a place in da nang that looks like the pictures and isn’t a scam. First off the room was huge the bed was a tiny bit hard but it’s because it was new with the cardboard still on it.
Lastly host was very helpful and responsive.
Amzing😇👍

Mình và gia đình vừa có kỳ nghỉ rất dễ chịu tại đây. Nhà sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, đúng như hình. Vị trí thuận tiện, siêu gần biển, trung tâm du lịch, dễ tìm.
Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện và hỗ trợ nhanh chóng từ lúc đặt đến khi check-out.
Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều vì đã tạo nên một không gian ấm áp, dễ chịu như vậy. Nếu có dịp quay lại, mình sẽ tiếp tục chọn chỗ này!
Phòng sạch sẽ, giá rẻ, trung tâm khu vực thuận tiện khi đến Đà Nẵng, mọi người đi đông có thể trải nghiệm thử
Chủ nhà thân thiện, không gian thoải mái
good location with lots of restaurants, only 5 minutes to the beach. Mira and her husband are very responsive to messages.
good location for staying  and valuable when you in danang.

• The place was clean and spacious.
• The hosts are really nice and kind.
Would definitely book again when I come back to Da Nang.
Great place to live, go there. Zero complaints.

Căn hộ cực kì sạch sẽ , chủ nhà siêu thân thiện trả lời rất nhanh , từ ban công tôi có thể ngắm được hoàng hôn rất đẹp , ở đây có 2 hồ bơi và 1 bãi biển riêng rất sạch , xung quanh có các quán ăn của địa phương
Phòng mới , sạch sẽ, căn hộ nằm trong khu resort ,  cảnh đẹp , có 2 hồ bơi và biển , Biển ko sâu và rất sạch ,nó là bãi biển riêng .
Quá thoải mái và thư giãn
호스트가 응답이 빠르고 친절합니다 저렴하게 리조트를 이용할수있어서 좋았어요! 개꿀ㅋ 또 방문할게요🥰

We really loved our stay in Hien’s place . We didn’t expect the amenities & beach to be this beautiful! We even ended up skipping some of our tours just to relax at the beach & pool. This is a luxury hotel and we felt lucky to book it while still enjoying the same amenities as hotel guests. We stayed for 3 days and 2 nights, but honestly, it felt too short. I wish we had adjusted our itinerary and stayed longer.
Even though I knew the king-size bed might be a bit tight for the 3 of us, I still chose this place because it’s a beachfront at a very affordable price. It would have been nice if there was a sofa bed, though.
There were some minor issues like the room key card not working, getting charged for a towel that got stained & a small hiccups when our Grab dropped us off at the hotel entrance we weren’t informed that our lobby was in the last building. But all of these were outweighed by the overall wonderful experience at Wyndham Resort and I still give it a 5 star rating⭐️

I stayed at this resort for one night and it was a wonderful experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which made the stay even more enjoyable. I was warmly welcomed with complimentary coffee — although I’m allergic to caffeine, I truly appreciated the kind gesture.
The room was very new and clean, and the overall atmosphere of the resort was peaceful and private, located right by the beach. One small note is that guests need to bring their own towels when going to the swimming pool, and the washing machine couldn’t dry my clothes — or perhaps I didn’t know how to use it properly.
Overall, I really enjoyed my stay and would love to come back again if I have the chance.
Nice Beach, Fire local Food around the Hotel, everything you need
최고에 숙소였어요
쾌적한 2박이었습니다. 고급 리조트를 저렴하게 이용해서 좋았습니다.
Best airbnb Hoi An❤️❤️❤️❤️🥰

The host was incredibly friendly and the location is perfect! It's so convenient to be close to both the international airport and the city center. The workspace was also a huge plus—very cool and comfortable. Highly recommended for business travelers and tourists alike!

The location was excellent, making it easy to explore the city. The view from the room was truly satisfying – we were lucky enough to enjoy both sunrise and sunset right from the balcony, and it couldn’t have made us happier. The host was extremely responsive and took care of everything we asked for, ensuring our stay was smooth and comfortable. Highly recommend for anyone visiting!
Phòng sạch đẹp hợp với giá tiền. Tuy nhiên phòng gần quán bar ngoài trời nên đêm rất ồn

진짜 최고였어요..!
밤 비행기라 프론트에 사람 없을까봐 걱정했는데 새벽인데도 직원분이 상주해 계시더라구요!
친절하시고 방 상태도 엄청 좋았습니다.
저는 욕실 청결을 중요하게 생각하는데 정말 깨끗하더라구요!🫶 (엄청 넓음)
하루만 있는게 너무 아쉬웠어요.
짐 보관 서비스도 있었어요.
Phòng đẹp và thoáng, view cũng đẹp. Ở trong 1 khu phố sầm uất nhưng không ồn ào về đêm, các bạn nhân viên hỗ trợ nhiệt tình

We extended our stay at this place because we were extremely happy with the room and people working at the reception! Langmandi is definitely a recommendation for your stay in Da Nang. It's close to everything you need.
It can sometimes be a little louder at night on the weekend, but we didn't mind.
All very nice, like the pictures. Clean, good location and friendly host.
정말 편하게 한달동안 쉬다 왔습니다. 리뉴얼된 호텔이라 깔끔하고 요금도 저렴하고 직원들도 너무 친절했습니다.
Nice place
bon séjour
Le séjour s’est très bien passé. Le quartier est animé le soir. L’accueil était excellent. L’appartement conforme à la description.
great stay and immediately responded to my needs.
I had a happy time because the staff were so kind.

One of the best accommodations that I have been to here in Vietnam. The room was everything you could ask for. Fresh seafood restaurants are within walking distance as well as the local eateries and convenience stores. It's a shame that I need to check out early because of the Bana Hills tour. I miss Da Nang already. Nonetheless, I will surely be back.
everything good

Great place to stay in Da Nang - super close to the beach and very quiet location despite being close to many restaurants and cafes. Tuan's instructions were super helpful in helping me find the place, and staff were even able to help store luggage before the check-in time. Would highly recommend anyone to stay here.
It's basically a hotel room with great balance of cost,  quality, and location. The best part is the hotel staff are the most professional, helpful, and kindest people you could ever hope for.

Nice, simple hotel room. The location was very central and had a lot of restaurants, spas, convenience stores, cafes around. staff was attentive and nice. Room was clean and had a kettle and complimentary water and tea. Overall very nice and I would recommend.

Loved my stay here, ideal location just the road of the main road of the beach and plenty of shops / cafes nearby. The room was spacious and very clean - as described in the listing. Very happy with my stay and I’d highly recommend staying here again. Communication with the host was great and the women on reception were very helpful and kind. Thank you! X

Lovely place to stay in Danang! Very accessible location, nearby the beach and very nice cafes. The rooms are really clean and have everything to offer. Would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting Danang :)

Excellent stay in a clean and private room with a lovely view of the city. A few minutes walk to the beach, and lots of cafes and restaurants nearby. Staff at reception was friendly and helpful. A great value overall!

Stayed in this property for a full month while in Da Nang, and would be happy to stay there for another month. The room was nice, the staff was very friendly and helpful, and it couldn’t be in a better spot. Walkable to the beach, restaurants, bars, and everything you need. Even the laundry across the street was cheap, amazing and delivered free of charge. Would (and will) stay here again!

cerca de todo, la playa apenas a 100 metros. es una buena opción y comparación precio calidad es excelente. las chicas de la recepción fueron muy amables y me ayudaron para mi traslado hacia la terminal de buses
이곳에 두번째 방문 했으며,다음에도 예약할 생각이 있다. 가성비 최고 입니다

Ich bin zufrieden, nur im Bad gab es unter dem Waschbecken etwas Schimmel. Auch wären Steckdosen am Tisch fürs Arbeiten mit dem Laptop nützlich gewesen. Ansonsten hatte ich einen angenehmen Aufenthalt.

Stayed for just under 3 months. Was everything I needed, clean, great location and a good size room. Yes the bathroom can flood a little but stick a towel down and it’s fine, showers lovely, plus they clean everyday so you’ll get a new towel so it’s not an issue. Staff at the hotel were amazing and the location is bang on. Rooftop gym and pool are an added bonus I used it everyday and rarely saw anyone else up there. It’s a cracking place and great price thanks

Most of it was good. It was a bit hard to get a hold of the host, but overall my stay was good. The room is great for the most part, but needs to be a bit better maintained. Overall, it was a good stay.
Tuan is a great host - very friendly and helpful. He went out of his way to make sure I had plenty of local restaurants to try. This was a good experience - thank you Tuan!

I had such a great experience at this hotel! Everything was spotlessly clean from the lobby to the rooms, it felt like they paid attention to every detail. The atmosphere was fresh and welcoming.
What really made the stay stand out, though, was the staff. She was genuinely helpful, friendly, and went out of their way to make sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. You can really tell they care about their guests.
Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a smooth, relaxing, and comfortable stay!
安く泊まれて、ダナンのメインのアトラクションからそれほど遠くもありません。地下駐輪場あり。バックパッカーには良い宿だと思います。

Things that were great: location within 15min drive of tourist attractions like marble mountain, lady Buddha, pink church etc, doable walking distance to dragon bridge (45min), plenty of restaurants including ethnic ones and cheap spas minutes from each other.  Few things that stood out was despite property being in a busy area, room was very quiet, comfortable bed as well as shower pressure and hot water great!!  Also Tuan and staff were available for assistance always.

Thank you so much for a wonderful stay!! The team was so nice and helpful. I loved the room and the small gym on the rooftop, it was nice. Location is right in the middle of all so very convenient.
Also they clean room and give free water .
Regarding noise- you hear the city bustle and the recording of the guy that sells buns until about midnight and a bit construction noise during day- but other than that- perfect. 💕
I would sure come back, it’s great worth!!!

Had a fantastic stay at the Jolia Hotel!
Clean & tidy, great spot in a fantastic location close to everything you need.
Tuan was very responsive and helpful with his instructions

Lovely service with the staff checking in on you everyday, perfectly located with various famous eateries (Thia Go, Maia Beach bar) all within 10 mins walking distance as well as spas/massage. Will stay here again if I return!

Great place, great location and helpful staff. Daisy and Duyen were particularly very helpful and always had a smile on their face, and eager to help. I was very lucky to have stayed here during my first days ever in Vietnam.

Excellent location with plenty of shops, restaurants, and cafés, just a few minutes from the beach. The room is on the fifth floor, and the elevator was always operational. The internet speed is good, with a stable connection. The room is cleaned daily, and the reception staff is very friendly.

Amazing hotel, better in person than it looks on the photos, price was so reasonable and the room and bathroom was very clean. One of the comfiest beds I’ve ever slept in and the receptionist was extremely friendly and helpful. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay

I loved staying here! The location was wonderful for being able to walk to many places, including the beach! The room was everything I needed and the staff were incredible. The room was made up every day and the front desk staff were always so friendly, helpful, and there if you need anything! For the price, this place can’t be beat!! Will definitely stay here again the next time I’m in Da Nang!
Tuan’s room is clean & same as pictures:) Tuan is friendly and responsive. Other staff members are very nice too!
Great value for good price. Thank for the great communication with manager!

One of the best Airbnbs we’ve stayed at in Vietnam! The apartment was modern, spotless, and incredibly cozy. The host was very responsive and always available whenever we needed anything. We highly recommend this apartment if you are visiting Da Nang ❤️
Thank you, everything was very good 🙏🏽 I highly recommend this apartment
The host is very polite, and she provide very useful information.

Absolutely loved my stay at Mr. Đô and Ms. Ánh’s place! The room was spotless, cozy, and beautifully decorated. It had everything I needed — fast Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a fully equipped kitchen. The location was convenient and easy to get around. The hosts were incredibly kind, responsive, and helpful throughout my stay. I felt right at home and would definitely come back again. Highly recommended!
非常完美的房间，客厅和卧室分离，还有个小厨房，最妙的是有个洗衣机。岘港比较热出去一趟就浑身出汗了，可以随时洗衣服顶楼晾衣服干的也很快，真的是非常好的一次入住体验。
Tuyệt vời, thân thiện
Fantastic stay at Mr. Đô and Ms. Ánh's! Clean, comfy, and well-equipped. The hosts were incredibly kind and responsive. Felt right at home – definitely recommend!
Все супер. Доволен. Квартира уютная все есть. Легко и удобно попасть. Я доволен! 😊

Great location and views! The beach is right across the street and there are good restaurants right around the corner. The property is in a fantastic spot with beautiful scenery. However, we noticed mold on the ceiling and inside the AC vents, which was concerning. Amenities are available, but you’ll need to pay extra as they are primarily for hotel guests. Overall, the location was excellent, but the mold stains made us a bit uneasy.
Stayed here for 5 days! I really love the view and the place itself. I like that it has a high speed wifi too. But it can get loud at night because of the nearby clubs and bars.
Would recommend and stay with again! Giang was responsive and attentive to any requests or questions. The view was incredible and my fiancé approved of the stay :) cam on em Giang

I'm so glad I booked with Giang! She communicated extremely well. Her place is in a great location. A beautiful view with a quick and easy walk to the beach.
5 - stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Giang was a great host and her apartment was lovely with a beautiful and large ocean view right from the bed. It was located conveniently at My Khe beach and near many excellent restaurants. The place was spotless and Giang was very proactive in all our communications. Definitely recommended.

This place is just amazing, and the host was extremely flexible and responsive! They went out of their way to accommodate a super late check in time, and made it stress free for me to get in at around 1am (not all airbnbs in this area will do this!).
The room itself was clean, modern, and had great AC. But of course the best part is the balcony overlooking the waterfront - the view is just amazing to wake up to each morning! There’s a small set of patio furniture on the balcony so that you can sit outside and enjoy the space outside as much as possible. In my opinion, having stayed in a lot of hotels in Da Nang, this airbnb wins hands down for affordability, cleanliness, and value. There’s also the rooftop swimming pool where you can order drinks and enjoy the beautiful views! Would highly recommend this building to others who are seeking a conveniently located, beautiful space to vacation :)
It was a good stay. We were satisfied
Thank you so much! 😊

Vị trí khách sạn thuận tiện gần biển và các quán ăn. Phòng rộng rãi và khá mới, trang bị nhiều đồ dùng thuận tiện mặc dù có một số chỗ còn khác với ảnh ban đầu tôi được xem trước khi đến.
Tôi thấy dịch vụ tốt, có máy giặt máy sấy tiện cho chuyến đi.
Điểm trừ duy nhất trong chuyến đi của tôi là phòng vệ sinh hơi có mùi, sáng dậy khá khó chịu nhưng tầm đến trưa là hết.

If you are in Da Nang, this homestay is incredible! Super clean, right by the beach, and the hosts are available 24/7. Everything is thought out by the hosts to make the stay as convenient as possible. The space itself is modern and decorated tastefully. I would highly recommend this spot!
사진보다 작긴 했지만 룸도 두대고 욕실도 두개라 실용성있게 잘 묵다 왔어요 분위기 좋고 편했어요

Very beautiful and exactly as described. The space is cozy and fully equipped, perfect for families. The kitchen is clean, and the free laundry is a huge plus. Our family had a very comfortable and satisfying stay here. It’s only a few minutes’ walk to the beach.
A very minor downside is that the bathroom in our room didn’t have an exhaust fan, so there was an odor. The lighting setup around the sink area wasn’t ideal, making it a bit inconvenient for getting ready or doing makeup, the light wasn’t bright enough and caused glare when looking in the mirror. However, these are just small issues and didn’t really affect our overall experience. If we have the chance to visit Da Nang again, our family will definitely choose to stay here again!
편하게 잘 쉬고 갑니다
管家非常负责任 酒店位置很好 附近有非常多的美食店可以步行到达 也可以步行到达美溪沙滩 虽然第一天入住出现了一些小插曲 但管家非常积极主动的妥善解决了

Mike was very responsive & helpful with the check in and check out process
The house look like the pictures and had all the amenities listed
All the attractions, were on walkable distance however, the house was peaceful to sleep in perfect for a couple
Will surely visit again next time in Vietnam
All the best

I absolutely loved this little gem, not only is it surrounded by various local restaurants, but it is comfy and soundproof. I loved my stay here, the host was always responsive and kind
Pro's
Stable wifi
Comfortable bed
Hot Water
Kitchen Utensils
Newer Building so NO MOLD (I'm allergic so this was mandatory for me to not have any mold)
Con's
I don't have any

Mike es un excelente anfitrion!
siempre estuvo atento a nuestra estadía, lo cual hizo todo mas fácil ya que fue nuestra primera vez en Da Nang.
Todo en la habitación esta muy limpio! es nuevo, por lo que te vas a sentir muy comodo!
hay todo lo necesario para qué no tengas que preocuparte.
volveria a hospedarme con Mike en un futuro!
호스트인 Mike 덕분에 잘 지내다가 돌아갑니다! 의사소통,체크인,체크아웃 모든게 완벽합니다
Super cute and clean apartment near the airport. The check in is extremely flexible and Mike made everything very easy to follow
This place is so clean and beautiful, and the host is incredibly kind. It’s definitely a must-stay spot if you come to Da Nang!
chủ nhà chu đáo nhiệt tình, dịch vụ tuyệt vời

숙소를 방문하기 전부터 베트남현지 날씨가 어떤지 궁금한점이 있는지 등 전체적으로 친절했어요. 웰컴선물도 주셨습니다. 위치는 한국사람들이 많이 거주하는 아파트여서 K-mart나 한식당들이 엄청 많아서 해외에서 난 무조건 한식파 하시는 분들께 좋은 위치였습니다. 저희는 밤비행기라서 호스트가 번거로우실까 셀프체크인을 했는데, 왠만하면 직접 체크인해달라고 요청하시는 것을 추천드려요. 셀프체크인시 숙소에 올라가는 엘레베이터를 경비원분께 부탁해서 올라가시라고 안내받았는데 그 사실을 경비원분은 잘 모르시고 번역기도 잘 통하지 않았어요. 그 때 어떤 다른 베트남분께서 그 것을 보시고 도와주셨는데 그 분도 이 건물에서 에어비앤비를 하시는지 얼마에 예약했는지, 그 호스트 불친절하니 나한테 옮겨라등 영업 엄청하셔서 불편했었습니다.  숙소같은경우 처음 예약하기 전 사진은 다른 방에서 찍은 사진이었는지 예약하고 나서 숙소의 이미지가 변경되었습니다. 그리고 동남아 숙소들이 대부분 사진을 엄청 화려하고 고급스럽게 찍고 실제로는 다른 컨디션의 룸을 주는것은 이제 익숙해서 그 부분은 괜찮았습니다. 다만 청cow를 안하시는지 정말 보이는 곳만 되어있었습니다. 그래서 자세히 보면 thㅡ러Iㄱl와 munZ가 있었고 이불도 the love웠어요. 또 ㄱrl美가 짱많아요. 冷dongㅅiㄹ에 엄청 ㅁrㄴryo... 그래서 저희가 대충 다 靑ox다해써요. 욕실에 기본 필터샤워기가 장착 되어있었고 한국분들 많이 사셔서 그런지 수질 괜찮았어요. 근데 화장실 한곳에만 욕실화랑 쓰레기 통 있었습니다.  그리고 에어컨이 각방과 거실에있었는데 안쪽방만 잘 작동되고 거실은 딱 에어컨바람나오는 위치만 시원했고 다른방 에어컨은 거의 안되는 수준이었어요. 호스트분이 너무 친절하고 한국인으로써 위치는 정말 좋은것같아요! 수영장도 있었지만 저희는 일정이 바빠서 사용은 못했는데 외국인분들과 한국인분들 잘 사용하시더라구요! 근데 생각보다 깊어서 애기들은 이용못할수도있을것같아요!
你对我们很热情，你给我们小礼物，我们都收到，感谢你们，祝你生意兴隆！

شقة انيقة و مميزة تقع في الطابق 27 تتمتع باطلاله خلابه
المضيفه متعاونه جدا الحي هادي وبجانبه الكثير من السوبر ماركت اضافة الى مطعم هندي

Home sạch sẽ, nằm gần khu chợ hàn đi bộ hay đi chuyển các điểm ăn uống cafe đều rất gần, tuy nhiên khi mình đặt phòng là tầng 2 mà nhận phòng lại là tầng 3, không có thang máy nên nếu ai đi 2 con gái như mình thì sẽ hơi mệt trong khoản mang vác đồ lên tầng cao, nhân viên cũng hỗ trợ khách mang đồ lên xuống khi checkin check out nên nếu cần mọi người có thể nhờ các bạn ấy. Với tầm tiền này thì mình thấy ở home thoải mái hơn khách sạn nhỏ. Home giới thiệu có Chi nhánh 2 gần chi nhánh 62 Nguyễn Thái Học có thang máy mới hơn. Mng có thể tham khảo
Very clean and spacious flat. Bright as well which is a bonus. Friendly host but check in at the desk was a bit slow and unwelcoming. The bed is also very very firm. Other than that no problems.

I had a fantastic two-week stay here! The receptionist and staff were incredibly friendly and always ready to assist with anything I needed. The only minor downsides were that the bed felt a bit too firm for my liking and there was some street noise during the day. However, things quieted down nicely by 9 or 10 PM, allowing me to sleep peacefully. Overall, a great experience! 🤙

Die Unterkunft ist Zentral gelegen und es gibt viele Restaurants und Cafés die fußläufig zu erreichen sind. Die Unterkunft hatte alles was wir gebraucht haben und der Gastgeber war gut erreichbar bei Fragen.

The room was nice, quite spacious. It had reach my standards- has space to open luggage and clean toilet, clean room. They also provide slippers to wear inside.
The location was very central and convenient (next to Han market), making it easy to get to every where. Highly recommend to rent a motorcycle.
Host was responsive, respectful and friendly, which made the experience even better.
One cons is the room on the 4th floor and the old cleaner lady had to helped me bring it up there since theres no lift. Its a no if you are heavy packed
They also let me early check in with 30% extra fee which is fine.

The location was great, close to the main attractions, and the price was very affordable. The host was flexible with check-in and check-out times, which I really appreciated. There were quite a few mosquitoes, but overall it was a good stay for the price.

Очень приятные апартаменты. Высокие потолки, много пространства, минималистичный дизайн. В реальной жизни апартаменты лучше чем на фото. Из минусов: шум, ремонт за стенкой в 8 утра (я не могла спать), неприятный запах так как в ванной нет вытяжки. Это запах очень стойкий и не выветривается, если открыть все окна.
Я поставила 5 звезд так как приятный дизайн и свежий ремонт за относительно небольшую стоимость.
There was only 1 issue of no elevator because at times receptionist not available to shut luggage

wie immer: großartig!
ich war schon mehrmals in dieser Unterkunft und werde immer wieder hierher zurückkehren. ich mag die Ausstattung der Wohnung, die Lage und insbesondere alle Mitarbeiterinnen der Rezeption sind unglaublich freundlich, aufmerksam und hilfsbereit 💕
Rigtig fint og hyggeligt sted. Hård seng, ingen udluftning på toilettet, og der var lidt beskidt på gulvet men ikke noget som de ikke ville hjælpe med. God lokation hvor man kan gå til meget.
Ở rất thoải mái như ở nhà của mình luôn ạ

Mir hat der minimalistische Einrichtungungsstil sehr gefallen und ich war froh um den Balkon und insbesondere um die immer freundlichen Mitarbeiterinnen.
es haben eigentlich nur ein Küchenhandtuch und ein kleiner Haken neben dem Badezimmerbecken für das Handtuch gefehlt.
ich habe mich immer sehr wohl gefühlt und gefreut, in die Wohnung zurückzukommen
This place exceeded all expectations, offering a perfect blend of comfort and charm. The attention to detail and welcoming atmosphere truly made it feel like a home away from home!
Very Special Place Close to the market And River walk many places to eat and shop very fun and exciting. Rooms are spacious high ceilings and very modern and clean I do recommend :)

This place is incredible - and so worth the price!
Perfect location (near Han Market and the river, and with lots to do around), incredible studio (super comfy double bed, spacious and neatly decorated) and really nice staff.
I’ll definitely come back when I find myself in Da Nang again 🤗

住在大馬路上半夜可能會有人在吵鬧
玻璃隔音效果沒有太好
櫃子上有螞蟻在爬 殺不完
冷氣在床上方睡覺很容易著涼
陽台很舒適

Die Gastgeber waren sehr nett und bemüht. Auch die Lage ist super!🌞
Wir hatten leider Ameisen im Zimmer. Die betroffene Stelle wurde zwar vom Gastgeber geputzt, dies hielt die Ameisen aber nicht lange fern. Wir haben uns dann selbst im Supermarkt ein Mittel gegen Insekten gekauft und das Problem war gelöst - nur das als kleinen Tipp. Ansonsten haben wir uns sehr wohl gefühlt! ☺️
가격대비 너무 만족스럽네요 한시장위치와도 가깝구 주변에 식당들도 가깝고 용다리도 가까워서 주말에 불쇼도 볼수있습니다

Nice clean place - no TV but exactly what I signed up for.
Thanks for taking me!
Nice [lace,  very central but not noisily
The airbnb is cozy and convenient

Beautiful room in a beautiful location. The staff are warm, friendly and funny!
Highly recommended

Central location, convenient to travel, spacious and clean room. Friendly staff.
highly recommended to everyone
Everything was very nice I really enjoyed staying there one small problem was the noise from the street but other this everything was fine

Disfruté mucho quedarme en este alojamiento. Douc y todo el staff son súper amigables y con mucha predisposición. El nos invitó a barbecue con los otros huéspedes, el staff y su familia. No podría haber elegido un mejor lugar para mis días en Da Nang. Sin dudas volvería. Si pudiera darle más estrellas se las daría.

I had a truly wonderful stay at this hotel and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a warm and welcoming experience with a reasonable price. From the moment I made my reservation, the staff were incredibly kind and attentive. I especially want to compliment the reservation team for their outstanding hospitality, they were responsive, friendly, and made me feel genuinely cared for even before I arrived.
What really impressed me was how thoughtful they were with my request for a bike rental. I had mentioned it briefly during my booking, and to my delight, everything was already arranged by the time I checked in. The bike was ready, in excellent condition, and the staff even provided helpful suggestions for scenic routes around the area. It’s clear they pay attention to the little details that make a big difference.
good location, with good co host . also got 3 days with rent scooter with very good price
Tôi rất may mắn khi ở đó một căn phòng sạch sẽ có không gian yên tĩnh đẹp đẽ ...

I had a great 7 night stay at this apartment. It was on the 26th floor in the golden bay hotel with a beautiful view of the bay. The water pressure in the shower was really good. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful clean accommodation with a beautiful view.

I don't know where to start .. I was supposed to stay only 4 days here but I extended my stay! Sang and his entire family are super friendly, kind and highly responsive. I got very sick on my second day and he got me medical supplies and checked on me with his daughter every day. I got a 5 star hotel experience but mixed in with feeling like I'm in a family house! They're in the hotel constantly so I always felt safe and taken care of ❤️
This has got to be the best hosting experience I have ever had .. much love! They also gave me the best local recommendations for everything.

We stayed at Da Nang and even though our trip started off stressful due to a delayed flight, Sang made everything so much easier for us. We were originally supposed to arrive on the 26th, but ended up arriving late on the 27th. It was a tough travel day, and we were really exhausted and stressed.
The host was incredibly kind and flexible. Even though our stay was shorter and we would be checking out early, he still offered us a discount. That thoughtful gesture really meant a lot to us and showed how much he cares about his guests.hospitality and understanding made a big difference during our trip. We truly appreciate everything and would absolutely recommend staying here to anyone visiting Da Nang. Looking forward to coming back under better circumstances for a longer stay

Propre, grand, super logement
L’hôte et sa femme sont très sympathiques

Muy amables, la habitacion increible con vistas muy bonitas. Piscina maravillosa.
Buen apartamento en una buena zona, con vistas muy bonitas y por el precio más que justo
Nice, clean room. Pool have really good view at the ocean and whole city.

The host is very helpful and good communication. Room
Is space and very clean thank you
perfect
Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại đây trong các chuyến công tác dài ngày 🥰

We had a great stay here in Da Nang! The place was clean, the host was responsive, and the location was perfect -- just a 4-5 minute walk to the beach and surrounded by lots of great restaurants and stores. Wifi in the room was good for work, and we often worked from the cozy café on the ground floor. We especially loved Miss Nhi restaurant nearby, which stays open until midnight. Overall, a perfect spot. We’ll definitely be back!

Great little modern apartment with everything you need. Host was very friendly and responsive and offered a cleaner as often as I’d prefer. Great location near everything you need and only 5 min walk to the beach. Cool coffee shop downstairs with friendly and helpful staff. Quiet and easily accessible building. Would stay again

Super freundlicher Gastgeber und gut erreichbar! Bei Fragen immer offen und auch hilfsbereit. Wir konnten unser Gepäck vor Check in unterbringen und somit noch den Vormittag nutzen.
Die Unterkunft hatte für uns eine gute Lage und war 5 Minuten zu Fuß vom Strand entfernt. Es war ruhig und Preis-Leistung-Verhältnis ist sehr gut!

The location is perfect to walk around and try the amazing cafés and restaurants! The only downside is that the room is small with no ventilation or natural light coming in. Had to always go out to get some fresh air.

I had a great two-night stay at this Phu place! The location is perfect , right next to everything you need. There are restaurants and cafes just downstairs, and the beach is only a short walk away. Super convenient!
Phu was amazing and very responsive. Highly recommended!
