Great stay for a few nights in Da Nang. 5 minute walk to the beach kept us happy and entertained through the Vietnam heat. Having streaming services felt like a luxury we hadn’t had for a while since starting our travels. Would highly recommend staying here

A Heartfelt Gem in the Middle of Da Nang – Phu’s Airbnb is Home Away From Home
If I could give more than five stars, I would. Phu’s Airbnb in Da Nang isn’t just a place to stay—it’s a full experience, and one that left me feeling both grateful and a little sad to leave behind. Whether you’re a solo traveler, a digital nomad, a couple, or a small group exploring Vietnam, this spot delivers comfort, charm, and genuine hospitality in a way that’s rare to find.
Location, Location, Location
Set right in the heart of Da Nang, the location alone makes this Airbnb worth booking. You’re within walking distance to so many great restaurants, night markets, cafes, and cultural spots. The area feels lively but not overwhelming—just the right mix of convenience and comfort. Whether I wanted to grab local street food or take a stroll to the ocean, everything was nearby. It’s central without the chaos, and that’s a big win.
The Space
The rooms are beautifully designed—clean, minimal yet

Phu’s place is as described and photographed. It’s a small one bedroom apartment, centrally located where there are lots of restaurants and bars around the area, while the beach is a few min walk away. Despite its location and that there is a bar right across the street, this unit is quiet at night as it is at the back side of the building and faces another building. The downside is that it does not get a lot of sunlight during the day but I take that over noisy nights. There is a coffee shop on the ground floor that you have to walk through to get to the elevator but it was not an issue for me.
Thanks for the great stay.

Phu is a wonderful host! He shows great hospitality, is very responsive and great to communicate with, his place is quite convenient, almost everything you need can be done within walking distance. The coffee shop downstairs is a great place to work too if you need to work. I enjoyed my time at his place. Thank you Phu for everything!

Absolutely loved staying here! Been in Da Nang several times and this was the best. The location is central (and super convenient), but once you get in your airbnb, you can’t hear any sounds and it’s peaceful (10/10). The host and staff are polite, helpful and very proactive! Highly recommend this!

(Kor)
사진이랑 똑같아요.
화장실 깨끗한 걸 중요하게 생각하는데 깔끔해서 좋았습니다.
호스트 답장도 빠르고 매우 친절하세요.
3일에 한 번씩 룸클리닝도 제공해줘서 좋았습니다.
근데 방음이 너무 안돼요.
건물 뒷쪽이라 바깥 소리는 안 들리는데, 복도 및 밑층 복도 소리까지 잘 들립니다.
매우 작은 소음까지 잘 들려요.
거기다가 세탁실이 바로 옆에 붙어있습니다.
소음 이슈로 잠을 잘 못 잤어요.
소리에 예민하지 않으시면 가격을 고려했을 때 합리적인 선택이 될 수 있습니다.
(Eng)
I stayed at Phu's place for 5 nights.
The place is just like the photos.
It was overall clean especially the bathroom, which I think is very important.
Also Phu was always responsive and friendly through out the stay.
I liked how the place provided room cleaning every 3 days.
However, the place is not sound proof at all.
Event though you can't hear the noise from outside you can still hear even the very little noises coming from the hall way and downstairs .
Plus it's right next to the laundry room so
I couldn't get much sleep.
Considering the price, I think it's a moderate place to stay.

Great space, great kitchen: can make your dinners. Ultimately, great space as it has a dining area, kitchen, bathroom, and large bedroom space.
Host is very responsive: morning, afternoon and night.
Nomads: every 5 hours the router may go dark but no worries just unplug and plug it back in. If I had a long string of meetings up ahead I would simply restart the router proactively and the internet works great all throughout. It’s a fast wifi. And again, if anything happens — you just restart the router, and it’s back on within 30 seconds. Restart it at the beginning of your shift and nothing will happen for at least the next 5-6 hours so it’s honestly nothing to worry about.
This is a great space, highly worth the money. I do recommend.
Phu’s Airbnb was very clean, nice, and spacious. During our stay in da nang it was our favorite rental. Also Phu is a great house who cares about his renters and always replys quickly!

Mr. Phu’s place is remarkable and very near to restaurants, malls and airport. I would recommend it to someone who also works remote, his wifi at Lu Coffee downstairs is also really fast more than 200mbps, wifi inside the room is around 80mbps which is also spectacular. Quiet, has a laundry area, and you can also cook. There are lots of restos nearby. Check in and check out was smooth. Mr. Phu (as we call him) is very down to earth and he is very responsive to your chats whenever you have questions. Your room also gets cleaned every other day. The lady maintaining is friendly too. I’d definitely recommend this out to people who likes a spacious room plus reliable internet for work!

Great place to stay around the An Thuong area. Owner is super friendly. Nice rooms, clean and good design.
Coffee place downstairs is super chill and relaxed.
Highly recommend
Phu lived up to his super host status.  Everything went perfect and we had a great stay.

Great spot in a fantastic location!
Phu is an excellent host—super friendly and incredibly responsive. If any issues came up, he addressed them right away, which I really appreciated.
The property is conveniently located above a cool coffee shop, making it easy to grab a drink, get some work done, or just relax.
One suggestion for improvement would be to add more kitchen items, such as extra plates, bowls, glasses, utensils, and maybe a blender.. While the current setup is sufficient, a few additional items could make it even better.
Aside from the noise from construction nearby—which was beyond anyone’s control—my stay was nearly perfect. Highly recommend!
Great stay at Phu's place! Excellent location, you're in the middle of everything. The wifi is reliable and the cafe downstairs is also very cute.
It was good, no problems
Phu was a very helpful host. My sister and I enjoyed our stay. We will book again the next time we are in Da Nang.
Great location, Phú was great to deal with.
只能說，下次還會回來
사진으로 보는 것보다 더 아늑하고 생각보다 침실이 넓어 좋았습니다. 해변도 코앞이라 바다수영을 즐기기에도 좋았고 아래층의 카페에서 쉬기에도 좋았습니다. 호스트의 응답이 매우 빠르고 숙박 하는 동안 문의를 하면 실시간으로 피드백해주셨습니다.
Rẻ nhưng rất tiện ích, sạch sẽ chỉ có nhà vệ sinh hơi bé, buồng tắm nhỏ nên dễ bị ướt áo quần khô. Bù lại vị trí rất thuận lợi gần biển, lễ tân rất nice. Recommend

This studio felt like our home! It was super comfortable and cozy. And all staffs including John are really kind and treated us very well. I would like to visit again with my family in this winter. I appreciate your kind and nice service. Thank you. see you later!

We had a very pleasant stay in one of the front 3rd floor rooms with a small balcony overlooking the quiet and leafy street. A short walk to the beach and local shops and restaurants. The small kitchette has adequate utensils and was very useful. The indoor swimming pool is nice for a quick dip and the small sauna was a pleasant bonus. Great staff.

여러 숙소를 다녀본중에 직원들의 서비스는 놀라울 정도였고 조용하고 가족 및 연인들이 오면 좋아할 감성 숙소로 추천드리고 싶은 곳이다 안내데스크 청소하시는분 기본영어 한국어 능통으로 소통이 원할했었다
그리고 룸 컨디션 청소상태가 너무 훌륭해 만족했고 내집처럼 편안하게 숙면할수있어 하루가 즐거워졌다
체크아웃 할때 항상 웃는모습으로 손님을 배려하는 안경낀 여성분과 숙소앞 사진으로 여운을 남겨주신 직원여러분께 다시한번 감사드리며 다시 베트남을 여행한다면 꼭 재방문하고 싶은 숙소였다

너무 붐비지는 않으면서 시내쪽이든 비치든 접근성이 크게 떨어지지는 않았습니다.
수영장은 작지만 편하게 이용할 수 있었고 무엇보다도 직원들이 매우 친절하고 빠른 응대를 해 주셔서 감사했어요
다음 다낭 방문시에도 이용하고 싶습니다

Wonderful stay , and the receptionist/caretaker of the property (huong) was extremely helpful with all the weird requests we had.
would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting da nang
phòng đẹp nic

Great place to stay with family especially with kids. Pool was awesome. receptionists were very friendly and hospitality was exceptional.Peaceful and calm neighbourhood.
Only issues we faced were with the loose contacts of charging sockets and low bathroom lighting.
But overall it was a fantastic experience at John’s boutique villa.

A very comfortable and clean suite. The little kitchenette was very useful and we loved the sauna and swimming pool! The only thing we noticed was a strong cleaning product smell in the room - I’m sensitive to strong chemical scents and would’ve struggled if we stayed more than a night but others might not even notice it.

My partner and I stayed at John’s apartment for 1 month and it was perfect for us. We stayed on their 2nd floor and had a nice balcony and kitchen. The sauna and pool was such a nice bonus as well and I think I used it almost everyday. The room was also very clean and we had room service clean our room twice a week. The location was also perfect and had everything within walking distance such as cafes, restaurants, or the beach. Lastly, the staff was above and beyond and the hospitality was simply amazing. We will be back again when revisiting da Nang.

Absolute fantastic place to stay. The room is spotless and large. They clean your room a few times a week. Place is so close to the beach and lots of cozy restaurants and cafés. Staff is so friendly and nice. Could not ask for a better place to stay. Perfect for long visits. Highly recommend!

I recommend staying at John’s Boutique Villa because it was spacious, clean, and close to the beach! The receptionists are so sweet and accommodating if you ever need anything. Beds were comfy and the space is cleaned daily. Be aware that the sliding windows from the bathroom does look into another room’s balcony if opened, otherwise they’re covered when closed!

I highly reccomend this Villa! The place went beyond and above my expectations. For an Airbnb they cleaned our room daily, with free water, fresh towels and the staff are very friendly and accomodating. The location is a few mins walk from Da Nang Beach. There are a lot to do within the area and very good restaurants nearby. Plus we love that it's near a very good coffee shop that we go daily in the morning (Wind coffee shop). I plan to go back here next year and will reccomend this place to all my friends and family. They have a cute dog in the lobby! Hello Kiki! would like to commend their staff as well who made our stay hospitable and efficient. Raymond and the lovely lady who welcomed and help us throughout our stay thank you! See you soonest 💛💛💛

We really enjoyed our stay at John’s place — it was comfortable, clean, and conveniently close to restaurants, shops, and the beach.
I can’t put into words how lovely and welcoming the staff are. They truly go above and beyond to make your stay as comfortable as possible. We especially enjoyed chatting with Hoàng (Raymond), who was incredibly friendly and interesting to talk to — we’ve definitely made a friend for life!
The only suggestion I’d make is to consider adding mosquito nets in the rooms. With the pool nearby, there were quite a few mosquitoes, and we ended up with several bites. But aside from that, everything was great.
Thank you for having us 🥰

바다 도보 3분거리지만 조용한 곳에 있어서 좋습니다
프런트 직원분이 매우매우 친절하고 강아지가 귀엽습니다
수영장이랑 발코니 느낌이 너무 평화롭고 좋아요
오토바이도 하루 15만동에 빌릴 수 있는데 컨디션도 괜찮고 재밌습니다 ^_^

this is my 2nd visit to danang, and the place is amazing, located very near to the beach, restaurants, and mini market. we just walk to the market to buy foods, which we can cook, it is very recommended for both family or friends as they are very convenient.
for the host, they are amazing, very helpful and fast respons, i ask request and ask anything which always given directly.
another tips, they also offer car and motorcycle rent which is cheaper than others. surely will choose this place again if i back to danang ❤️

It was great staying at john's boutique villa for us and our little kids. It was walking distance from mini marts, the kindest banh mi vendors along moon milk mart and the beach! The staff were all very friendly and laundry service was also available. Their good value car service also helped us get on our day trips to Hoi An and Bana Hills. This all made our Da Nang stay more enjoyable and memorable.

Wonderful experience at John Boutique! The receptionist is welcoming and helpful. The room is clean and tidy. Would definitely stay for longer given its exceptionally reasonable price. Only thing to nitpick is its shower hot water temperature, which fluctuates occasionally between too hot and too cold.

Prior our Vietnam trip, John is very accommodating to our requests and he is very responsive to our queries. The staffs at the reception are also very friendly and approachable which made our stay smooth and relaxing. The location is also good as there are lots of food and restaurants near the unit. All in all, we had a good stay and will definitely go back to Vietnam.

The villa is at an excellent location with a 5 min. walk to the beach. We (group of 3) stayed there for 3 nights. The room was very clean with all the basic amenities needed. The employees at the reception are all very polite and super friendly and always ready to help. Overall it's worth every penny spent and definitely recommended.
附近很多好餐廳好咖啡廳，隔壁spa也很棒，風景舒服綠植很美，服務也很好，推薦
Great place to stay when you’re on vacation! The area is quite peaceful and is located close to Da Nang beach so you have easy access to the same.
the reception staff are fantastic very warm and welcoming. always say hello and wish us a good day. it's a lovely place to stay

Our family of 4 stayed for 5 nights in John's Boutique Villa. Location wise it is about a 5 to 10 minute walk to Danang beach area, with mini-markets about 3 minutes away (to buy snacks / water etc.) which is very convenient.
What stood out is the reception (they helped check us in and also with our bags to the room). Reception is very welcoming, friendly and helpful and allowed an earlier check-in which is great as we arrived about 2 hours early (1pm vs. 3pm). The reception also helped guide us to local food areas and even took a family picture (printed with frame) as a parting gift. Thank you!
The only small downside is the room is as per pictures, a little small, but we didn't really stay long in the room so it suited us perfectly.

Linh was a great host who went above and beyond to help us along with our trip. She was kind to provide extra benefits like a taxi from the airport on the first day and charcoal for the barbecue, despite not being obliged to do so. Moreover, the place was cozy and comfortable, and my friends and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, finding it a good place to rest and recover after a long day of exploring Da Nang. Highly recommended!

Host was super super nice and friendly 🥰 One night there was a water disruption after 10pm. Host felt really bad and even gave us snacks and compensation for it. Very understanding although not her fault.
I wanted ti visit a few places but wouldn’t read the map, she located for me and even send me the google location for me to follow. Really helpful.
The place overall cozy and clean. Definitely recommended!

3 good things about this place:
- Location is amazing. A few minutes' walk from the beach, great street food, seafood, and a local market.
- Price is reasonable
- Free airport pickup, and one free housekeeping session
3 less good things about this place:
- In the upstairs bedroom, you can hear construction on a home next door, as of June 2025
- If stairs are an issue, you need to bring up luggage on tight stairs. (You're better off renting out the downstairs unit in that case.)
- It was a bit tight for 6 people (2 people to a bed). But this is reflected in the cheaper price.

This place was what we were looking for.  Located among local private residential homes but only 5 minutes walk to the beach and to many shops, services, and restaurants (Ba Van is right across the home and the food is yummy and the owner very friendly).  The place was spacious enough for our family of 5!

Had a great stay overall! The location was perfect—just 5 to 8 minutes by Grab to the central area, and about a 10-minute walk to My Khe Beach.
The host was also very responsive and helpful throughout the stay. Everything went smoothly—would definitely recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay at Linh’s place! Linh was a very responsive and friendly host and answered any questions we had right away. She gave us local recommendations as well. The house was clean and in a safe area and was walking distance to the beach and several restaurants. Highly recommend!

We had an incredible stay here. Spacious, clean, great location and Linh, the host, accommodated to a later checkout time when we needed.
Would definitely recommend staying here if you are in Da Nang!

2박 3일간 충분히 편안하고 기분좋은 여행의 시작을 경험 할 수 있어서 좋았습니다!
호스트님도 소통을 친절히 적극적으로 해주셔서 좋았어요!

모든 것이 내 집처럼 편안했어요. 사소한것 하나하나까지 다 갖춰져 있고, 정말 집에 있는 것처럼 불편함이 전혀없었어요. 수건도 넉넉하고, 휴지도 넉넉하고, 주방 집기들과 그냥 모든게 다 갖춰져있어요. 호스트는 항상 세심히 챙겨줘서 정말 좋았어요. 숙소도 청결해서 벌레 한마리 못봤어요. 현지인들이 사는 동네에 있어서 동네 아이들이 나와서 노는 소리가 정겹기도 했어요^^

숙소가 감성숙소입니다.
이쁘고 매우 조용했어요.
옥상을 가면 바베큐도 할 수 있는 시설이 있고
한국인들에게는 좋은 위치입니다. 한국식당 해변이 근처에 있어요.

My friends and I (7 of us) had an amazing stay at Linh's place in Da Nang. The accommodation was perfect for our group—spacious, clean, and very well-equipped. Linh was an exceptional host, always responsive and full of great recommendations. The location was convenient, making it easy for us to explore the city. We all felt right at home and couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Highly recommend Linh’s place for anyone visiting Da Nang!
It was a great, cozy stay which was right in the heart of the city. Great vibe! Total value for money spent!

We travel as a group of 4, Linh and tramtram was super responsive and helpful throughout the whole trip, even since wayyyy before our stay that helped us so much during our itinerary planning.

we also had them to help us arrange driver for airport pickup and to send us up to bana hills after we end our stay, the drivers are also very well mannered and helpful to help us carry our luggages since we stayed on the 2nd floor. the stairs are slightly narrower, like how you see kdrama apartments haha so will be a little challenging if you're carrying bigger luggages
washer dryer 2 in 1 with washing powder prepared was such a good thing to have since we had snorkeling in our plan
grab was easy to get from our airbnb
neighborhood was peaceful and quiet
there are more space in the living room if you need to open up your bigger luggages
we are very happy with our stay :) thank you so much for hosting us!

딱 가격만큼인듯.
0.5박이라 저렴한곳을 예약햇는데. 딱 그 정도 가치임

We had an amazing stay at this cosy, apartment in Sơn Trà! The location was ideal—just minutes from My Khe Beach and surrounded by local cafes, convenience stores, and local dining spots. We loved exploring the neighbourhood’s Vietnamese flavours while having all the comforts of home. Getting around was not a hassle coz Grab (Asia's Uber) was just a click away.
What truly made our stay special was our wonderful host, Linh! She helped us arrange tickets and transportation to Ba Na Hills, and offered great local tips. Her hospitality made our trip so much smoother and more enjoyable.
Highly recommend for anyone visiting Đà Nẵng—great value, prime location, and exceptional host!
숙소도 넓고 가격도 저렴해서 너무 좋았습니다. 너무 즐거운 시간이었어요. 최고였습니다!!

We had a lovely stay at this Airbnb! The place was clean and pleasant, making for a very comfortable experience. It was also easy to find, which was a huge plus after a long journey. The host was incredibly friendly and welcoming, which made us feel right at home.  The only minor thing was the lack of a cabinet in the bathroom for toiletries, but otherwise, everything was perfect.  We would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a great stay!

This is an apartment located in a quiet area. It's very close to the Korean area but seems to be situated in a local neighborhood. It’s not too far to walk to the My Khe beach (about 5 minutes). Nearby, there is a great BBQ restaurant called Veteran, and I also like the local shop nearby. The weather has been a bit rainy, but fortunately, the host thoughtfully provided umbrellas for us to use for walking. I would recommend this apartment to any friends visiting Da Nang. It’s a place worth experiencing for a trip.

공용거실 에어컨이좀 약하지만
가격대비 완전 만족입니다~~
Great location, walking distance to beach. Restaurants , spa, stores… are just nearby.

주택가에 위치해 있어서 저녁에 조용하고, 근처에 마트가 있어서 식료품 구매할때 편했습니다.
명소인 미케비치가 걸어서 10분거리에 있어 산책으로 걸어가기에도 멀지않아 좋았습니다.
숙소가 깨끗하고, 호스트가 매우 친절합다. 주변 맛집이나 명소들을 추천해주셔서 좋았고, 공항 픽업,드랍 차량도 예약해 주셔서 편하게 이동 했습니다🥰
아름다운 도시 다낭에서 즐겁게 잘 쉬다 돌아왔습니다. 감사합니다💕

The place is exactly as described in the listing and as shown in the pictures: Super clean, neat with a great interior design. It does not take long to get comfortable and feel at home.
Ideal location, 7 minutes walk from the beach, peaceful residential neighborhood.
The host was responsive from beginning to end. She provided a full list of local recommendations and things to do 🙏 which my friends and I truly appreciated.
We had a great time and 100% recommend.

We would recommend this place to friends and family any day, it was just amazing!
Linh & Luan are the perfect hosts and they make you feel so welcomed, and besides from that they are attentive and easy to communicate with. The house is on a beautiful quiet street close to everything- like cafées and the beach, the place is clean, nice furnitures, details like plants and decorations, it feels very safe with the automatic door and the design is beautiful.
After seeing so many apartments in Da Nang for the last months being here I highly recommend Linhs place🙌

Very responsive host, great location with about 5 minutes walking distance to the most beautiful beach in Danang. Spacious and clean house with great interior design. Definitely will come back next time.

Probably the quietest accommodation in all of Da Nang.
I just wanted a place where I could sleep well at night, since I’m out and about during the day anyway — and this apartment absolutely delivered. It’s completely silent at night (as long as there aren’t any neighbors from India or Korea), with no street noise or construction sounds at all.
The apartment is spotlessly clean, and it’s just a short walk to the beach and many restaurants.
It was rly new apartment and I like it! Everything was perfect! Clean and neat!
The place was really beautiful and at a great location

Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ, thoáng mát và được trang trí tinh tế, mang lại cảm giác thoải mái như ở nhà. Vị trí thì quá tuyệt, gần biển, dễ dàng di chuyển đến các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng của Đà Nẵng.
Điều làm tôi ấn tượng nhất chính là sự nhiệt tình và chu đáo của chủ nhà. Họ luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ tôi từ lúc đặt phòng đến khi kết thúc kỳ nghỉ, trả lời mọi thắc mắc một cách nhanh chóng và thân thiện. Chính sự chăm sóc tận tình này đã giúp kỳ nghỉ của tôi trở nên trọn vẹn và ý nghĩa hơn rất nhiều.
Tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay lại và giới thiệu căn hộ này cho bạn bè, người thân khi có dịp đến Đà Nẵng! Cảm ơn chủ nhà rất nhiều vì sự hỗ trợ tuyệt vời!
非常好的房子，Vincent很热情友好，地理位置优越，离各个景点都很近，房子很舒适，在岘港度过了很愉快的三次，强烈推荐！

We had a comfortable time here before coming to Phu Quoc. Vincent is very warmly welcoming, he has useful instructions. The new house and he said we were the first guest, it was very modern and luxurious beauty, everything was surprisingly clean. Can walk to the nearby beach to swim in the afternoon, Da Nang sea is really clean. Good proposal and great experience when we have just returned to Da Nang, unfortunately we are late and the international fireworks festival ends. Thanks again Vincent

Vincent was friendly and warmly welcomed us. He had good recommendations for our dinner at the nearby seafood restaurant. Everything was very convenient and clean for the new home, will definitely come back
정말 만족스러웠습니다
Great place! Everything matched the description — clean, cozy, and comfortable. The host was responsive and helpful. I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend it!

I stayed 3 days here. The room is very clean and exactly like in the pictures. The host is very friendly and responsive.
There are great restaurants near the location and 15 mins walk to the beach. I’m gonna stay here every time I come to Danang. Great place.

Phuoc's home is 5' on foot from the beach and the crowded area. It is just above a mini market which is very nice! There are cafés, restaurants and juice shops in the area and it is very quiet. The room is clean, has natural light, a kitchen and a very small balcony. Phuoc is very friendly and responds very fast if you need anything. Also the people cleaning the room are very friendly! There is a washing machine and a terrace for shared use. We enjoyed our stay.

The apartment is just like the picture, very quiet, airy, just a few minutes walk to the beach, there is a motorbike parking space, there is a minimart on the 1st floor which is very convenient, it operates 24/7. The neighbors are happy and friendly. The host is enthusiastic, comfortable, and supports very quickly when needed. There is a delicious seafood restaurant near the apartment and a laundry shop with cheap prices. Will come back next time. Thanks!
Host is very nice and easy to work with.
Thank you

I recently stayed at Thuan’s place and it truly exceeded my expectations. The cleanliness and beautiful decoration made me feel right at home. The neighborhood is incredibly convenient,  with plenty of food options nearby. What's more, the host was exceptionally kind, attentive, and flexible, making sure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to others.
매달 다낭을 방문하지만 이가격에 이런 숙소는 거의 없음.이정도 숙소를 얻으려면 평균 한화로 최하 5만원부터 시작해야함.이른 아침부터 공사소음,음식판매 소음도 없고 늦은 시간에 술모임 소음도 없음.또하나 엘리베이터 속도가 한국하고 거의 비슷함 베트남 자주 다닌분들은 왜 이게 좋은점인지 아실뜻^^.100점 만점에 95점이상.다음달도 또 예약함.
It is my second time turning to her apartment for my buz trip and I felt really comfortable. I love running, this is the perfect place for me to run daily along the river with sunshine.
Thank you for taking care of my family x

chỗ ở tầm nhìn đẹp, nội thất đầy đủ,không gian thoải mái, cách âm tốt nên rất yên tĩnh gia đình mình ngủ rất ngon. Chủ nhà nhận thông tin, phản hồi và xử lý nhanh chóng. Riêng có một điều phiền toái nhỏ là khi ở chỉ có 1 thang máy nên chờ đợi khá lâu và thường xuyên chật chỗ.

We had a wonderful stay! Hang and Phuong were very easy to communicate with and always available whenever we needed support. Their responsiveness made everything smooth and stress-free. The place looked exactly like the photos—clean, cozy, and well-equipped with everything you might need for a 5-day trip. We especially loved the great beach nearby and the stunning sunrise and sunset views. Highly recommended!

The place is very quiet and peaceful despite being right by the beach and all of the fun things that go on there.  The apartment features stunning city and coastal views since it sits on the corner of a high floor.  The host was very kind and responsive.  There is a small supermarket next door should you require any late night snacks or drinks.  The beach across the street is perfect for swimming.  The water is very clear and you will see fish and other marine life swimming about you.  I enjoyed my stay here and will be back soon.

The room is spacious and offers a lovely view through the surrounding glass windows. It has been newly renovated, so everything feels fresh and clean, though there is a slight unpleasant smell. The staff are very responsive and supportive. It’s just a 2-minute walk to the beach, and the highlight of the building is the charming terrace just outside the lobby.

급하게 비행기가 새벽에 출발해서 찾았지만, 캐리어 보관도 해주시고 체크인 시간도 조정해주셔서 부담없이 여행 마지막날 즐기고 갈 수 있었습니다.
바로 앞에는 해변이 보이고, 위치도 좋았습니다.

We had a pleasant stay at Da-Nang, thanks to the efforts of Hang and Oanh. Oanh helped us with early check-in, considering the fact that we were travelling with a baby. And, Hang constantly kept checking about our comfort.
The room itself is beautiful, clean and has a great view. The kitchen is functional and clean. It's also right opposite the beach. The picture and the room match exactly.
Would recommend highly.
很舒服的公寓，在这里安静的待了5天（只不过隔壁在装修有时候有点噪音）不过时间不长都是下午，很喜欢这里风景很好！希望下次回来还能入住，管家回复也很及时，也会安排打扫～ 棒
Beautiful and clean room with a sea view — the beach is just across the road. There are cafes and a grocery store nearby. Great location!

Here’s a polished version of your review that keeps your honesty, appreciation, and professional tone intact while clearly stating your concern:
What an amazing stay overall! The location was perfect and the staff? Absolutely AWESOME. I typically don’t need much help when I travel since I’m very self-sufficient, but the team went above and beyond—truly top-notch hospitality.
That said, I was really disappointed to find out that the gym and pool—two key reasons I chose this property—were not accessible during my stay. Unfortunately, I wasn’t informed ahead of time, and I was actually escorted out of the gym by a Signature employee, which was pretty embarrassing. As a travel blogger, I had content scheduled around those amenities, so a heads-up would’ve saved me time, money, and a good amount of frustration.
Still, the view, the location, and the staff were all on point. I can't justify giving a lower rating because everything else was fantastic. I would definitely stay here again —but

J’ai passé un séjour de 2 nuits!
Top! À deux pas de la plage Mai Thai et proche de nombreux restaurants!
Je recommande!
아주만족합니다. 재방문의사 있고, 호스트 아주빠른 피드백을 제공합니다.
Oanh was very nice and helpful . Highly recommend
La mejor opción frente a una playa tranquila y con poca gente. Volveré pronto!
We had a pleasant stay, would definitely recommend.
조용하고 시설자체가 깔끔 했습니다
That is a perfect place to stay. It’s beyond my expectations!
Great. Luxury. High quality. Top service.
easy place to stay and comfy

Our stay at Huong’s place was excellent! It was exactly like the photos and very clean and comfortable. The location was close to the beach and restaurants which really enhanced our stay. Huong was prompt and friendly in communication. A beautiful private rooftop terrace was a nice feature to relax after a long day. A must stay in Da Nang!

The studio is a perfect reflection of the photos, brand new and spotlessly clean. It's equipped with all the essentials for a comfortable long-term stay, including weekly cleaning services. The location is also great with plenty of restaurants and activities just around the corner. The host is not only friendly but also incredibly helpful, providing excellent local recommendations and responding promptly to any inquiries.
excellent place and stay for the price. would recommend, especially to backpackers who wants a break from hostels.

Duoc and his team is very responsive and helpful. They make sure they make your stay in DaNang as enjoyable as possible. The place is great and there are many restaurants and some quality cafes around.

they have a team to support all my needs, really helpful and friendly.
the room is small, but easy walking to the beach. sound insultion is just so so, so really depends on your neighbor.

matched the description.
good a/c
hot water
good wifi
Great value
would stay again
度过了愉快的两个晚上～房间非常整洁，大家也非常友善❤️😊
I had a pleasant stay. The host was friendly and quick to respond to any questions.
Very friendly and was a good stay. I would stay again.
다음에또갈듯

place is exactly what you see in the advertisement, free cleaning everyday if you'd like to, there's a building construction beside the place, it didn't bother me since i sleep well, 10mins walk from the beach, will definitely recommend this place and consider to stay if im in Danang

Super comfy and clean studio apartment! Felt right at home, there was a bit of construction outside but it didn’t bug me at all! Area is generally on the quiet end, and easy to commute around! :)
host young chan is super responsive and helpful!

The apartment is very clean and matches the description and photos. Daily cleaning was offered.
A minor downside is that there’s construction nearby, which can be noisy in the mornings, but the host informed us about it in advance

Apartments is really good. Every detail was a pleasant experience. Host is a good person and always to respond. Place has a good location but there is one thing that you should to know. Construction are really noisy and it's so close to the apartments. So if you don't like noisy places it's not working. But everything is super good.

We spent a week at Young Chan's apartment. Perfect stay. Good wifi, AC, hot shower, comfortable, and well.designed studio. Appreciated the washmachine and drying rack on balcony. Apt is quiet. Near park with local activites. Walkable to beach and An Thong restaurants. Lotte Mart just over bridge.  Young Chan easy to contact, held our luggage until checkin. Highly recommend for an economical stay!

We had an exceptional stay at this property, perfectly situated just a 15-minute walk from the beautiful My Khe Beach. The convenience factor was outstanding - the neighborhood offers numerous mini markets, charming coffee shops, and various restaurants to explore. We were pleasantly surprised to find a bus station nearby that connects to the iconic Dragon Bridge in only 10 minutes.
The accommodation itself was immaculate, fully equipped with all necessary amenities that made us feel completely at home. Chan was an exemplary host - incredibly helpful and maintaining excellent communication throughout our stay. We wholeheartedly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Nang!
Very comfortable and clean stay. The host communicated promptly. Unit is exactly like the pictures shown
Place is clean like the photos. Young chan is very responsive
A nice apartment not far from the beach—very clean, cozy, and well-equipped with all the necessary amenities. I really enjoyed my stay.

Young Chan is such a gentleman. I had trouble with something (not related to his home) at midnight and had to wake him up. He was extremely kind and helpful and took care of me. He actually stayed up until almost 2am searching for answers for me. He was always super responsive and helpful with everything.
The room is clean and very quiet. I saw people complain about the construction in the reviews but it’s barely audible.
Wonderful place to stay. I will 100% go back again when I visit Da Nang.
Thank you for everything!!

It was very nice to stay for the first day of trip. There is a convenience store nearby. I highly recommend it!
And there was no construction when I was staying. So it was really quiet.

We had to switch our accommodation in the middle of our trip due to dissatisfaction of a previous accommodation. We booked this place on the day of, and I am so glad we did. We felt much more comfortable - the place was exactly as pictured and described. We are also very grateful for the host to quickly accommodate our request. There is construction in the morning, but we had to wake up early anyways, so it wasn't a big deal. Overall, I highly recommend!

Place is a bit out of the way from the busier streets, but you can easily get around with a Grab. It's clean, good AC, comfy bed, I was offered cleanings for the apartment, nearby a lot of great restaurants within a 10-15 walk. Host is very responsive.
Only minor complaints are there's no detergent for the washer, but Young Chan was able to get me enough for 1-2 loads so don't be afraid to ask. Also, the building next door just started construction and was awakened at 6AM, keep that in mind if you're sensitive to noise. This is out of the owners control, so I don't blame them.
メッセージを送るとすぐに返信が来てとてもありがたかったです。チェックイン、チェックアウトどちらもとてもスムーズで快適でした。

Хозяин и персонал приветливые, разрешили оставить на день багаж после выселения. Перед подтверждение брони предупредили, что под окном стройка в дневное время, но мне было не критично.
Всё чисто и классный дизайн. Двери открываются по карточке, а парковка для байка внутри дома, в парадной.
Постельное бельё синтетическое.
Хотя кухня и есть, на ней нет соли и масла. Так что даже если приезжаете на один день и хотите приготовить что-то, придется покупать масло и соль самостоятельно.
Вытяжка уходит просто в шкаф, надеюсь хозяин доделает.
Great place! Such a nice apartment and good location. Had all the amenities you could need and was spotless! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Really good location walking distance to some of the best beaches in Asia.  Food nearby. Host was very nice and helpful good comms.  Place is new and very clean.

Жилье соответствует фотографиям. Очень уютная студия. Удобная кухня, кровать, стол для работы и еды. Есть балкон. Два кондиционера. Стиральная машина. Все что нужно для комфортного пребывания) уборка предлагалась каждый день. Все новое и чистое)
Единственное это не самое удобное расположение - вокруг только дома и мусор на дорогах + стройка. Но если ездить на байке, то все супер.
Из плюсов расположения - рядом круглосуточный магазин, в 5 минутах есть кофейня. Море также находится не очень далеко
Was very good! Thanks again
房间很干净，位置很好，没有想象中的大
Very responsive host. Good place and location
ベッドと寝具が快適ではないでした。
It's a good place for short duration as we stayed there 2-3 days. not very far from the city and you can find grab taxi easily.
There’s construction going on a few meters away 7am-5pm. If you’re up and out then it’s 5 stars. If you need to rest in it will be difficult.
房间内部面积和空间很大，床上比较干净，室内绿植很美，采光较好，空调制冷效果略显不足，总体值得居住。位置离海滩比较近，附近步行可达的都是本地人吃的大排档，休息日晚上会有唱歌声音，但会及时结束，不影响休息。
It was great choosing this place. It is near too many places to visit. The host is too friendly and always there to help. Thank you man for your small surprise. Very nice place to stay

Fantastic stay! The apartment was spotless, well-equipped, and had everything we needed for a comfortable visit. The location couldn’t be better—just a short walk to the beach, with plenty of great restaurants and bars nearby. The building itself is beautiful and easy to find. Overall, a perfect place to stay, and I will definitely be coming back!
Phòng sạch sẽ,  rộng rãi với bếp riêng và nhiều cây xanh. Tôi rất thích mùi hương của cây hoa ở ban công. Vị trí thuận tiện.  Tôi sẽ quay lại lần tới.
Mình nhận phòng buổi đêm nhưng thủ tục nhận phòng rất dễ dàng, nhanh chóng, chủ nhà thoải mái, giúp đỡ mình nhiều, dễ thương. Cảm ơn các bạn nhiều 🥰🥰
部屋以外の排水溝？トイレの匂いが充満していて我慢するのが大変でしたが、それ以外の部屋の内装やケアしていただいた内容には大満足でした！ありがとうございました。
Phòng ở sạch sẽ chủ nhà phản hồi nhiệt tình nhanh chóng. Nhất định có cơ hội sẽ quay lại

Ci siamo trovati benissimo. La stanza era splendida, la migliore trovata finora in questo viaggio in giro per il Vietnam. Ottimo prezzo per quel che viene offerto. Abbiamo adorato la possibilità di farci un bagno caldo. Gli host sono stati molto reattivi rispetto alle nostre richiestw
e, abbiamo ricevuto subito rapido riscontro e ci hanno aiutato ad organizzare i nostri spostamenti verso la meta successiva. Ci hanno anche lasciare i nostri zaini in custodia fino a sera, cosa che abbiamo molto apprezzato. Peccato non essere rimasti di più, consigliatissimo.
房间很漂亮，很大。厨房也很方便。我们在房间内拍了很多照片，非常好。我们还想续住的，但是已经没有日期可以继续住了。我们只好又换了其他的酒店。唯一不足的应该是洗澡的热水不够。房东还给我们准备了摩托车。没有要押金和护照。价格也非常合适。如果大家有需要可以向房东询问。服务很好。
It is a good spot easy to go around very helpful host. We had a nice stay there.

Home sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, với mức giá này thực sự rất ok, tôi được home hỗ trợ ở phòng rất xinh mà giá hạt dẻ, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại khi đến đà nẵng,
Chỉ có 0,5 điểm trừ duy nhất là nước ở phòng tắm tầng 3 hơi yếu một xíu, nhưng tôi nghĩ tạm ok được,
Còn lại mọi thứ rất ok

Tôi đã có kì nghỉ rất tuyệt vời tại ChacaHouse. Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện, quan tâm tiếp đón khách, bất cứ khi nào chúng tôi cần đều phản hồi rất nhanh chóng và có nhiều dịch vụ đi kèm cần thiết làm chúng tôi rất hài lòng và vui vẻ. Sau này nếu có dịp tới Đà Nẵng tôi nhất định sẽ quay lại vì ngôi nhà khiến tôi có cảm giác thân thuộc gần gũi như ở nhà mình vậy.
진짜 너무 아주 좋은 곳이에요👍 집주인은 친절하고 필요할 때 항상 빨리 답장해주셨어요. 동네 맛집 추천해주시고 다양한 셔틀 서비스(오토바이, 택시,…) 다 있어요. 여러분~ 만약에 다낭에 가면 꼭 한번 잡아봐요.

L’appartement est joli, bien décoré, conforme aux photos et bien équipé, ce qui est appréciable. Cependant, plusieurs points ont affecté la qualité de notre séjour. L’environnement est extrêmement bruyant, avec des travaux à proximité et une très mauvaise isolation phonique. Le bruit est constant, de jour comme de nuit, ce qui rend le repos très difficile.
La salle de bain présente de nombreuses traces de moisissure, ce qui donne une impression de manque d’entretien. De plus, la pression de l’eau est très faible, et il est compliqué d’obtenir de l’eau chaude de façon stable, ce qui peut être particulièrement inconfortable.
Concernant l’emplacement, il est à environ une heure de marche du centre-ville. Cela ne nous a pas dérangés car nous aimons marcher, mais c’est un point à prendre en compte. La plage est heureusement très proche (5 minutes à pied).
Our favourite stay so far. Very unique architecture, nice vibes and close to sea!
Intéressante décoration intérieure, mais le logement est excentré par rapport à la ville
Sehr nette Leute immer erreichbar und immer passende Empfehlungen
Such a lovely stay. Highly recommend
Mận is very sweet, communicative and especially was extremely helpfull when I fell ill. She ordered rice for me when the neighbouring restaurant had already closed. <3

Insgesamt war es ein angenehmer Aufenthalt. Wir durften vor dem eigentlichen Check In bereits in die Wohnung, was wir sehr nett fanden!! Besonders gut war das Bett, sehr gemütlich und einladend! Die Küche war groß und man hatte viel Platz + einige Dinge wie Kaffee, Wasser, Tee und Nudelsuppen standen bereit. Leider fand ich das Bad nicht ganz so toll, sehr eng und beim duschen wurde alles inklusive Toilette nass. Nach einem Tag roch es etwas muffig, weil man nur über die Balkontür lüften konnte (was abends aber zu laut war) Die Strandnähe war super und man ist mit dem Taxi oder Grab schnell in die Innenstadt gekommen. Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich! ACHTUNG: Karaoke-Bar in der Nähe, es kann abends mal lauter werden!
Chaca house is beautiful and the host is very responsive. A couple of small improvements will be to make the lock and key easier to use.
Such a unique living experience! Never stayed anywhere else like it. Would 10/10 stay again if I’m here again! Thank you!
It’s a wonderful piece of Architecture and interiors. Quality of natural light is awesome.
Thật tuyệt vời khi trải qua kì nghỉ honeymoon tại đây, phòng trang trí y hình ảnh, đối diện có quán Hải Sản cực ngon và rẻ.

We stayed at this Airbnb for two weeks and had a wonderful time—it truly felt like home! The room was very new, impeccably clean, and cozy, with modern decor and comfortable furniture. It was the perfect space for the two of us to relax and unwind, complete with thoughtful touches like natural lighting that brightened the room beautifully and a warm atmosphere. We also loved the rooftop, which offered a stunning view of the mountains—absolutely breathtaking! The owners were so friendly, making our stay even more enjoyable. We loved it and would definitely return!

Kim was more than catering :) She helped me greatly with any requests. The Air BnB felt like a luxury stay with an amazing view that both me and my partner loved! The Air BnB was close to everything you could want or need. I’d highly recommended Kim to any fellow travels :)

I really enjoyed my stay at Kim’s place! Their house is very beautifully designed and modern and the rooms were very comfortable and luxurious! If you want somewhere more private and serene near the mountains and away from the craziness of the city, you will enjoy your stay here!

Exceptional home with exceptional hosts! Kim and her husband were friendly, helpful and lovely to get to know. I had privacy in the home, but they were always on hand to answer any questions I had about the area. Really enjoyed my stay, hope to visit again!

Wer eine ruhige Gegend mit einer Berglandschaft bevorzugt, ist hier genau richtig. Das Haus ist super modern und mit allem ausgestattet. Das Zimmer hat eine schöne Aussicht und ist sehr sauber. Die Familie ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit

Kim's bolig har været en tryk og god base, for min kæreste og jeg, til at udforske Da Nang og det omkringliggende område.
Kim og hendes familie har været meget imødekommende og søde. vi har samtidig haft et dejligt stort, og moderne værelse, med god Aircon og generelt gode faciliteter.
udsigten fra vores værelse var fantastisk.
Kim og hendes mand har hjulpet os meget med anbefalinger og forskellige ting vi kom i tvivl om under opholdet.
Min kæreste og jeg har været meget glade for opholdet, og ville gerne være blevet flere dage, hvis tiden var til det.
vi anbefaler begge to, meget varmt et ophold hos Kim og hendes familie.
Tak for nogle dejlige dage i Da Nang

If I go back to Da Nang I’ll definitely try to stay at Phouc’s place again. He was informative, professional and an excellent host. His place is located over a convenience store, next to really good restaurants and cafes. For being in such a central location it was still pretty quiet. You can walk to the beach in just a few minutes where there was even more amenities available.
Thank you Phuoc 🌸

Phuoc was very kind and responded quickly with everything. Great location with a convenience store on the first floor. Smooth and very welcoming check in! He provided a list of restaurants and activities to do. Definitely recommend ☺️ Will be back to stay again!
Host nhiệt tình

위치가 상당히 좋아요 미케비치가 가깝고 안뜨엉거리도 가깝습니다 1층에24시간 마트가 있는것도 상당히 좋은 조건입니다
룸 상태도 채광이좋았고 깨끗하고 암막커튼이라 사생활보호도 좋아요
다낭은 발전하고 있는 도시이며 장담하건데 어디숙소를 가시더라도 약간의소음은 있을수있습니다
이숙소선택에 저는 굉장히 만족하며8박9일간의 여행을 마무리 하였습니다

Phuoc is a very nice host. He was responsive to all my requests from renting a motorbike from day one to anything I asked during my stay. The apartment is exactly like shown in the photos and the location is in walking distance to the beach, restaurants and shops. The 24hr. market downstairs was convenient for late night snacks and sundries that I needed in a bind. You will not be disappointed in staying here while you explore the beautiful city of DaNang.
Clean and bright place with excellent location, just minutes walking to the beach. There is a minimart downstairs which is very convenient. Phuoc is very friendly and attentive. Highly recommended !

The good thing about staying at this house is as follows.
1. It was close the beach, so it was good to enjoy walking
2. When I asked the host, he responded right away
3. This house is clean and relatively quiet

Phước’s apartment is a very convenient spot near My Khe and the foreigner’s section that is walkable, central, and provides the amenities needed for a 5- to 15-day stay. The street outside is sometimes a little noisy, but it’s not that big of a deal. Wifi and AC both work well, and Phước is a very proactive and helpful host. It’s certainly worth the money, and a good spot if you’re looking for an inexpensive option that still has everything you need.

Quiet apartment, private, nice view of the street and the sea. I can use the rooftop all the time with sea and mountain view. Convenient around with many big restaurants. big minimart on the 1st floor. the host is very friendly, guides the things around, enthusiastic. We will come back. Highly recommended place. Thanks you so much!

The apartment is simple, modern, cozy, with a very beautiful view, just a few steps out the main door and you will reach the beautiful sea. There is a convenient minimart on the 1st floor, with everything I need. A place worth staying for a long time. Phuoc very kind and helpful. Highly recommended!

Es war eine super positive Erfahrung.
Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und modern eingerichtet.
入住方便，沟通顺畅。描述如实，推荐
Clean place, close to the beach.
모든면에서 좋았습니다
The host was very responsive and always helpful. My stay was very pleasant!
Rất tuyệt vời, nhân viên nhiệt tình

새로 지어진 숙소라서 매우 깨끗하고 넓었다. 세탁기도 있어서 무료로 세탁이 가능했고 주방시설 또한 완벽하게 갖추어져 있었다.
숙소는 해변과 매우 가까웠으며 주변에는 상점과 식당이 많이 있었다. 속소는 골목을 몇걸음 들어간 위치라 아주 조용했으며, 24시간 리셉션 운영으로 보안도 좋았다.
이 숙소는 미케비치와 주변을 즐기기에 최고의 장소였다.
직원들은 친절했는데 특히 한국말을 할줄 아는 여자 직원은 매우 상냥하고 친절했다.
호스트는 응답이 빨랐고 여러 상황에 적절히 응대해 주었으며 사소한 문제도 적극적으로 나서서 해결해 주었다.
이 호스트는 정말 책임감이 강하고 믿을만한 호스트이다. 나는 호스트와 숙소를 적극 추천하며 이 호스트가 운영하는 숙소는 무조건 믿고 갈 수 있을 것이다.

아직 공사가 다 끝나지도 않았는데
운영을 하시는점이 아쉽습니다.
너무 어수선합니다.
냉장고 위와 내부도 지저분하고
바닥에도 얼룩이 많았습니다.
거실에도 에어컨이 없어서 너무 더워요
Logement près de la mer et super propre facile d’accès
위치도 좋고 깔끔하며 요청사항도 바로 해결이 됩니다 감사합니다
Everything was perfect! The apartment was spotless, well-equipped, and in a great location. The host was super helpful and quick to respond. I really enjoyed my stay and would love to come back!
View đẹp rất tuyệt vời
Excellent room for the price point. Host was super nice and made my stay very enjoyable. The view from the balcony is amazing. Would reccomend staying here
숙소는 머물기 편했습니다.
Top 👍 🙌
Super Zimmer und sehr preiswert
War super ! Gerne wieder !
Phòng sạch mới và sạch đẹp. Chị chủ thân thiện, dễ mến.

Ms. Linh and her daughter were absolutely lovely hosts, and the room was comfortable and quiet. If I'm ever back in Da Nang then I'd definitely love to stay here again (and for a while longer next time)!

Where do I start? we initially planned to stay here for 2 days and ended up extending our stay instead, the rooms are exactly as described and Ms linh is a very friendly, cooperative and flexible host. She gave us an early check in, and late check out. This is just to say the least, she and her cute family have been so helpful in guiding us and making our visit to danang a pleasant and warm stay. We definitely found a friend in Ms.linh and will be contacting her for anything related to and in danang.  💫🥰
Très bon logement et très agréable hôte. Je recommande. Ils sont très arrangeants
Sehr zu empfehlen
Tôi đã có thời gian trải nghiệm rất thú vị, thư thái cùng gia đình tại Brio. Chúng tôi rất thích căn hộ này. Chúng tôi sẽ quay trở lại vào dịp gần nhất.
Chỗ ở dễ tìm, view đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình
ok
really beautiful place. Perfect for my honeymoon. The place was clean with spacious bathtub. the check in is easy and the staffs are all amazing and very helpful throughout our stay

This was the best hotel I’ve ever stayed in, the attentive staff were very helpful and friendly, we felt right at home straight away.
The room is so beautiful, exactly like the photos.
Lots of amazing little details like the welcome drink and picking the scent for body wash etc was amazing. I’ll definitely be back to the memory next time I’m in Da Nang.

Just STUNNING! I highly recommend this gem in the middle of Da Nang.
Very well located between Cau Rong and the beach. It’s a boutique hotel developed on different floors.
The room was spacious, cozy and luxurious with a majestic bath tub in the middle of the washrooms.
Teas and snacks were complementary from the hotel, so was breakfast.
Excellent service from all staff!
10/10
Unique design! A short walk from the beach and has a good number of restaurants around. Good for value.
This Boutique hotel is really special among a sea of hotels in the area. Highly recommend. If you’re sensitive to noise, bring earplugs as there is lots of construction and traffic noise.

Die Unterkunft war wunderbar! Ganz tolles Zimmer, Service und essen! Die Menschen sind sehr freundlich, sprechen super englisch und es gab zum Abschied sogar noch eine kleine Tonfigur 🥰
Ich kann diese Unterkunft wärmstens empfehlen und werde nicht das letzte Mal da gewesen sein.

Очень комфортные и необычные апартаменты, понравилось внимание к деталям. Отдельное спасибо ребятам Ryan, Alice, Emma, Jerry за гостеприимство, приятно было находиться в этой гостинице , увидимся в будущем
We had a lovely time staying at the Memory, Danang! The service, location, and cleanliness were excellent. I highly recommend it!
Overall the place is beautiful and very well kept.  The room is smaller than it looks in the picture but very clean and comfortable.  The breakfast was amazing.  Very friendly and helpful staff

Wonderful stay, there isn’t a better location and service for price. The staff was awesome and went above and beyond to accomodate our every need not just with our accomodation but also our experience in Da Nang
The rooms felt 5 star very clean and well maintained
Sehr zuvorkommendes und hilbereites Personal. War eine super Erfahrung, gerne wieder!
Incredibly friendly, super cool place. Highly recommended!!
Parfait
Great spot

Một kì nghỉ hè vô cùng tuyệt vời. Với cá nhân tôi, Trang là một người vô cùng hiếu khách và vui tính. Tư vấn cho chúng tôi từ bữa sáng cho đến các địa điểm du lịch vô cùng chi tiết.
Bữa sáng ở đây thực sự là một điểm không thể nào chê được. Nó quá ngon!!!. Ngoài ra, chúng tôi còn được 1 ly đồ uống rất ngon nữa. Không những thế, giặt đồ hoàn toàn miễn phí. Điều này đỡ cho chúng tôi rất nhiều khoản chi phí ( vì tôi mang không nhiều quần áo ha ha )
Đây chính là kì nghỉ hè đáng nhớ nhất của tôi. Cảm ơn Coco Villa 6 và Trang đã cho tôi 1 kì nghỉ hè tuyệt vời.

Hữu duyên tìm được căn này mà mê luôn. Chủ nhà Trang siêu nhiệt tình và thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng giúp đỡ. Phòng thì rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, giá còn siêu rẻ. Di chuyển đến các khu du lịch cũng tiện nữa. Siêu rcm nhaâ 🤩
Chỗ ở yên tĩnh, sạch đẹp, an ninh tốt. Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Dịch vụ tốt, chuyên nghiệp. Khu vực xung quanh đẹp, gần biển và nhà hàng.

Hana House was fantastic in every way. The actual property is even better than the photos. The location is perfect with easy access to everything, and the beach is just a short walk away. The host was very responsive and resolved any questions promptly. Highly recommend for a comfortable and convenient stay.

Beautiful property. Thu was very responsive and courteous. I’d recommend staying here. Walking distance to the beach and great restaurants. Great deal it’s a steal to be honest. Anytime I’m in Da Nang I’ll stay here!
골목 안쪽에 있어 숙소를 찾기 어려울 수 있으나, 호스트가 안내를 자세히 해주셔서 바로 찾을 수 있었습니다. 또한 호스트는 응답이 매우 빠르고 친절하셨습니다. 숙소는 사진 그대로 크고 청결하여 좋은 시간을 보내기 딱이었고, 미케비치 거의 바로 앞이라 위치 접근성 너무 좋았습니다!

명시된 시설 완비되어있으며 최고로 빠른 피드백이 너무 좋음. 처음에는 숙소 찾는게 어려울것 같았지만 도로에서 너무나도 찾기 쉽게 되어있음 . 방도 사진으로 보는 것 그대로임 . 가성비 자체는 최고수준
필요한 것이 있을때 연락하면 거의 실시간으로 소통가능함. 시설 청결도 최상. 너무 더운 날씨였는데 실내 에어컨 컨디션 최고 . 전체적으로 넓고 크진 않지만 전혀 불편함이 없는 시설임 . 흡연실도 1층 뒷편에 아주 깔끔하게 되어있음 . 같이 간 흡연자도 전혀 불편함을 느끼지 못했다고 함. 바로 옆은 해변이 있으며 교통도 도로 옆에 있어서 그랩이나 택시 이용 편함. 여행이 끝난 뒤 같이 간 일행이 휴대폰 분실하고 왔는데 바로 확인 뒤 한국으로 배송해주심 . 한국이 아닌 나라에서 이런 경우 처음 겪음 . 호스트가 진짜 양심 있고 정직하며 헌신적인 듯 함. 필요한 모든 부분 해결해주는 해결사 느낌임 . 여행 기간 동안 날씨도 좋지 않고 너무 덥기도 했지만 숙소에 대한 불편은 아예 없었음. 마지막 날 항공권 시간이 오후 12시여서 예약없으면 약간의 비용으로 늦은 퇴실도 가능함. 다음에도 다낭을 다시 오게 되면 맘편하게 예약하고 싶은 숙소임

호스트의 응답이 빠르며 매우 친절했습니다.
내집처럼 편했으며 모든면이 만족스러웠습니다.
다만 바선생이 조금 있습니다. 이건 호텔아닌이상 어디든 나올수있는거라
잘 처리하지 못하시는분들은 고려하시면 좋을것같습니다.

Great accommodation for friends or family. Located right next to the beach in a residential area but still close to everything like restaurants, shops, etc.
Hoai was a very accommodating host, super helpful and responsive. We very enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this place! Would come back!

너무 깔끔하고 친절하게 대해주셔서 고마웠고,
피드백이 빨라서 좋았습니다.
잘 쉬다가 갑니다.
다낭에 또 온다면 무조건 여기 올거에요!
큰길가에 근처에 있어서 교통이 너무 편리하고 호스트 응답도 엄청 빨랐습니다. 그리고 체크인 할 때 마중 나와서 반겨주었습니다.  만약 다시 온다면 무조건 이 숙소를 찾을 것 입니다!

I with my friends great time in here, everything is new, the flowers and the back yard is very chill!!! It's near My Khe Beach, but unlucky that it's raining in Da Nang now. Love to book again in the next time come to Da Nang!
숙소가 너무 깨끗하고 좋았습니다  신경을 많이 쓴 기분을 받았고 체크인과 체크아웃을 도와주셨습니다.

현지 인들 집인근에 있는 깔끔한숙소라
현지감성도 느낄수 있어서 좋음
숙소는 매우 깨끗함

정말 모든게 만족스러운 airbnb였음.
다시 꼭 방문하고 싶음.
주변에 공사를 하는곳이 있는게 단점이지만 숙소 자체는 완전 만족입니다.

Y was incredibly accommodating and friendly during my stay. I arrived at 1:00 AM, and he went above and beyond to ensure a smooth check-in process. The apartment matched the description perfectly. I highly recommend staying here!

Студия очень понравилась, находится в дали от шума, шум раз был только от соседей-жильцов. Я тут смогла высыпаться, т.к. у меня чуткий сон. Еще тут  мягкая кровать, что редкость для недорого жилья. Хозяин любит свои квартиры и следит за ними, так же помогал мне, если чего-то не хватало: приносил утюг, отдельный подододеяльник. Клиент после меня приезжал позже, поэтому мне дали 2часа дополнительно отдохнуть в аппартаментах. Wifi был с хорошим сигналом, письменный стол и кровать очень удобные, напор воды в душе хороший и вода быстро уходила в слив, ванная комната не была мокрой. Фото полностью соответствуют квартире, столовые приборы, посуда. Какие-то кафе и магазины с аптеками есть в 5-7 минутах ходьбы. Легко вызвать такси до центра и больших супермаркетов, в среднем 22 000 донгов. Квартира стоит своих денег однозначно. Хотя я придирчива, поэтому укажу минусы: нет розеток в ванной комнате и продлить бронь нельзя, все недорогое занято 😄 Бронируйте сильно заранее, за 10дней хотя б!

Chủ nhà cực kỳ nhẹ nhàng và thân thiện, ngoài ra còn có hướng dẫn tự nhận phòng khi check-in sau giờ quy định. Phòng giống như mô tả trong listing, tiện nghi cơ bản đều đáp ứng đủ nhu cầu của mình dành cho 1 người, chăn ga sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp nên không có gì để phàn nàn cả :) Nếu bạn đi một mình và muốn một nơi gần biển thì có thể thử ở đây

Host siêu nhiệt tình và hỗ trợ mọi lúc, mình có gặp một chút sự cố nhỏ khi nhận phòng nhưng host xử lý rất ổn thoả và khiến mình rất hài lòng. Phòng như mô tả và hệ thống thoát nước tốt, vị trí gần biển

Cong's accommodation was great to stay at. It was a few minutes walk to the beach, the street has tons of food places, lots of convenience stores and laundromats nearby as well, and some nice bars as well. The room was fine as well, clean, with all toiletries, and a very low price range. I'd be totally fine with staying here again.
挺好的，就是今天停电了，没有空调有点热，还有就是电梯由于没电无法正常使用，幸好隔壁房间的帅哥帮忙把我的行李箱从六楼搬下来，真的非常幸运

The room is quite cozy and full of necessary items. I really like the location, it is right at the sea and near local restaurants and many cafes. Below the building there is a spa shop so it is quite convenient. The owner is extremely friendly and supports me a lot in the process here.

An absolutely amazing stay! For such a good price. The staff are super helpful & friendly. The cleaner was so lovely too. The host was responsive. An amazing location. 5 min walk from 1000s of restaurants, bars, salons & the beach. I will definitely be staying here again!
Conveniently located. Clean. Quiet. Super nice staff, very helpful. Absolutely worth the price. Would stay here again!

The hotel was very close the the My An beach. I loved that everything I needed was in walking distance from the hotel.
Room is basic and cost but very comfortable and perfectly suited for 1 person.
I actually stayed here twice for short term.

Cong and team were incredibly helpful.
Room is clean, 4/5 quiet (noise in the hallway from guests with open doors, normal street noise that was pretty quiet), the mattress is medium/hard, but as soft as most mattresses here, and the washroom is a good size.
There is a concierge until 10pm and then a locked door with card entry.
there is a very good pho restaurant nearby.
one thing to ask about - I could not get the hot water to work for more than 2 minutes. many places in Vietnam have trouble with hot water working at all, so this is better than that, but still not ideal.

One of the nicest places I have stayed. The location is great. It was next to the beach with tons of restaurants and things to do. The two hostess ( Linda and Maria,  I gave them a Spanish name because I could not pronounce their Vietnamese name were exceptional and sweet). I will be back!!!!

Excellent choice if you're solo traveling on a budget. I'd say this is one step above a hostel where at least you have your own space. Nothing wrong with that as it's priced accordingly. Owner is very responsive and helpful even with late check-in.

합리적인 금액에 지내기 좋은 곳입니다. 스태프 분들께서 친절하시고, 적극적으로 도와주십니다. 주변엔 레스토랑들이 즐비해있고, 걸어서 바다 산책 가기 좋은 위치입니다. 베트남 집들이 전반적으로 바깥 소음이 크고, 여기도 비슷하지만 창문을 다 닫으면 소음이 많이 줄어듭니다.
숙소로써 갖춰야할 것은 모두 충분히 갖추었으면서, 가격도 합리적이라 다낭에 다시 방문하게될때 재방문할 생각이 있습니다.

ミーケビーチまで徒歩数分なので気軽に海で泳いだり、浜辺を歩けた。
周りにレストランやコンビニが多く1週間の滞在で困ることはなかった。
nice place! it’s also nearby the beach. host was also responsive even early in the morning. very reasonable price if you’re in Da Nang!

I stayed in Horizon for only 1 night and loved it. I was very lucky that they could help me out at short notice. The room I had was clean, comfortable, and full of equipments which was very good value. The location couldn’t really be more perfect - 5 minutes walk from the stunning My Khe beach and within walking distance of so many amazing cafes, restuarants etc. I love Da Nang, and this was a great place to be based. Ha - the owner is very polite, professional and friendly, and his staff are brilliant. The people at the massage place below are also super friendly.
great value for price, right by beach, higher quality than other stays i tried
clean room, helpful reception and very kind cleaner, close to restaurant and beach
Molto vicino al quartiere di My An e alla spiaggia. Stanza e zone comuni pulite e confortevoli. Host sempre disponibile e pronto a dare aiuto. Grazie mille!
Chủ nhà tốt bụng!

Cong is very friendly and proactive, and the hotel property is in a perfect location for those who wish to be near the beach and various restaurants in the tourist area. The room was also surprisingly peaceful despite the busy neighborhood, except for one night when other guests were partying in a nearby room. The photos are very inaccurate and should be fixed, however the room was bigger than in the photos and despite being slightly worn, was actually quite comfortable.
Wonderful stay at the Horizon – nothing too fancy and exactly as advertised. Very very nice staff that took care of my laundry, brought me fruit and kept my room clean. Thank you!

Cheap but completely furnished, with a mini fridge and a new air conditioner, this little hotel is close to the beach and offers comfortable rooms with a rooftop overlooking the sea. I enjoy everything about this place.

The room was big enough, the bed was very comfortable, shower pressure was great! Fridge in the room, bottles of water refreshed each day as well as towels. The woman at reception was so lovely, she went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable- she even changed my TV because the one in the room wasn’t working, which I really appreciated! She is a joy to speak to! You could barely hear any noise from outside despite it being in a very central busy area! 5 minutes walk to the beach too. The only ‘con’ is you can hear when people are in the corridor, and sometimes the other guests and the cleaners were quite loud, especially in the early morning. Maybe a reminder to everyone to be mindful of how echoey it is would help. Otherwise, I really enjoyed my stay and I would stay again. Extremely good value! Thank you ☺️
Great place, would highly recommend! :)

As a female solo traveler, I felt very safe here.  The building is new so no issues with mold or cockroaches as I’ve heard from other travelers who’ve had those issues in other apartments. About 5 min walking distance from the beach. Grocery stores and pharmacies near by. There’s a washer and drying rack in the roof but there’s also laundry services near by as well. AC works great. Overall very clean and maintained apartment. The host and his staff were very accommodating during my long stay here 😄. Would definitely stay here again if I come back to Da Nang.

I really enjoyed staying at Phuoc's place. The room is very nice and spacious, and it had everything I needed; a wonderful kitchen with lots of utensils and a huge fridge, a very large and comfortable bed, table and chairs, balcony, and very reliable WiFi. The host was very responsive, proactive, professional, helpful and kind. On the ground floor there is a shop and that was very convenient. It had everything I needed like water, milk, fruit, chocolates, and a lot more. There is also a washing machine. The location is superb. Very close to the beach, with many restaurants,  shops, and pharmacies nearby. I had a wonderful stay and I definitely recommend. The beach is absolutely gorgeous.

Looks like I’m exaggerating but this is one of the best guys and places I’ve stayed at. They are so helpful, friendly, kind and so responsive. Would recommend anyone to stay here who’s coming to Da nang.
nice studio apartment, few minutes walk to the beach, and really helpful hosts who checked in multiple times to make sure everything was good
Exactly what I expected..host is super friendly and available anytime 👍🏻
Excellent budget option for living near the beach My Khe Beach.
Good host and clean apartment. About 3 - 4 blocks from the beach.
Thank you so much.
Không bàn về giá thì phòng rất okay, mới, sạch sẽ, chất lượng chăn tốt, nệm êm. Nói chung okela

Vị trí nơi nghỉ thuận tiện di chuyển đến bãi biển
Apartment mới xây nên đẹp và sạch sẽ
Nhân viên nhiệt tình
Cảm giác ở 1 phòng mà đx bóc seal mọi thứ

This place is very new.. was worth the try..
Only one thing we didn't like is the air condition was very weak in our room, maybe thats why they provided a fan, even the lobby and all public areas was very humid.
Rooftop chill out area was nice.
They even let us to check out at 1pm which was nice gesture.
Phòng xinh ấm cúng, giường êm ngủ ngon, nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình 🩷

The location was great a bit noisy however the room was really not like in the pictures where the lights and colors were adjusted bathroom was common with the toilets no ventilation and the air conditioning blowing cold air exactly on the two beds whatever the settings

once in a lifetime opportunity to be the first to be in a new hotel, literally stickers still on the TV.  Great accommodations, wifi was fast 200mbs and when I had issues with wifi originally the owner was more than responsive to help me fix the issue
太吵了，房间装修不知道是为了省钱还是什么原因导致隔音非常差，尤其是阳台玻璃门，吵的我整晚睡不着
Photos showcase a specific unit. You will more than likely get a different unit that is different from the airbnb posting as seen in other reviews.

Friendly response from host.
Good location, just few mins to My Khe beach
The room has good design, just few things different as pictures.
Satisfied

The management and staff here are truly outstanding. Their communication through the Airbnb app was exceptional, consistently going above and beyond.
Whether you're a first-time visitor to Da Nang or returning for another adventure, this is the place you must check out. The location is unbeatable—just a short two-minute walk to the beach, with numerous restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.
I am so thrilled with my experience that I'm sharing this review in English and Korean to ensure that more people discover this fantastic spot. Highly recommended!
관리진과 직원들은 정말로 뛰어납니다. Airbnb 앱을 통한 그들의 소통은 뛰어났으며, 항상 기대 이상으로 최선을 다해주었습니다.
다낭을 처음 방문하는 분이든 다시 방문하는 여행자든, 꼭 이곳을 체크아웃해보세요. 위치는 그야말로 최고입니다—해변까지 단 2분 거리에 있으며, 많은 레스토랑과 바가 가까운 도보 거리에 있습니다.
저는 이곳에서의 경험에 너무 만족해서, 더 많은 사람들이 이 멋진 장소를 발견할 수 있도록 이 리뷰를 한국어와 일본어로 작성하고 있습니다. 강력 추천합니다!
Friendly staff, convenient and over all great value. Highly recommend!
Great location. Everything was brand new. 24hr reception. Would recommend
Great for a quick stay in a good location!
Nice place
굿
Great space
Chỗ ở rất tiện ra sân bay, phòng decor đẹp và đầy đủ, vệ sinh sạch sẽ, Bình trả lời rất nhanh
Chỗ ở thuận tiện, chủ nhà rất nice, highly recommend mn đặt phòng ở đây nhaaa

Sure! I had a wonderful stay at Binh's place. The accommodation was clean and cozy, with all the necessary amenities. Binh was a very friendly and helpful host, making the check-in process smooth and easy. He provided great tips about the area, which made my trip even more enjoyable. The location was also convenient, close to major attractions. I would definitely love to come back. Highly recommended!

It is an amazing location. Hardly 5 min walk to the airport if you take the inside lane that takes you right in front of the airport parking. It accomodated 3 of us comfortably. We checked out at 4 in the morning for our flight  and it was hassle free and smooth.

숙소에서 너무 편안한 시간을 보냈고 에어컨도 잘 작동 했습니다. 야간에 도착해서 직원이 잠을 자고 있었지만 벨을 여러번 누르면 일어나서 응대해줍니다. (사실 좀 미안한 마음이 느껴집니다…..ㅋ…)
대체로 공항에 가깝고 생각보다 소음도 없고 층고도 높기때문에 답답하지 않습니다. 가격대비 만족스러운 숙소👍👍

It is a clean n cozy place near the airport. Just 5min walk to the airport. Just one block behind is the airport. Not too noisy. Room is spacious n clean. Bed is also large for a double bed. My room was with fridge n microwaves. Highly recommended for those who needs to stay close to the airport

this is one of the best places that we stayed in Vietnam and I would highly recommend staying here for a short or long-term stay the owner and manager was extremely nice and kind to my elderly mother and helped us with so many needs and I can't even begin to explain I am so grateful for all of the staff to help that there are not enough words to type for my appreciation
숙소의 위치가 좋고 호스트는 빠른 답장과 원하는 것을 빠르게 처리해줍니다
아주 편히 쉴 수 있었습니다. 덕분에 훌륭한 여행을 만들 수 있었어요! 감사합니다 :)

空港からも歩いて15分ほどの距離でとてもアクセスが良かったです。飛行機の音もそれほど気になりません。
写真と一つ違った点は、トイレとシャワールームを隔てるガラス扉がなかった点ですが、それほど大きな問題ではありませんでした。
飛行機が遅れ、チェックインが深夜になってしまいましたが、快く対応してくださいました。また深夜に使えるgrabなども教えてくださり、スタッフはとても優しかったです。
チェックアウト後、スタッフはすぐに部屋に忘れ物がないか確認してくれました。私は携帯の充電器を忘れていたのですが、それに気づいて追いかけて届けてくれました。
またダナンに訪れた際は利用したいと思います！
とても親切な対応ありがとうございます:))
다낭 공항하고 가까운 숙소입니다. 사전에 안내도 잘 해주시고, 밤 늦게 도착한 여행객들이 잠깐 머물기 좋은 숙소 같습니다. 공항에서 그랩타고 편하게 오시는걸 추천해요

部屋が清潔なだけでなく、ダナンの観光地やグルメも紹介してくれました！
メッセージでのやり取りもスムーズで、楽しい滞在になりました！
親切なホストで柔軟にチェックインも対応していただけます。少し道がわかりづらく、夜だと不安に思われるかもしれませんが安全に過ごすことができました。お部屋も綺麗で写真通りでしたが、少し特殊な匂いがしたので苦手な方は注意が必要です。

Great for easy access to airport (5 min walking distance). Check-in was very easy.
A few comments would be: my bedsheets were stained, bed was rock hard, loud in the communal areas.
But look, you get what you pay for and I think if you want something super cheap with easy airport access, I would recommend.
Although I do suggest ear plugs as it was loud on the streets & planes landing/taking off above.
Thank you!
호스트분이 너무 친절하셨고 숙소에서 편하게 머물었습니다 감사합니다
The place is clean and the price is reasonable. The host is really friendly too.
все было прекрасно, дружелюбный и отзывчивый владелец. расположение чудесное, можно дойти пешком от аэропорта. тихо, уютно и красиво, 10/10, все было прекрасно!
Clean and close to the airport! I walked to the airport at 7am! Check in and out were smooth. The hotels is really pretty!
Amazing stay! We arrived very late after a flight and the staff was so helpful. They again were very helpful in the morning. I would 100% recommend.
Lovely host, super clean place. Looked exactly like pictures and right near da nang airport!

A quick taxi ride from the airport. Too long to walk from the airport with all the luggage (it looks right next door on the map, but the path for pedestrians winds all the way around), so just pay $2 for a grab.
Excellent host & room was as described. All staff were very friendly & helpful.
The only knock would be that the bathroom window didn't have a screen (none of the windows in Vietnam do), so your options were to either be eaten alive by mosquitoes (I got some big bug bites my first night; not a great way to start the trip) or not properly vent the bathroom. There was no fan and the window to the bathroom was facing the hall/main staircase of the homestay so people in other rooms or walking by above can see and hear inside your bathroom.
Binh was super helpful and responsive.
공항 바로 앞이라 야간 비행 후 0.5박 해결하기 좋았습니다. 3명이서도 충분히 묵을 수 있는 크기입니다👍🏻

Отличное чистое жилье, соответчики фотографиям на 100%.
Рекомендую 😌
Worth its price.

Great spot in Da Nang! I only stayed for 1 night, but it was perfect for what I needed. Found some good fruits and vegetables nearby at a local market just a few blocks away. Also enjoyed a little workout in the small park just in front of the apartment. Ha was a also very helpful host. Recommended.

I had a wonderful time staying here. The room is very beautiful and clean. Huynh is great host as she is very kind and responsive. It’s in a good location as well as it’s a short walk away from the beach and various restaurants. And at night the area is very quiet. I would recommend everyone to book here.

Very nice studio apartment. Quite spacious and yet cosy and comfortable. Very fast WiFi. Great location, not far from the beach, shops and restaurants. The host is very friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend.

This place is perfectly located in a quiet neighborhood and a nice coffee shop is nearby, the store is just beside the building. The host was beneficial in everything she replied to your message and lastly I am thankful she message me I forgot my shoes I was able to get it right away before we go to Hoi Ann. I will book again at this place the room spacious and clean.

We found the place very comfortable and aesthetically pleasing. Huynh was very responsive and big help throughout stay. Also, the neighbourhood was quiet and peaceful. We'd love to come back next time.

Very spacious apartment in a lovely and quiet neighborhood. I love seeing how the locals do their daily routine and hearing the sound of children playing and laughing on the playground just in front of the apartment. Will surely stay again.

Alright, here’s a draft for your Airbnb review:
"My three-day stay in Da Nang was absolutely wonderful, thanks to this amazing Airbnb! The location was perfect, with stunning views and easy access to the beach. The apartment was impeccably clean, beautifully decorated, and equipped with everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Huynh was incredibly welcoming and provided excellent recommendations for local restaurants and attractions. I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting Da Nang. It truly enhanced my vacation experience!"

huynh의 숙소는 사진과 그대로였습니다
깔끔하고 넓고 창도 크고 주변도 한적한 곳이었습니다.
장점 : 무엇보다 호스트의 친절함과 빠른 대응이 최고입니다.
단점 : 딱딱한 침대와 솜베게. 잠을 이루기 힘들었습니다😭
하지만 주변은 현지분들이 살고 있고 아이들이 뛰어노는 정말 한적하고 조용한 곳이어서 너무 좋았습니다. 중간에 부족한 것들을 요청드리면 바로 채워주시고 정말 친절했어요.
에어컨에서 소리가 나서 고치러 오셨었지만 소리는 계속 나서 바람쎄기를 약하게 해야 합니다. 참고하세요🤗

This place is a gem. Quiet little nook overlooking a quart yard, giving you a chance to get to know the local community. Loved the open spacious room and tall windows too, and the beach is walking distance. Wish we could have stayed longer.

호스트 huynh은 너무 친절하고 게스트를 위해 불편함은 없는지 항상 체크합니다.
다낭 최고의 호스트👍 고마웠어요😃
Huynh’s place was great! She was always very responsive when we had questions and her listing looks exactly like the photos. The beach was beautiful and a walkable distance.

Hyunh was a great host! I loved my stay in Da Nang. The neighborhood is quaint and away from crowded tourist areas, but such places are only a walk away. Hyunh was very responsive and friendly. Thanks again!
Hai bạn trẻ rất dễ thương. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.

Everything was as described, the host was very nice and helpful and the location met all expectations. There’s a useful market a few minutes walk away where you can buy fruits and seafood if you come in the morning. There’s also an excellent pho place about 5 minutes walk from the apartment offering a selection of pho soups for 35,000-40,000. The place is really good for working online - there’s a convenient desk and wifi is fast and reliable. I’d definitely stay again! :)

The studio was exactly as described. The host is quick to respond. It's in a walkable distance to the beach, market and grocery stores. If you are into hiking, you can go to Lady Buddha, and local trails. Studio is spacious and clean, however the kitchen needs some upgrades. If you like to cook at home you will need extra utensils. The neighborhood is safe, but can get loud when locals sing karaoke. It might be the same in any parts of Vietnam though, because people love to sing.
Die Unterkunft von Huynh war sehr sauber und entspricht komplett der Beschreibung. Nur das Bett ist für nicht-vietnamesische Verhältnisse sehr hart. Ansonsten hätten wir einen tollen Aufenthalt.

Loved the big windows with lots of natural sunlight. The blackout curtains were perfect for a good night’s sleep. The hosts were very responsive and friendly. They provided many helpful local recommendations and tips. I liked the location, it was a bit away from the main touristy areas (which were also still easily accessible). But I preferred the local restaurants and cafes over the more tourist-oriented spots. Already miss a few of my favourites! The locals were so nice and their food was incredible. The market nearby was a plus. And a quick walk to the beach to watch the sunrise in the mornings was a real treat! 👌 I would happily stay again.

I genuinely looked to book more weeks (making 1 full month or more) However it has already been booked.
Close to different beaches and amazing smiling community (kids playing, laughing)
Very beautiful feeling I had
So thank you, for sharing your home 🌹
The room was very spacious and the view from the window was beautiful. I had a comfortable and relaxing stay.
Excellent communication. We didn’t have any issue, and had a great time in the apartment. Highly recommended. Thank you Huynh.
Amazing place! Stayed for about 10 days and truly felt like home! Will stay again when I’m back in Da Nang!

Logement neuf, propre et les propriétaires sont à l’écoute sympathique et serviable, c’était notre premier fois à Da Nang et nous reviendrons, le voisinage est accueillant et n’hésiterons pas à vous proposer de manger ou boire avec eux. La propriétaire est extraordinaire, la meilleure que l’on ai eu en Asie et il y en a. Bref parfait pour voir du pays.
Merci encore 🙏🇻🇳

I had an amazing stay.This apartment absolutely family friendly with all amenities inside the room my 1year old daughter was very comfortable for the plenty of space and a children park overlooking from my balcony.Wonderful location as we get Local vegetable/fish market ,supermarket ,beach all are very close by walkable distance.
Special thanks to Huynh who just responded any time I asked for help.I will definitely recommend this property.
Again thanks to Huynh (Duoc’s Assistant) for being so responsive helpful easy to communicate .

Amazing stay :) The room was clean and spacious and has everything you need in a stay, located in a quiet neighbourhood area. Host is wonderful, very responsive and kind. Love the strong shower pressure. Do note the bed is of the hard kind, but it is still very comfortable once you get used to it.

Extremely clean and modern apartment within walking distance to some nice cafés and grocery stores that stock Western products. It's very comfy and has everything you need. The hosts were also very friendly, helpful, and gave clear instructions. I would love to stay here again!

Seamless check in. Apartment was exactly as seen in the photos. The location is fantastic- a short walk from the beach, grocery stores, restaurants, spas and everything you need. The apartment is in a prime location but it’s also quiet and peaceful.
The hosts were absolutely amazing. The reception downstairs made me feel very welcome. I use this app every month and these ladies were some of the nicest, most accommodating hosts I’ve ever had. 10/10 would recommend if you are a solo traveller like me visiting Vietnam for the first time.

отличные апартаменты! море всего в 5 минутах, рядом много кафе и парк. здесь тише чем в других районах Дананга. Duy отзывчивый хозяин, рассказал о местных достопримечательностях, быстро отвечал в чате. Приеду ещё раз, рекомендую для длинных и коротких поездок.
Great place and superb location.
Nous avons passé un super séjour
