A beautiful studio apartment right by the beach, lots of coffee shops and restaurants open 24/7 nearby.
The host was quick to respond with every request, I’d be happy to stay there again

Nous tenions à vous remercier pour ce superbe séjour ! Le logement était vraiment parfait : propre, confortable, bien équipé et idéalement situé. Nous avons tout particulièrement apprécié son emplacement qui est proche de la mer et dans un endroit animé.
Phuoc était un hôte parfait : accueillant, réactif, et très attentionné ! Il a toujours su être à notre écoute à la moindre question. Merci encore pour tout. Nous le recommanderons les yeux fermés, et reviendrons sans hésiter si l’occasion se présente !

This was a wonderful stay! The best part was definitely that the apartment is a 5-minute walk to the beach! It was so convenient that I went all 14 days of my stay. Phuoc was a great host. He met me right when I arrived to help show me how to get into the apartment and other things I should know. They came in to clean the apartment halfway through my stay which was great! The shower was amazing with a waterfall head, detachable head, and a foot one as well. The apartment was conveniently on the first floor so it was nice to not have stairs, though people walking on the street can see into the apartment. I would recommend!

Phước is a great host. Responsive, helpful and always happy to give recommendations. The apartment is clean, comfy and fully equipped for your stay. It is situated right next to a pharmacy, within close proximity to many restaurants and cafes, and just a couple hundred metres from a nice perfect. 10/10 would recommend!
Close proximity to a lot of convenience stores and restaurants. Phuoc was easy to communicate with and always there when needed. Regular cleaning for longer stays. Thanks for hosting!
L’hôte a été très courtois et accueillant, l’appartement est très bien situé, à proximité de la plage, je reviendrais j’espère.
干净卫生整洁。交通方便。老板服务周到。
コスパ最高です。好立地で比較的安く泊まりたい方におすすめ。
Super place poche de tous les service et à 2 minute à pied de la plage 🙏
Nice and friendly, very helpful
Зупинявся на 2 дні, все було добре, приємний господар.
Great stay here! Phước was very responsive and helpful, especially when we had a door issue and a power outage. Highly recommend!
The best Airbnb host I’ve ever had…very responsive and considerate, always willing to help and made me feel comfortable. I highly recommend this place 10/10 ❤️
Fijn verblijf, kamer heeft alles wat je nodig heb. Locatie is goed, dichtbij het strand. Zoals aangegeven, vanwege de locatie kan je afentoe wat muziek horen.
Great host! Place is located near the beach!

I highly recommend this place. Owner, Phuoc, is very friendly and helpful.We arrived at around 10 am. He put our luggage nicely and we are to check in at 2pm. The lodge helper cleaned the roomvery clean with disinfectant. All the facilities are neat and tidy. Though the room is not big, it has all the necessary facilities.
Thanks also for Phuoc as he also arranged tranferrance to and from airport. We lived very comfortably for the 3 days there. We highly recommend tourists to book and live there for their vocation in Da Nang!
Good place, can walking to the beach.

Kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời, rất đáng để quay lại, phòng nhỏ xinh với cửa sổ lớn đón ánh sáng. Host nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ kịp thời khi có sự cố phát sinh. Mình nhận phòng gần 11h30 tối nhưng vẫn được host trực tiếp đón và hỗ trợ nhận phòng nhanh chóng, giới thiệu các địa điểm gần toà nhà. Có máy giặt, sấy, chỗ phơi đồ. Phía dưới toà nhà có quán nước giá rất bình dân. View tầng thượng nhìn ra núi Sơn Trà, sông Hàn, toà nhà hành chính, cầu Thuận Phước lung linh khi về đêm... gần đường Nguyễn Công Trứ với rất nhiều món ngon và giá bình dân. Tuy nhiên áp lực nước trong phòng tắm cần cải thiện hơn. Ngoài ra mọi thứ rất ok.

I had a wonderful stay! The place was exactly as described—clean, comfortable, and well-maintained. The check-in process was smooth, and the host was very responsive and helpful throughout. The location was convenient and peaceful, making it easy to relax or explore the surrounding area. I really appreciated the thoughtful touches and overall hospitality. Would definitely recommend and would love to stay again!

The accommodation is in a great location, exactly halfway between the beach and the town center—both are easily reachable on foot. The apartment is very spacious and clean. The hosts are extremely kind and helpful. The only downside was the Wi-Fi, which was unfortunately so slow that I couldn’t use it at all. This was important for me, though it might not be a concern for everyone.

Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, Tivi đời khá mới có đầy đủ netflix . Vị trí căn hộ trung tâm, gần đầy đủ tiện ích, có cả fullmarket đối diện nhà, gần biển, gần sông nên mình rất dễ di chuyển. Nhân viên nhiệt tình . Hướng dẫn check in cụ thể

The host was super responsive and shared lots of great local tips, which made my trip so much easier. The place itself is tidy, well-located, and has most of the amenities you’d need. Just a small note: it might be worth checking a few power outlets and the elevator to make sure everything works smoothly. But overall, I had a comfortable and pleasant experience!

Wir haben 3 Nächte in dieser Unterkunft übernachtet und sind zufrieden. Beim Check-In hat uns Nhu freundlich empfangen und direkt alles gezeigt. Die Unterkunft war sauber.
Der Wasserdruck in der Dusche war allerdings sehr gering (vor allem für‘s Haarewaschen) und das Bad hat ein wenig nach Abwasser gestunken. Zudem könnte dir Küche noch besser ausgestattet sein (Handtücher, Waschlumpen, Gewürze…).

Lovely stay! The house is in a great location—just a short walk to the beach. We really appreciated the early check-in, which made our arrival so much easier. A special thanks to Phương for the warm welcome and for helping us with a smooth check-in. Highly recommend this place!

I think it’s a good place for the price. Walking distance from the beach (15 mins), restaurants, coffee, even a mall. Relatively quiet.
The host is super responsive, is willing to help out. I didn’t get my luggage at the airport, it got lost and the host was managing the whole process getting my luggage from lost and found.

A nice place to stay in a very good location. Huynh was very proactive and responded to all our queries. The room was neat and clean. They have ebikes for rental which can be used to roam around the city and nearby destinations including Hoi An. Highly recommended.

This is one of the best places and also one of the best people.
The place is right on the main road, it’s very easily accessible. Friendly people.
They have washing machine so that helps a lot.
Bana hills is 40 mins from this property.
If I ever visit da nang I will definitely visit and stay here again.
호스트가 무척 친절하고 방도 좋아요. 위치도 미케비치나 용다리, 한시장 모두 접근하기 좋습니다. 기회가 온다면 다시 올 것 같아요

Great stay, really enjoyed our time in DaNang staying here. Very central to things you can walk to
Hosts are so friendly, professional and proactive.
We hired an electric scooter from them and it was great!
Thank you again

This property matches the description. Very clean and easy to check in, with a responsive and polite host. The bathroom and kitchen are clean and convenient, with a full-size refrigerator and two burners on the electric stove. The location is very good, roughly a ten to fifteen minute walk to the beach. It is a great location from which to ride a bike up through Son Tra, around Da Nang, or down to Hoi An and back. The value is excellent. Highly recommended!

The host was super responsive and helpful. She was all the time asking me how I was, sent me a lot of recommendations and even warned me about a typhoon approaching the area. The apartment is perfect for someone that needs to cook light meals and work remotely. A quiet, spotless clean, comfortable place to recharge after a busy day, with new and quality furniture and appliances.

The best thing about the place is the host and her team. They are super supportive, always responsive, and taking care of the place and the guest well.
As a huge plus, they are open to suggestions to make the experience better for the guest. A great stay.

I had a great stay here! The place is very clean, spacious, and well-kept. The room is on the first floor and comes with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and hot/cold shower. They provide basic toiletries like a toothbrush, toothpaste, comb, and fresh towels, which is really convenient. The kitchen is spotless and fully stocked with cooking tools if you want to prepare meals. It’s just a short walk to the beach and about a 10–15 minute drive to Da Nang City Center. The host offers motorcycle rentals, making it easy to get around. They were very accommodating, quick to respond, and shared great recommendations for food, activities, and local spots. The neighborhood is quiet, peaceful, and feels very safe. Overall, this is a great place to stay if you want comfort, convenience, and helpful local insight. Highly recommended!
